description.hltext_display: 에이데이타, 동전 크기 카드 리더기 선봬
description.content:
[컴퓨터타임즈]에이데이타코리아(법인장 노성수, www.adata.co.kr)가 동전 크기의 초소형 사이즈를 실현한 마이크로 SD카드 전용 리더기 ‘마이크로리더 버전 3(Microreader Ver.3)’ 출시 소식을 알렸다.
블랙과 레드 두 종류의 색상으로 출시되는 신제품 마이크로리더 버전 3는 최근 휴대폰, 스마트폰 등에 많이 사용되는 마이크로 SD카드를 간편하게 PC에 연결해 신속한 데이터 전송이 가능한 카드리더기로 직경 2㎝, 무게 3g에 불과한 작은 사이즈가 특징이다.
리더기 슬롯 부분에 마이크로 SD카드를 밀어 넣으면 장착되고 슬롯 반대편을 누르면 분리할 수 있는 직관적인 사용 방법을 제공하며 노트북에서 사용 시 돌출되는 부분이 작아 USB 포트에 연결된 다른 장치들과 간섭 없이 늘 꽂아두고 사용 가능하다.
또한 리더기 내에 마이크로 SD카드를 장착하면 USB 메모리와 같은 휴대용 저장장치 용도로 사용할 수도 있어 작은 크기의 장점을 십분 활용한 1석 2조의 효과를 누릴 수 있으며 연결부분 반대편에 LED 표시등이 달려있어 제품 작동 상태를 알려줄 뿐 아니라 은은한 조명으로 시각적인 효과도 높다.
노성수 에이데이타코리아 법인장은 “최근 스마트폰의 빠른 대중화로 인해 외장 메모리로 사용되는 마이크로 SD카드의 수요가 급증하고 있다”며 “이에 따라 스마트폰용 메모리카드뿐 아니라 카드리더기와 같은 관련 액세서리 제품들에 대한 관심이 높아지고 있다”고 말했다.
-ⓒ 컴퓨터타임즈(http://www.computertimes.co.kr) 무단전재 및 재배포금지
노동균 기자(yesno@computertimes.co.kr)

description.hltext_display: Calmy-Rey verteidigt Schweizer Haltung zum Kosovo
description.content:
Dass die Schweiz sich als eines der ersten Länder für ein unabhängiges Kosovo aussprach, erscheint nach den Organhandel-Vorwürfen gegen Premier Thaci in einem anderen Licht. Aussenministerin Calmy-Rey weist Kritik zurück.
Aussenministerin Micheline Calmy-Rey hat die frühe Anerkennung des Kosovo durch die Schweiz verteidigt. Nach dem Krieg sei es darum gegangen, die Region zu stabilisieren, sagte sie in einem Interview mit den Zeitungen «Tages-Anzeiger» und «Bund».
«Österreich war vor uns, wenn sie das beruhigt» Die Schweiz sei nicht das erste Land gewesen, das Kosovo anerkannt habe, sondern das 30. oder 31. «Österreich war noch vor uns, wenn sie das beruhigt», so die Aussenministerin weiter. «Aber sicher waren wir die Ersten, die damals in der Uno gesagt haben, man müsse jetzt über die Unabhängigkeit Kosovos sprechen.»
Calmy-Rey wies darauf hin, dass die Schweiz gegenüber der Führung in Pristina schon früh Rechtsstaatlichkeit angemahnt habe. Der nun in die Kritik geratene kosovarische Ministerpräsident Hashim Thaci sei erst seit Januar 2008 Regierungschef. «Die Unabhängigkeitserklärung und danach die Anerkennung durch viele Staaten liegen nicht an seiner Person», sagte Calmy-Rey.
Kein Auge zugedrückt Calmy-Rey wies Vorwürfe zurück, die Schweiz habe bei der kosovarischen Führung ein Auge zugedrückt. «Wir haben 2008 gesagt: Jetzt habt ihr einen Staat, aber das muss ein Rechtsstaat werden. Wenn es schreckliche Fakten in der Vergangenheit gibt, dann dürfen sie nicht unter den Teppich gekehrt werden».
Calmy-Rey sagte weiter, die Vorwürfe, die von Europaratsermittler Dick Marty vorgebracht werden, müssten nun von der EU-Justiz- und Polizeibehörde Eulex untersucht werden. «Auch die betroffenen Länder und namentlich der Kosovo müssen zur Klärung dieser Vorwürfe beitragen», so die Aussenministerin. «In Kosovo muss ein Rechtsstaat aufgebaut werden, und das bedingt auch die Aufarbeitung der eigenen Vergangenheit».
Schwere Vorwürfe im Marty-Bericht Marty hatte seinen Bericht in der vergangenen Woche vorgelegt. Er beschuldigt Thaci darin, in seiner Rolle als ehemaliger Führer einer Gruppe der Befreiungsarmee UCK in die Ermordung von Gefangenen und die Entnahme ihrer Organe verstrickt gewesen zu sein. Thaci hat die Vorwürfe zurückgewiesen. (ank, sda)

description.hltext_display: A오즈, 겨울방학 시리즈 업데이트 룸바섬 추가
description.content:
SEOUL, Korea (AVING) -- CJ인터넷(대표이사 남궁 훈)의 게임포털 넷마블(www.netmarble.net)이 서비스하고 애니파크(대표이사 김홍규)가 개발한 액션 3D 횡스크롤 MMORPG 'After 537:오즈(이하 A오즈)'가 겨울방학 시리즈 업데이트로 신규 던전 룸바섬을 추가한다.
이번에 새롭게 추가되는 룸바섬은 다루스와 타랄 대륙 사이의 작은 섬으로, 조인족 대모의 딸인 넬시아에게 납치된 어머니를 구출해 달라는 부탁을 받아 진입하게 된다. 룸바섬은 룸바 성채와 픽탄 요새, 룸바 대신전으로 구성됐으며, 22일 우선 룸바 성채가 추가된 후 2주 간격으로 세 차례에 걸쳐 업데이트된다.
가장 먼저 선보이는 룸바 성채는 룸바섬에 들어가기 위한 첫 관문으로, '데란 다쿤라'와 '데란 가마툰과 고릴라 쿰보', '데란 임바루 보루타칼'이 보스로 등장한다. 이중 룸바 성채 최고 보스인 '데란 임바루 보루타칼'은 무거운 토템 지팡이로 강력한 공격을 퍼붓는 동시에 다양한 토템을 소환해 주변을 초토화시키는 만만치 않은 상대다.
룸바 성채에서는 최대 생명력 및 이동 속도 증가, 회피 100% 증가 등의 효과를 가진 전설급 반지 '탈출의 제왕' 등 다양한 희귀 아이템을 랜덤 제공한다.
한편, A오즈는 룸바섬 업데이트와 함께 크리스마스 이벤트도 진행한다. 이번 이벤트에서는 각 마을 NPC의 특별 이벤트 퀘스트나 낚시를 통해 크리스마스 특별 선물 상자를 얻을 있으며, 선물상자에는 꾸미기 아이템인 산타 복장 세트와 함께 체력과 기력을 회복시켜주는 특수 아이템 등 크리스마스 특별 아이템을 얻을 수 있다.
ⓒ 에이빙뉴스(aving.net), 무단전재 및 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: Pocket Wine Assistant for the iPhone Helps Consumers “Find Their...
description.content:
The new Pocket Wine Assistant mobile phone app gives consumers independence in decision making, anywhere, anytime
Menlo Park, CA (PRWEB) December 22, 2010
Wine Market Assistant, LLC, is pleased to announce the launch of their ground-breaking mobile application, Pocket Wine Assistant, for the iPhone. Pocket Wine Assistant is a must for users wishing to obtain up-to-date exhaustive product information on wines, beers and spirits coupled with on-demand recipe and cheese pairing suggestions. The app lets users enter their own search criteria or a unique UPC (bar code) to view detailed product information including ratings and reviews.
“Pocket Wine Assistant makes the beverage selection fun for the curious novice, yet challenging for the aficionado by offering customized search capabilities. Wine Market Assistant has been providing exceptional content to consumers for years through their retailer’s in-store kiosk. The new Pocket Wine Assistant mobile phone app gives consumers independence in decision making, anywhere, anytime,” said Jon Holland, Pocket Wine Assistant Partner.
Pocket Wine Assistant can be downloaded FREE for limited time from the Apple Store. For more information please visit http://www.PocketWineAssistant.com.
Pocket Wine Assistant also offers a private label version for retailers, wineries and restaurants utilizing their existing mobile platform. The application is customizable to the Enterprise look and feel along with the full content and search capabilities. The customizable configuration of this powerful tool results in a rich environment for selling beverages and provides a value-added service for their customers by providing matching recipes and cheese ideas. The mobile application also has the capability to provide targeted promotional opportunities to the customer at the point of decision, in both the standard and branded versions.
About Wine Market Assistant, LLC:
Wine Market Assistant, LLC is a Menlo Park, CA based company dedicated to helping consumers find beverages that meet their preferences along with paired recipes and cheeses. Wine Market Assistant offers a full suite of solutions for the retailer including kiosk, website and mobile. Each solution is integrated to share the same databases and back-end platform. This promotes beverage and food sales with a consistent marketing strategy across different technology channels.

event_or_fact.property: The new Pocket Wine Assistant mobile phone app gives consumers independence in decision making, anywhere, anytime,?

description.hltext_display: UK firm offers to produce 65mw power from garbage
description.content:
A UK-based company proposed to set up a 65mw power-generating unit using the garbage generated in the city, but the BBMP was not convinced with the overall idea.
Green Homes Global Energy, along with Bangalore-basedRushe Infratek Pvt Ltd, proposed implementing a 65mw an hour waste energy solution for the city. The BBMP will provide the garbage generated in the city to the plant and we will produce the electricity and sell it to the power purchasing agency. The BBMP needs to provide 6 to 10 acres of land for setting up the plant, which will cost about Rs3,000 crore. We will give back the city a greener, more peaceful and healthier environment as the plant doesnt emit any smell nor create noise.Moreover, the residue after using the waste is very minimal, said Green Homes representative Ajay Ahluwalia.
Rushe Infratek managing director Ravi Prakash said that BBMP will have to assure garbage supply for at least 25 years and the state government or an agency must agree to purchase power thus produced.
They also said that the waste-to-energy plant can not only convert municipal solid waste but also medical, industrial and sewage waste.
The plant requires about one lakh tonnes of waste annually to generate 3 to 6mw of power an hour. The rejects from the garbage are nil. The waste is converted into energy by a special method called pyrolysis, where the common hazardous waste is converted into electricity by a total green technology.
Not convinced with the idea, BBMP commissioner Siddaiah expressed that the municipal garbage was no longer considered a waste, as it has become a revenue-generating product. We are thinking of generating revenue from the waste produced in the city. The company will produce electricity, sell it and make money; the purchaser will sell it making some profit on it. Both will make money, but how does the BBMP, that provides the garbage, be benefited, he wondered and questioned the company representatives if they wished to purchasing garbage from the BBMP instead.
The company representatives, however, were firm that the Palike should provide garbage free of cost as they will give the city a clean and healthy environment by using up the garbage. The BBMP collects the garbage and dump in landfills. But if we set up a plant, BBMP can dump the garbage in the plant which will be converted into power without pollution. That way, the city will be clean too, Ajay said. Negotiating further, BBMP officials asked, if garbage is given out free of cost, will they at least take up door-to-door collection work as Palike is spending nearly Rs12 crore for garbage collection every year. The representatives declined saying BBMP should collect and dump the garbage in the plant. Almost everybody, including deputy mayor N Dayanand, ruling party leader Satyanarayana and standing committee chairmen were not convinced with the proposal.
Siddaiah said the Palike can only provide land and garbage to the company if they set up a plant, but for power-generation or supply, the company has to approach the state government.

BBMP will have to assure garbage supply for at least 25 years and the state government or an agency must agree to purchase power thus produced.

description.hltext_display: Israel complains to UN over Gaza rockets
description.content:
AFP - 16 minutes ago
Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu looks at the remains of homemade rockets launched from the Gaza Strip. Israel has called on the Security Council to issue a "clear and resolute" message against rockets fired into its territory from the Gaza Strip, in a letter to the United Nations body that was made public on Wednesday.
JERUSALEM (AFP) - – Israel has called on the Security Council to issue a "clear and resolute" message against rockets fired into its territory from the Gaza Strip, in a letter to the United Nations body that was made public on Wednesday.
The December 21 letter, made public by Israel's foreign ministry, comes amid rising tensions on Israel's border with the coastal enclave.
On Tuesday, Israel launched a series of airstrikes against what it said were tunnels, training sites and weapons facilities in the Gaza Strip, in response to a salvo of mortar shells on Monday and rocket fire on Tuesday morning.
A Kassem rocket landed just metres (yards) away from a kindergarten in a southern Israeli kibbutz, wounding a teenage girl.
"The incidents of the past several days are part of an escalation of terrorist attacks emanating from Gaza that target Israeli civilians, towns, and military personnel," said the letter signed by Meron Reuben, Israel's UN ambassador.
"Israel holds the de facto authority in the Gaza Strip completely responsible for all of these incidents, which are carried out in clear violation of international law. In response to such attacks, Israel has exercised and will continue to exercise its right to self-defence."
The letter is addressed to US ambassador to the UN Susan Rice, the current chair of the Security Council, and UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon.
It says three rockets and 18 mortars have been fired into parts of southern Israel from Gaza since December 19 alone.
"The Security Council, the Secretary-General, and the international community must send a clear and resolute message that these attacks are unacceptable," Reuben wrote.
"In addition, the Security Council must give appropriate attention to the smuggling of arms into Gaza, which continues to fuel violence and instability in our region."
On Tuesday, Israeli army chief Lieutenant General Gabi Ashkenazi warned that the relative calm that has prevailed since Israel's devastating Gaza offensive at the end of 2008 could quickly end.
"The situation is tense and fragile and could easily deteriorate, particularly if a rocket lands in a populated area," he told a parliamentary committee.
Between December 2008 and January 2009, Israel launched Operation Cast Lead, in response to hundreds of rockets fired from Gaza into the Jewish state.
The war cost the lives of 1,400 Palestinians, mostly civilians, and 13 Israelis, 10 of them soldiers.
Since then, the number of rocket attacks has dropped considerably, but the army says more than 200 rockets or shells have been fired this year.

event_or_fact.property: The Security Council, the Secretary-General, and the international community must send a clear and resolute message that these attacks are unacceptable; In addition, the Security Council must give appropriate attention to the smuggling of arms into Gaza,

Earlier this month Imaginatik said losses doubled in the half year to September to £1.42m from £0.65m while revenues halved to £1.48m. description.hltext_display: Fed extends program to ease debt crisis
description.content: The Federal Reserve extended a program set up earlier this year to ease strains from the European debt crisis. The program, which was set to expire in January, will now run through Aug. 1. The Fed is lending dollars to other central banks in exchange for their currencies. The central banks can lend those dollars out to banks in their home countries to ease financial turmoil.

description.hltext_display: Experience Oldham | Census estimates show Oldham by the numbers
description.content:
Oldham residents: This column is about you.
You, my friend, are smart. You're also wealthier than most, and you likely moved to Oldham in the last 30 years.
Odds are that the house you (probably) purchased is worth $200,000 or more, and has at least seven rooms.
At least that's what the survey says (but you're smart enough to know that already, right?)
The U.S. Census Bureau released estimates last week that paint a thorough picture of the county and its cities. The American Community Survey data was collected from 2005 to 2009 and shows that Oldham remains one of the counties in the state with the largest median household income, at $78,460. In 2000, the median was $81,394, when adjusted for inflation.
But it's important to recognize that not everyone fits into this category. In fact, an average of 5.4 percent of the county's 56,000 residents lived in poverty from 2005-2009. That's up from 4.1 percent in 2000.
While most Oldham houses are spacey — considering that only 2.7 people live in each house, on average — there are 346 mobile homes. Many are in La Grange, though Crestwood also has a few.
I'll be painting a fuller, more in-depth picture of what this survey says about Oldham in the coming months. But for now, here's a quick look at you and your neighbors in the last four years:
90 percent of residents living in Oldham between 2005 and 2009 also lived in the county the previous year. The other 10 percent were new.
60 percent of Oldham residents who were born in the United States also were born in Kentucky.
82 percent of the population was in a family (married couple or “other families”). Another 18 percent were people living alone or not with their families.
Of Oldham's 20,168 homes, more than 1,000 sat vacant.
91 percent of people over age 25 had graduated from high school; 37 percent had a bachelor's degree or higher.
$1,681 was the median mortgage payment.
85 percent of Oldham workers travel to work alone, and 8 percent carpool. Commuters travel on average 25 minutes to work.
The survey results tell many stories about Oldham residents. They even show how many of you (292) use wood to heat your homes, and how many (five) use coal. These are just estimates, though — the 2010 census data haven't been released.
If you're someone with a story to tell in Oldham, whether you represent the majority or minority there, I'm here to listen. E-mail me.
And in the meantime, enjoy the last few months until you turn 40 (the median age is 38.6).
Reporter Andrea Uhde Shepherd can be reached at (502) 582-4663.

description.hltext_display: Men, women still follow ancient rituals while shopping
description.content:
Washington, Dec 22 (IANS) Men and women still follow ancient rituals while shopping, says a new study.
For instance, during the last-minute holiday rush, men seek their prized item, pay, and leave without much ado. Women study the fabrics, colour, texture and price.
The hunting and gathering ritual of yesteryear continues today in malls around the world, says Daniel Kruger of the School of Public Health, University of Michigan.
Gathering edible plants and fungi is traditionally done by women. In modern terms, think of filling a basket by selecting one item at a time, he said, according to a Michigan statement.
Women in foraging societies return to the same patches that previously yielded successful harvests, and usually stay close to home and use landmarks as guides.
Foraging is a daily activity, often social and can include young children if necessary. Women must be very adept at choosing just the right colour, texture and smell to ensure food safety and quality.
They also must time harvests, and know when a certain depleted patch will regenerate and yield good harvest again.
In modern terms, women are much more likely to know when a specific type of item will go on sale, for example, than men. Women also spend much more time choosing the perfect gift.
Men on the other hand, often have a specific item in mind and want to get in, get it, and get out. In ancestral times, it was critical to get meat home as quickly as possible, Kruger said.
SEARCH

event_or_fact.property: The hunting and gathering ritual of yesteryear continues today in malls around the world
In modern terms, think of filling a basket by selecting one item at a time
In ancestral times, it was critical to get meat home as quickly as possible

description.hltext_display: [株式会社モバイルマーケティング・ジャパン] 2010年はどんな1年だった？ 消費者の今年の漢字は「苦」 〜苦境に悩む消費者の実態〜
description.content: 株式会社モバイルマーケティング・ジャパン（本社：東京都港区、代表取締役社長：江尻尚平、以下モバイルマーケティング・ジャパン）は、モバイルモニター会員を対象に、「2010年はどのような1年だったか」をテーマにアンケート調査をいたしました。今回は、「今年の漢字」、「印象的なニュース」、「活躍した人」などを消費者視点から分析しています。株式会社モバイルマーケティング・ジャパン（本社：東京都港区、代表取締役社長：江尻尚平、以下モバイルマーケティング・ジャパン）は、モバイルモニター会員を対象に、「2010年はどのような1年だったか」をテーマにアンケート調査をいたしました。 今回は、「今年の漢字」、「印象的なニュース」、「活躍した人」などを消費者視点から分析しています。 モバイルマーケティング・ジャパンでは、強みとする携帯、モバイルを活用したインターネットリサーチを市場でニーズの高いテーマのもとアンケート調査を実施し、自主調査結果として情報公開しております。 ≪アンケート調査結果トピックス≫ ■消費者の今年の漢字は“苦” 今年を表現する漢字として「苦」「忙」、「忍」などが上位にあがった ■今年の活躍株は、やはりAKB４８ 今年活躍した人は「AKB４８」「石川遼」「嵐」などアイドルグループとスポーツ選手が上位を占める ■印象的なニュースは“尖閣諸島”や“北朝鮮砲撃”など国際的 皮肉にも悪いニュースが消費者の国際的ニュースへの関心を高めた ■お金はレジャーよりも家庭のことに 今年もっともお金をかけたことは「教育費／養育費」 ■景気回復を高く望む、消費者の声 消費者が来年に望むことは、とにかく「景気回復」 ■「必ず」したいことトップは「資格の取得」 ■消費者の今年の漢字は“苦” 「今年を漢字一字で表現するとしたら何の漢字になるか」聞いたところ、最も多かったのは「苦」。2番目の「忙」や、4番目の「忍」を考えると、生活に対してゆとりのなさや、耐え忍ぶ大変さを感じている消費者が少なくないことがうかがえる。 5位には「楽」の文字もランクインしたものの、前向きな漢字は少数派。経済が回復に向かっているという報道が出始める中も、個々の消費者は、自分たちの生活が好転しているとは、まだまだ感じていないようだ。 ■今年の活躍株は、やはりAKB４８ 今年もっとも活躍した人（グループ含む）を聞いたところ、もっとも多かったのは、注目の高まる「AKB４８」で、ダントツの24.0%となった。12月1日に新流行語大賞（ユーキャン発表）ともなったグループだけに、一般消費者からも活躍の評価は高いようだ。 1位から5位までは全てアイドルグループとスポーツ選手が独占。若手が多い中、野球界のベテランであるイチローが4位に入った。イチローは例年も活躍した人として注目される、いわゆる「殿堂入り」的存在。その他の上位若手人がイチローのように継続的な評価を受ける存在となるかが、今後注目される。■印象的なニュースは“尖閣諸島”や“北朝鮮砲撃”など国際的 今年もっとも印象に残っているニュースを聞いたところ、最も多かった「尖閣諸島問題」を含め、「チリ落盤事故」、「北朝鮮の韓国砲撃」など国際的なニュースが上位に挙がった。皮肉なことに、事件・事故といったマイナスの内容のニュースによって、消費者の国際的な情報に対する関心が高まったとも考えられる。 良いニュースとしては日本が決勝トーナメントに進出した「ワールドカップ」や、奇跡的に地球に帰還した小惑星探査機「はやぶさ」が挙がったが、5%未満にとどまり、その他政治や社会問題など幅広い回答に分散した。■お金はレジャーよりも家庭のことに 今年もっともお金をかけた「モノ・コト」としてトップに挙がったのは「子供の教育費／養育費」。少子化が進む中、それ以上に親が子供にかける予算は高くなっており、消費者の育児の優先度の高さがうかがえる。 2位に入ったのは「家電」。家電の多くが単価が低くないため、上位に挙がることは当然とも言えるが、エコポイントや地デジ対策の時期が重なったため、今年は特にその傾向が強く出たと考えられる。 このような家庭に関するものが4位、5位の「ファッション」、「旅行」を上回り、家庭のことにまずはお金をかけ、そのやりくりの中で、自分の好きものやレジャーにお金をかける消費者の生活が垣間見られる。■景気回復を高く望む、消費者の声 社会的視点から来年に期待することを聞いたところ、2割近くが「景気回復／経済安定」を回答。今年を表現する漢字に「苦」、「忙」、「忍」が挙がったように、経済社会に対して不満や不安を感じている消費者が多いと考えられる。その他「社会の平和」という回答も7%ほど挙がったが、その他に目立った回答は多く挙がらなかった。 ≪具体的なコメント≫ 景気が良くなってほしいです。とにかく、収入を増やしたいです。たとえ質素な暮らしでも、健康で明るい日々を送りたいと思います。（50代/女性） 世の中全体が明るく、景気の良い世の中になったらよいと思います。また、世の中に貢献出来る年でありたいと思います。（20代/女性） 景気が良くなり仕事が増え、経済面で余裕が出る一年にしたいです。（20代/男性） 子供も大事ですがお年寄りがゆっくり幸せに暮らせて安心できる環境作りができる年になったらいいと思います。（30代/女性） 平和な年。争いや紛争がなく、平和的な解決ができる成熟した社会になってほしい。（30代/男性） ハイテク化よりも人を大切する本来の人間が働く社会に戻る…。そのようなことを重視するハイテク化に進んでほしいです。（30代/女性） きちんとした強い政治家が国を引っ張ってくれる。（40代/男性） 国と国同士がもっと思いやりを持ってお互いを見つめる年。（10代/女性） 地球温暖化を阻止すべくエコな生活。（40代/女性） 経済活動が活発化してもらいたい 円高の是正。（40代/男性） 医療・福祉・少子化対策を求める運動をしたい。（30代/女性） ■「必ず」したいことトップは「資格の取得」 来年「必ず」やりたいことを聞いたところ、「資格」という回答者がトップで8.0%。単なるレジャーよりも学習や自分磨きに時間とお金をかけたいと考える消費者の割合が多い結果となった。また、4位の「結婚」をはじめ、「転職」や「留学」など人生の転機となる言葉も目立った。 ≪具体的なコメント≫ 資格とれるだけとる！あと英語をがんばりたい。（30代/女性） 英語のマスター。ビジネスシーンでも通訳を必要としないレベルにブラッシュアップすること。（20代/男性） 月並みかもしれないですが、ダイエットです。（40代/女性） 株や外貨、投信以外の資産運用にチャレンジしたい。（30代/男性） 現在住んでいるマンションは、どの部屋も皆で使っているので、各部屋の模様替えをして、子供達、私達、各々の部屋作りをしたいと思っています。（40代/女性） 趣味の時間が無くなりがちなので、ちゃんと自分の時間を過ごす。（20代/男性） 大学に合格してキャンパスライフを満喫したい！（10代/女性） スランプから抜けることです。作詞家を目指していますが、来年はスランプから抜けて、オーディションに作品を出したいです。（50代/女性）【アンケート調査概要】 調査方法 ： インターネットリサーチ 調査対象 ： 20才以上の男女 自社モニター 有効回答数 ： 合計275サンプル 調査日時 ： 2010年12月3日〜12月10日 調査機関 ： 株式会社モバイルマーケティング・ジャパン 株式会社モバイルマーケティング・ジャパンに関するお問い合わせ TEL ： 03-6802-7901 メール： info@mobilemarketing.jp アンケート調査担当： 遠藤、丸山 リンク※内容をメディア掲載する際は、ご一報ください。

description.hltext_display: [株式会社バーチャルネットサポート] お取り寄せ通販サイト 『女将さんの太鼓判』 年末年始のおもてなしに、年始のご挨拶におすすめのこだわりの逸品を販売中
[株式会社クロスランゲージ] クロスランゲージ 翻訳サーバ「TranslationServer 3.5」をリリース
description.content: 2010年12月22日――株式会社クロスランゲージ（本社：東京都千代田区 代表取締役 古賀勝夫）は、翻訳サーバ「TranslationServer 3.5」をリリース致しました。______________________________________________________________________クロスランゲージは、インターネットでの翻訳や社内翻訳サーバの処理速度が、従来の製品に比べて最大30倍になる「TranslationServer 3.5」をリリースしました。 TranslationServerは、「WEB-Transer＠ホームページ」「WEB-Transer＠SDK」「WEB-Transer@Enterprise」「プレミアム翻訳」に使われているメイン・サーバです。2010年8月にリリースした「TranslationServer 3.4」では処理プロセスを見直し処理速度を向上致しましたが、今回のバージョンでは従来のバージョンよりもはるかに多くの翻訳リクエストを処理することができ、ホストサーバの負荷を軽減することができます。高負荷の状態では、1秒あたりの翻訳リクエスト処理数は従来の1.3倍（30%）から25倍（2500%）に向上しただけでなく、通常負荷の状態でもCPU使用率の負荷は70％軽減されました。クロスランゲージでは、機械翻訳を利用したホームページの自動翻訳、機械翻訳の商用利用の問合せが増加しております。最近では、海外進出する企業への導入、インバウンド観光ビジネスへの利用、携帯コンテンツ利用、グローバル企業の全社導入なども増加しております。既に導入中のお客様からも、海外取引の増加とインターネットを利用した機械翻訳需要が増加傾向にあるため、翻訳サーバの負荷削減と処理速度の向上が求められていました。今回のバージョンアップにより、大幅にホストサーバの負荷削減と翻訳処理速度が期待できるため、お客様の利便性向上に繋がると確信しております。「WEB-Transer＠ホームページ」「WEB-Transer＠SDK」「プレミアム翻訳」は、2010年12月から順次バージョンアップを行い2011年1月末までには作業を完了する予定です。「WEB-Transer＠Enterprise」は、2010年12月納品分から最新バージョンとなります。■ TranslationSeaverについて クロスランゲージが開発した、日本国内で最もよく使われているWEB翻訳サーバです。機械翻訳エンジンは、日本語、英語、中国語、韓国語、フランス語、イタリア語、ドイツ語、スペイン語、ポルトガル語が利用可能です。機械翻訳としては、最高クラスの翻訳品質と安定稼動を実現しており、多方面の機械翻訳サービスに利用されています。

description.hltext_display: [株式会社角川コンテンツゲート] かわいいネコちゃんとワンちゃんが「主演」の映画『ネコナデ』と『イヌゴエ』がiPhoneとiPadで観られる！
description.content: 堅物な人事部長・鬼塚（大杉漣）がふとした拍子で拾った子ねこ（垂れ耳が可愛いスコティッシュフォールドの"トラちゃん"）に翻弄される姿が心あたたまるコメディタッチの映画『ネコナデ』。一見キュートなフレンチブルドッグのペス（声：遠藤憲一）。ところが、口を開けばお下劣な"ワン"ウェイトークが、なんと関西弁で炸裂！ しゃべる犬とダメ青年の不思議な友情を描くハートウォーミングコメディ『イヌゴエ』。ネコちゃんワンちゃん好きにはたまらないこの2作品が今話題のiPhoneとiPadで観れちゃうんです！配信サイトは「MovieGate」（角川コンテンツゲート運営）で、視聴価格は2作品とも315円（税込：購入から7日間何度でも視聴可能）となっています。◆アクセス方法：iPhone・iPadの標準ブラウザ「Safari」からリンク にアクセス※日本国外からのアクセスの場合、映像視聴は行えません◆対応機種iPad, iPhone3G, iPhone3GS, iPhone4, iPod touch ※iOS3.0以上「iPhoneとiPadがない！」という方には、劇場版『ネコナデ』についてはモバイルサイト「MovieGate」でも配信中！また、同サイト内に設置されている定額（月額735円・税込）で見放題のコーナー「AMGわくわくムービー見放題」では映画版とドラマ版の「イヌゴエ」なども配信中です！（docomoのみ対応）この冬、クールなiPhoneとiPadでホットなひと時を過ごしてみませんか？「劇場版ネコナデ」(C)2008「ネコナデ」製作委員会「映画版イヌゴエ VOICE OF DOG」(C)2005「イヌゴエ」製作委員会

description.hltext_display: UK super market buyong less SA wine
description.content:
Exports of South African-packaged wines to the UK have dropped by 29 percent in volume over the past 11 months, Business Day reported on Wednesday.
Wines of SA, the industry body responsible for promoting South African wines abroad, attributed the drop in sales to a shift to bottling and packaging by some of the bigger supermarket brands in the UK. The supermarkets are opting to buy only the wine and then to package it themselves.
Jo Wehring, the organisations UK market manager, said tough economic times had forced the biggest retail stores to choose to bottle South African-sourced wines in the UK.Wehring noted that these retail stores were importing bulk, unpackaged South African wine in an effort to cut costs.
Research by consulting firm ACNielsen shows the value of South African wine sales has dropped by UK3 a bottle in the UK in the year under review.This figure translates into 48.5 percent of lost revenue for wine exporters, the research indicated.
Despite a drop in sales and exports, Wehring remained optimistic that trading conditions would improve .
The UK is South Africas largest trading partner in the European Union and is also the largest buyer of local wines.

event_or_fact.property: tough economic times had forced the biggest retail stores to choose to bottle South African-sourced wines in the UK
these retail stores were importing bulk, unpackaged South African wine in an effort to cut costs.

description.hltext_display: L'Histoire sans fin
description.content: Ce film tiré du livre est un chef d'oeuvre. L'histoire est originale et les spectateurs sont vite pris dans le déroulement du film. Les acteurs sont des commédiens doués. Le monde fantastique crée par l'auteur d'après le livre nous fait entrer dans un monde imaginaire plein d'aventure, d'humour et de bravoure. Les personnages de ce film sont attachants. Cette oeuvre ravira les enfants qui aiment les regarder les aventures d'un enfant de cette âge. Bien que les effets spéciaux laissent à désirer cela n'enlève rien au charme du film. C'est un film que l'on regard avec nostalgie en repensant à nos années d'enfances et de rêves.

description.hltext_display: Obama signing don't ask, don't tell repeal
description.content:
WASHINGTON -- President Barack Obama is ready to sign a landmark law that tells America's armed services to let homosexuals serve openly for the first time.
Obama's signature will fulfill a campaign pledge, cheer his party's liberals and strike a blow for what he sees as basic human rights.
So many gay rights and Democratic activists are expected at Wednesday's signing ceremony that the White House booked an auditorium at the Interior Department.
Pentagon officials caution that activists' elation over the bill could be premature, since service chiefs have to complete implementation plans before lifting the old policy. They also have to certify that it won't damage combat readiness, as critics charge, and draft guidelines to cover a host of practical questions, like how to handle sexual orientation in making barracks assignments.

event_or_fact.property: to let homosexuals serve openly for the first time

description.hltext_display: Les yeux de Julia
description.content:
Quand Julia apprend la mort soudaine de sa soeur Sara, tout semble clairement indiquer qu'elle s'est suicidée. Mais Julia n'arrive pas à accepter cette version des faits et commence à passer au crible les événements qui ont eu lieu les derniers mois avant le drame.
La découverte d'éléments déconcertants, en désaccord avec la personnalité de Sara, et sa rupture de contacts avec son entourage, ne font que nourrir les soupçons de Julia quant aux circonstances réelles du décès.
Décidée à résoudre l'énigme de cette ultime période, Julia devient l'objet d'une singulière menace qu'aucune autre personne autour d'elle, y compris son mari Isaac, ne semble percevoir, alors même que la maladie dégénérescente dont elle souffre prend le dessus, la plongeant petit à petit dans l'obscurité.
La compréhension et l'amour d'Isaac avaient jusqu'alors eu raison des attaques de cécité de Julia, mais une série d'incidents inquiétants, et toujours plus violents, menacent son équilibre, l'enfermant inexorablement dans le monde des ténèbres, à la merci de la présence terrifiante qui s'y terre.
© Camera Press

description.hltext_display: Руководство "Интера" должно объявить об отставке Бенитеса в среду
description.content: Президент "Интера" Массимо Моратти принял решение уволить главного тренера команды � афаэля Бенитеса, утверждает Sky Sports. Официально об отставке 50-летнего специалиста должно быть объявлено в среду, 22 декабря. Напомним, что слухи об уходе Бенитеса появились после его ультиматума руководству клуба. Тренер пригрозил покинуть "Интер", если клуб не купит трёх новых футболистов. Это вызвало гнев Моратти, который по горячим следам отказался комментировать трансферную политику команды. Чуть позже Моратти опроверг сообщения об отставке Бенитса, однако, по данным некоторых СМИ, во вторник он решал вопросы о расторжении контракта с тренером и выплате компенсации. Досрочное прекращение отношений с Бенитесом может обойтись "Интеру" в € 8 млн. При этом испанец будет лишён права тренировать другие команды в течение полугода.

description.hltext_display: Siste frist for å betale regninger
description.content:
Når nettbankene «stenger» i morgen, åpner de ikke før mandag 27. desember. Husk særlig på BSU-innskuddet før nyttår.
Husk å overføre penger til BSU-kontoen din før fristene i nettbanken går ut. Illustrasjonsfoto: Colourbox.no
Les også:
Dokumenter/Skjema
Kalkulator
Nettbanken er selvfølgelig åpen for bruk alle dager, men det gjelder egne frister dersom du skal få gjennomført betalinger før jul eller nyttår.
Dine Penger har sjekket tidsfristene i nettbankene for jule- og nyttårshelgen. Skal du betale regninger før jul, bør du gjøre det i dag og senest i morgen formiddag.
Les også:Rekordhelg for kortbruk
Lite julestengt
I og med at julaften i år er på en fredag og første og andre juledag er i helgen, blir det ikke så lang «juleferie» i nettbankene i år.
Men planlegger du å gi noen en pengegave til jul? Da bør du overføre pengene til konto innen formiddagen i morgen. Da har mottakerne pengene på konto på julaften.
Nyttårsfrister
Regninger som skal betales i 2010, må betales før formiddagen 31. desember. Husk å sette 31. desember i datofeltet.
OBS: BSU
Har du planer om å sette penger inn på BSU for å få med deg skattefordelen, er det spesielt viktig at du overholder fristene. Registreres overføringen for sent, mister du nemlig årets skattefordel.
Registreres overføringen for sent, registreres den for 2011 og ikke 2010. Les mer om BSU her.
Dine Penger har innhentet informasjon fra de største bankene. (Med forbehold om feil i bankenes opplysninger eller endringer).
Nordea

På forsiden av VG Dine Penger akkurat nå:
Når nettbankene «stenger» i morgen, åpner de ikke før mandag 27. desember. Husk særlig på BSU-innskuddet før nyttår.
Les hele saken| Bank
Flere småsparere er blitt positive til å kjøpe aksjefond igjen. Slik sparer du smart i aksjefond.
Les hele saken| Sparing og fond
Svar best på 4 spørsmål om norsk økonomi for neste år og vinn 5.000 kroner.
Les hele saken| Smarte penger
Les hele saken| Bank
Les hele saken| Lov og rett
Ressurser Bank
Her finner du hvilken bank som gir deg best betingelser på boliglån. Tallene som er oppgitt er de beste rentesatsene som banken tilbyr. Det betyr at du kan få et dårligere tilbud enn det som står her. Alle landets banker er med.
Kalkulatoren finner den banken som gir deg høyest rente på det beløpet du velger. Du kan samtidig velge å ta med renten på noen utvalgte beløp.
Kalkulatoren skal brukes såfremt du bruker nettbanken til å betale giroer, overføre penger ol. Hvis du vil bruke tradisjonelle gireringstjenester (brevgiro,skranke ol), skal du bruke kalkulatoren Finn beste tradisjonelle brukskonto.
Kalkulatoren skal brukes såfremt du bruker tradisjonell måte på å betale giroer (brevgiro, skranke ol) på. Hvis du vil bruke nettbank som gireringsløsning, skal du bruke kalkulatoren Finn beste brukskonto. I denne kalkulatoren kan du legge inn tall som passer med ditt forbruksmønster. Tallene du legger inn skal være på årsbasis.
Her får du en liste over alle bankers bsu-rente. Alle landets banker er tatt med. Hvis du skriver inn et årlig BSU-sparebeløp, kan du se hva dette beløpet vokser til på et valgfritt antall år.
Kalkulatoren hjelper deg til å avgjøre om du bør refinansiere eller ikke. Denne testen kan bare brukes når du sammenligner lån med flytende rente.
Vedlegg: Legg ved all produktinformasjon du har mottatt.
Nå har Kokebakker og Zakamouline utarbeidet et dokument som imøtegår DnB Nors kritikk. «Metoden som DnB Nor foreslår er dessverre uegnet for å sammenligne alternative spare-og investeringsstrategier for den enkelte investor», skriver Koekebakker og Zakamouline.
En kritikk av anvendt metode
Føler du deg lurt av banken og ønsker å klage til Bankklagenemnda, bør du vedlegge denne rapporten fra Høgskolen i Agder. Det er særlig dersom du har lånefinansiert det garanterte spareproduktet, at rapporten gir deg støtte. Ved sitering fra rapporten skal Dine Penger / Høgskolen i Agder oppgis som kilde.
Dette er en mal som kan brukes som et utgangspunkt for å få ned renten i den banken du har lånet i.
FINN BESTE BANK
Her finner du hvilken bank som gir deg best betingelser på boliglån. Tallene som er oppgitt er de beste rentesatsene som banken tilbyr. Det betyr at du kan få et dårligere tilbud enn det som står her. Alle landets banker er med.
Kalkulatoren finner den banken som gir deg høyest rente på det beløpet du velger. Du kan samtidig velge å ta med renten på noen utvalgte beløp.
Kalkulatoren skal brukes såfremt du bruker nettbanken til å betale giroer, overføre penger ol. Hvis du vil bruke tradisjonelle gireringstjenester (brevgiro,skranke ol), skal du bruke kalkulatoren Finn beste tradisjonelle brukskonto.
Kalkulatoren skal brukes såfremt du bruker tradisjonell måte på å betale giroer (brevgiro, skranke ol) på. Hvis du vil bruke nettbank som gireringsløsning, skal du bruke kalkulatoren Finn beste brukskonto. I denne kalkulatoren kan du legge inn tall som passer med ditt forbruksmønster. Tallene du legger inn skal være på årsbasis.
Her får du en liste over alle bankers bsu-rente. Alle landets banker er tatt med. Hvis du skriver inn et årlig BSU-sparebeløp, kan du se hva dette beløpet vokser til på et valgfritt antall år.
FINN BESTE FOND
Få hjelp til å velge riktig aksjefond. Denne kalkulatoren hjelper deg gjennom jungelen av fondsvalg.
Finn pengemarkedsfondet som passer for deg. Her kan du ta med fond som passer til bestemte kriterier du setter, samtidig som du kan kutte ut fond med for høyt minsteinnskudd for deg.
Finn obligasjonsfondet som passer for deg. Her kan du ta med fond som passer til bestemte kriterier du setter, samtidig som du kan kutte ut fond med for høyt minsteinnskudd for deg.
Finn kombinasjonsfondet som passer for deg. Her kan du ta med fond som passer til bestemte kriterier du setter, samtidig som du kan kutte ut fond med for høyt minsteinnskudd for deg.
Kalkulatoren gjelder for inntektsåret 2009. Du kan legge inn hovedtallene for inntekt og fradrag, og få beregnet skatten.
Det lønner seg å gå gjennom selvangivelsen. Ta Dine Pengers quiz og se om du vet hvilke fradragsmuligheter som finnes.
Ikke betal for mye i skatt. Hva kan du om skattereglene for inntektsåret 2009 som ligger til grunn for selvangivelsen våren 2010? Ta vår quiz.
Bruk kalkulatoren til å finne ut hvor mye mobil- og surfeskatt du må betale. Du får også råd om hvordan du kan tilpasse deg til den nye mobil- og surfeskatten, slik at du ikke betaler for mye i skatt.
Kalkulatoren gjelder for inntektsåret 2009. Du kan legge inn hovedtallene for inntekt og fradrag, og få beregnet skatten.
Hva betyr statsbudsjettet for deg? Her kan du finne ut hvilken effekt regjeringens skatteoppgjør for inntektsåret 2009 har for skatten din.
Kalkulatoren gjør en test på om du bør klage på ligningsverdien. Er ligningsverdien på over 30 % av markedsverdi har du rett til å få den nedsatt til dette nivået.
Bruk kalkulatoren til å finne ut hvor mye mobil- og surfeskatt du må betale. Du får også råd om hvordan du kan tilpasse deg til den nye mobil- og surfeskatten, slik at du ikke betaler for mye i skatt.
Kalkulatoren beregner den egentlige inntekten med utgangspunkt i tall som hentes fra Skattelistene på VG Nett.
Kalkulatoren beregner hva et sparebeløp vokser til etter et visst antall år. Beløpet regnes ut før og etter skatt, samt før og etter at inflasjon er tatt hensyn til.
Regner ut hva et sparebeløp vokser til ved ulike forutsetninger.
Kalkulatoren hjelper deg med å finne den beste bilordningen for deg. Det er spesielt viktig å være oppmerksom på at en kombinasjon av kjøregodtgjørelse og lønnskompensasjon kan være gunstigere enn å ha firmabil. Det er skatteregler i 2010 som er brukt her.
Kalkulatoren gir deg svaret på hvor mye du må betale i skatt for firmabilen. Reglene gjelder for 2010.
Regn ut hvor mye du må trene for at medlemskap på treningssenter skal lønne seg sammenlignet med klippekort eller drop-in/dagskort, eller en kombinasjon av de sistnevnte. Og sjekk hva som blir billigst for deg i en periode som du selv velger: Årsmedlemskap, 6-måneders medlemskap, månedlig medlemskap, helgemedlemskap, klippekort eller drop-in/dagskort på treningssenter.
Kalkulatoren hjelper deg å beregne forventet pensjonsformue fra obligatorisk tjenestepensjon med innskuddsordning (OTP-innskudd) når du går av med pensjon.
Kalkulatoren gir deg svaret på hvor mye du må betale i skatt for firmabilen. Reglene gjelder for 2009.
Kalkulatoren regner ut hva den ansatte koster i 2008. F.eks. beregnes feriepenger og arbeidsgiveravgift. Arbeidsgiveravgiften avhenger av avgiftssone og type næring. Kalkulatoren regner automatisk riktig arbeidsgiveravgift som gjelder i din kommune og for din næring.
Kalkulatoren beregner hvilken fordeling det skal være for barnets reiseutgifter, mellom bidragspliktige og bidragsmottager.
Kalkulatoren viser hva det koster å fyre med ulike oppvarmingskilder. Bruk kalkulatoren til å avgjøre hva du skal fyre med.
Her kan du gjøre dine egne beregninger på om det lønner seg å eie eller leie.
Regner ut årlige kostnader på bilholdet.
Kalkulatoren beregner hvor mye bonustapet på bilforsikringen koster deg i kroner.
Kalkulatoren hjelper deg til å avgjøre om du bør refinansiere eller ikke. Denne testen kan bare brukes når du sammenligner lån med flytende rente.
Kalkulatoren beregner hvor mye du kan testamentere bort.

description.hltext_display: Cynthia Kurtz: Manufacturing still a major force in the economy
description.content:
MANY people think that most manufacturing jobs have left Southern California. True, the sector has struggled and the number of jobs has declined.
Today, the San Gabriel Valley has 36,000 fewer manufacturing jobs then it did 10 years ago. While no longer the No. 1 job creator, manufacturing is still an important part of the San Gabriel Valley and Southern California economies, accounting for more than 56,000 of the 600,000-plus jobs in the region.
You may be wondering if these are the kind of jobs we really want here. You can forget those images of smoke stacks gushing black plumes. That isn't what manufacturing is about these days. Today, it's high-tech production jobs in clean, well-lit facilities. Wherever manufacturing is located, you will also find thriving research and development industries working hand in hand with manufacturers to continually develop and improve product lines.
Manufacturing produces good-paying jobs with average wages of around $46,000.
SCAG's chief economic adviser, the late Jack Kyser, spoke recently about how important manufacturing is to the Southern California economy.
Jack laid out a specific set of actions that the Legislature could and should take to help retain and expand the manufacturing sector and the accompanying research and development industry:
Restore the manufacturing investment credit
The California Legislature enacted a tax incentive to encourage manufacturing
in 1993. It expired in 2003. According to a study by Philip Romero, a professor of business administration at the University of Oregon, "Contrary to the critics of the MIC, it almost certainly did stimulate employment helping to slow the slide of manufacturing jobs in California from 1993 to 2002 by two-thirds compared to the U.S. trend."
Add $100 million to the State Infrastructure Bank for installation of pollution-reduction equipment
The industrial development bond program within the State Infrastructure Bank provides loans of up to $10 million to manufacturing and processing businesses for facilities and equipment. The loans are repaid by the business. This would be a great way to assist businesses in implementing AB 32 and have an incentive to remain in California rather then move out of the state to avoid the new regulations.
Create a group that would develop an expanded definition of "green" industries and work to retain and grow green businesses in California
Designate "enterprise counties" where unemployment exceeds 10 percent
California has designated 42 areas as economically distressed zones.
These proposals would not only help stop manufacturing from leaving but begin to attract these valuable jobs to California and the San Gabriel Valley. Cynthia Kurtz is the president and CEO of the San Gabriel Valley Economic Partnership. She be be reached at www.facebook.com/SGVEP.

description.hltext_display: Pune cops file FIR against abused woman's spouse
description.content:
The Vishrantwadi police on Tuesday lodged a first information report (FIR) against Prakash alias Nanabhau, the husband of Seema Lanke (32), his first wife and 12-year-old son.
DNA took the initiative in the case and highlighted her plight in its December 21 edition, after which the police lodged the FIR.
The deputy commissioner of police (zone IV), Sanjay Jadhav, confirmed to DNA that the FIR has been registered against the suspects. We will arrest the suspect. The nature of injuries is simple as per the hospitals report. The attempt to murder clause cannot be applied in the case, Jadhav added. Seema told DNA that she visited the police station on Tuesday at about 1 pm. The police initially asked me to come on Wednesday to register a complaint, claiming that the officer concerned was not present, she said. Later, on intervention of this newspaper, Jadhav directed the police officials to register the FIR. According to the police, the suspects allegedly caused hurt, wrongful confinement, breach of trust, bigamy, breach of peace, use of vulgar language and criminal intimidation.
The victim was allegedly beaten up by her husband and injuries inflicted with sharp weapons even on her private parts, which was confirmed during a medical
examination at the Sassoon General Hospital.
The woman, a resident of Kolwadi in Haveli, filed a complaint against Prakash with Lonikand police on September 13 and then again on December 16 with the Vishrantwadi police. But the police did not register the FIR for reasons best known
to them.
The victim mentioned in her complaint that her life is under threat from her husband and his first wife. She alleged that her husband hid the fact that he was married to another woman, Deepali, who actively supported Prakash in his misdeeds against Seema.

description.hltext_display: LA NOUVEAUTÉ SAAB 9-5, LE MODÈLE DE LA RENAISSANCE
description.content:
Article auto/moto n°2/22
LA NOUVEAUTÉ
SAAB 9-5, LE MODÈLE DE LA RENAISSANCE
Première création de la marque suédoise depuis son «sauvetage» par le néerlandais Spyker, la grande routière 9-5 allie tradition et innovation.
LE LOOK
Tant à l’extérieur qu’à l’intérieur, le design évoque l’héritage aéronautique du constructeur de Trollhättan: lignes fluides et pare-brise relevé, poste de conducteur et instrumentation aux airs de cockpit. Des matériaux et une finition de qualité couronnent l’impression de luxe et de confort moelleux.
LES MÉCANIQUES
Une belle palette de moteurs modernes et performants: deux 4- cylindres et un V6 à essence de 1,6 l/180 ch, 2 l/220 ch (aussi en version essence+éthanol E85) et 2,8 l/300 ch, ainsi que deux turbodiesels de 2 l pour 160 et 190 ch. Boîte manuelle ou automatique (seulement avec moteurs de 220 et 160 ch) à 6 vitesses. Traction avant ou intégrale (seulement avec moteurs de 190, 220 et 300 ch).
LES SPÉCIALITÉS
Longue de plus de 5 m, la 9-5 offre évidemment une habitabilité très généreuse devant comme derrière. Elle peut en outre recevoir, mais en options, des équipements pointus, comme l’affichage tête haute (dans le pare-brise) des principales informations, un châssis adaptatif, des phares directionnels et automatiques, l’aide au stationnement, une climatisation trizone, un système audio haut de gamme à 11 haut-parleurs ou encore un disque dur pour le stockage de la musique.
LA CONDUITE
Cette berline de classe moyenne supérieure se montre maniable, agile, sûre, confortable et plaisante à conduire, mais ses qualités de comportement s’optimalisent bien sûr avec la traction intégrale et le châssis adaptatif à trois positions.
LES DOTATIONS
Trois niveaux de finition armés au top pour la sécurité tant active que passive dès la base. Mais, côté dotations pour l’aide à la conduite et l’agrément, il faut le plus souvent passer par le catalogue des options, individuelles ou en packs, plutôt chères.
LES GARANTIES
Trois ans ou 100 000 km (prolongation possible moyennant supplément de prix jusqu’à cinq ans et 150 000 km), services d’entretien gratuits durant dix ans ou 100 000 km, douze ans contre la corrosion perforante, assistance en cas de panne durant toute la durée de vie du véhicule.
EN CHIFFRES
Performances: jusqu’à 6,9 s de 0 à 100 et 250 km/h en pointe (V6).
Consommations: jusqu’à 5,3 l/100 en parcours mixte et 139 g/km de CO2 (160 ch) selon le constructeur.
Mesures: 5 m 01 de long, 1 m 87 de large et 1 m 47 de haut; coffre de 513 l.
Prix: à partir de 49 500 fr.
Tags: auto, voiture, Saab 9-5

description.hltext_display: Obesity increases death risk in vehicle crashes
description.content:
Washington, Dec 22 (IANS) Obesity spells a higher death risk in severe vehicular crashes.
In a motor crash or collision, a moderately obese driver faces a 21 percent higher risk of death, while it is 56 percent more risky for the morbidly obese, says a study.
Dietrich Jehle, professor of emergency medicine at University at Buffalo, School of Medicine, led the study, the American Journal of Emergency Medicine reports.
Significantly, underweight and normal weight drivers were found to be at a higher risk of dying from a severe crash than slightly overweight drivers, according to a Buffalo statement.
'The severity and patterns of crash injuries depend on a complex interaction of biomechanical factors, including deceleration velocity at impact, seat belt and airbag use, vehicle type and weight and type of impact,' says Jehle.
'But the effect of body mass on crash outcome has not been previously evaluated in databases of adequate size or controlled for some of these confounding factors.'
'Crash test dummies have saved lives and provided invaluable data on how human bodies react to crashes, but they are designed to represent normal-weight individuals.'
'If they represented our overweight American society, there could be further improvements in vehicle design that could decrease mortality,' adds Jehle.
SEARCH

event_or_fact.property: The severity and patterns of crash injuries depend on a complex interaction of biomechanical factors, including deceleration velocity at impact, seat belt and airbag use, vehicle type and weight and type of impact; But the effect of body mass on crash out
Crash test dummies have saved lives and provided invaluable data on how human bodies react to crashes, but they are designed to represent normal-weight individuals.

description.hltext_display: Tourismusverein erhöht Beiträge
description.content:
Hagnau (up) Markus Arnold, seit 2009 Kassierer des Hagnauer Tourismusvereins, hat die Kassenführung voll im Griff. Das bestätigten dem Abwesenden die beiden Kassenprüfer Franz Gutemann und Roland Gotterbarm.
Hagnau (up) Markus Arnold, seit 2009 Kassierer des Hagnauer Tourismusvereins, hat die Kassenführung voll im Griff. Das bestätigten dem Abwesenden die beiden Kassenprüfer Franz Gutemann und Roland Gotterbarm.
In seinem Bericht plädierte Gotterbarm flammend für den Gebrauch der Einzugsermächtigung: „Ihr glaubt gar nicht, was die Einzelüberweisungen einen Kassierer an Zeit kosten, und das bei seiner ehrenamtlichen Tätigkeit, das muss doch nicht sein.“ Wegen insgesamt guter Amtsführung wurde der Vorstand einstimmig entlastet. Dass die Kasse ein dickes Minus zu verzeichnen hatte, lag vor allem an der Beschaffung von Schaukästen (2000 Euro) und am Sponsoring für das Silvesterkonzert (1000 Euro). Nicht zuletzt deshalb kam vom Vorstand der Vorschlag, die schon seit D-Mark-Zeiten stabilen Mitgliedsbeiträge von 20 Euro auf 30 Euro zu erhöhen, was immerhin Mehreinnahmen von rund 1500 Euro bringen sollte. Dieser Vorschlag wurde mit großer Mehrheit angenommen. Im Mittelpunkt der Sitzung standen naturgemäß die Bilanz des laufenden und die Vorschau auf das kommende Jahr (der SÜDKURIER berichtete). Nur knapp über 40 Mitglieder hatten an diesem äußerst verschneiten Abend den Weg ins Gwandhaus gefunden und freuten sich über einen trotz umfangreicher Tagesordnung flotten Ablauf.

description.hltext_display: LE DOSSIER AUTO DE «L’ILLUSTRÉ» LE TEST AUTO: LA MINI COOPER 4x4
description.content:
Article auto/moto n°1/22
LE DOSSIER AUTO DE «L’ILLUSTRÉ»
LE TEST AUTO: LA MINI COOPER 4x4
Le pilote moto GREGORY JUNOD et le journaliste sportif PIERRE-ALAIN DUPUIS ont découvert la Mini Cooper en version 4x4. Avec beaucoup de plaisir.
«Une voiture de légende qui a son prix»
GREGORY JUNOD
Quatrième du Championnat du monde d’endurance 2010, le jeune pilote vaudois Gregory Junod a jugé la Mini Countryman en professionnel. Priorité aux aspects techniques: «Excellent moteur, motricité remarquable, comportement agréable mais un peu soft, conduite très plaisante. Pour le reste, design sympa, intérieur magnifique, avec un bémol: les commandes des accessoires (vitres, etc.), rassemblées sur la console centrale devant le levier de vitesses, sont si serrées qu’on les confond facilement.»
Gregory a bien sûr montré le bijou à ses copains, qui l’ont trouvé cher. «Pas moi. Une Mini est une voiture de légende. Elle a son prix!»
J’AI AIMÉ
UN PEU
«Le châssis, confortable mais un brin mou.»
BEAUCOUP
«La puissance, la vigueur et le couple du moteur.»
PASSIONNÉMENT
«La traction intégrale, que l’on sent et maîtrise très bien.»
PAS DU TOUT
«Les freins, pas assez agressifs à mon goût.»
«Le top pour la frime, mais le piège»
PIERRE-ALAIN DUPUIS
Au milieu de la cinquantaine, le journaliste sportif de la TSR a définitivement acquis la sagesse au volant: «Je roule très raisonnable, en Opel Meriva. J’ai assez donné dans les retraits de permis!» Mais il n’a pas boudé son plaisir en retrouvant les sensations de la conduite sportive et dynamique, au volant de la Mini Countryman. «Un vrai bonheur de piloter ce petit bolide. Tenue de route, moteur, précision, on se délecte. Et le look! Le top pour la frime, mais aussi le piège. On devient vite accro.
Ce n’est plus de mon âge. Je dois trop me contrôler! Mais j’ai quand même eu beaucoup de peine à rendre cette voiture…»
J’AI AIMÉ
UN PEU
«Les sièges. Confortables mais pas assez moulés; on glisse de côté.»
BEAUCOUP
«Le look, vraiment très sympa.»
PASSIONNÉMENT
«La conduite, le comportement, les sensations, un vrai régal!»
PAS DU TOUT
«La pléthore d’options et de boutons. On s’y perd.»
MINI COOPER S COUNTRYMAN ALL4
MOTEUR: 4-cylindres à essence turbo de 1,6 l/184 ch. Boîte manuelle à six vitesses. Traction intégrale permanente.
PERFORMANCES: 7,9 s de 0 à 100 et 210 km/h en pointe.
CONSOMMATION: 6,7 l aux 100 en parcours mixte selon constructeur; 157 g/km de CO2.
DIMENSIONS (long/larg/haut): 4 m 11/1 m 79/1 m 56.
PRIX: 39 400 fr.
GARANTIES: deux ans sans limitation de kilométrage et avec assistance, douze ans contre la corrosion.
N'hésitez pas à demander des précisions à notre journaliste!

description.content: The competitive spirit of the ancient Greek cities of Sparta, Athens and Corinth was celebrated in Harmony Elementary School's gym recently as second-graders participated in their own Olympics.

description.hltext_display: UK offers troops, EU seeks answers for snow chaos
description.content:
LONDON -- The snow was melting off London's streets, but Heathrow Airport told infuriated passengers it won't restore full service until Thursday - five days after a five-inch snowfall turned hundreds of thousands of holiday plans into a nightmare of canceled flights and painful nights sleeping on terminal floors.
Travelers' anger boiled over into politics as Britain's prime minister offered to put troops on snow-clearing duty and Europe's top transport official threatened tougher regulation of airports unable to cope with wintry weather.
"It's pathetic - you would think this is a Third World country," said 29-year-old Janice Phillips, who was trying to get back to Minneapolis. She sat next to her sleeping boyfriend, his head propped against a backpack, his mouth ajar. "All they've been talking about was this snow forecast. You would think the government could do a better job."
People queue for the Eurostar cross-Channel train, as an information board announces severe delays to train traffic due to snow and freezing temperatures, at Gare du Nord station in Paris, Tuesday, Dec. 21, 2010. Snow and freezing temperatures continued to cause holiday travel chaos Monday for road, rail and air passengers in Europe after a weekend of disruption.
- Jacques Brinon /AP Photo
Workmen take suitcases off a train stranded outside Huntingdon Railway station in Cambridgeshire, England as East Coast trains from London King's Cross were canceled Tuesday Dec. 21, 2010. Major delays and cancellations persisted Tuesday at European airports including London's Heathrow, and on the Eurostar train link, leaving thousands stranded across Europe as Christmas approached. (AP Photo/ Chris Radburn/PA Wire) UNITED KINGDOM OUT NO SALES NO ARCHIVE
- Chris Radburn /AP
People queue for the Eurostar cross-Channel train, as an information board, unseen, announces severe delays to train traffic due to snow and freezing temperatures, at Gare du Nord station in Paris, Tuesday, Dec. 21, 2010. Snow and freezing temperatures continued to cause holiday travel chaos Monday for road, rail and air passengers in Europe after a weekend of disruption.
- Jacques Brinon /AP Photo
People queue for the Eurostar cross-Channel train, as an information board, unseen, announces severe delays to train traffic due to snow and freezing temperatures, at Gare du Nord station in Paris, Tuesday, Dec. 21, 2010. Snow and freezing temperatures continued to cause holiday travel chaos Monday for road, rail and air passengers in Europe after a weekend of disruption.
- Jacques Brinon /AP Photo
Passengers queue as they wait to check-in for their flights outside Terminal 3 of Heathrow Airport in London, Tuesday, Dec. 21, 2010. Major delays and cancellations persisted Tuesday at European airports including London's Heathrow, and on the Eurostar train link, leaving thousands stranded across Europe as Christmas approached. Predicted snowfall at Heathrow did not materialize overnight, allowing cleanup crews to intensify their work, but more than half the flights at Europe's busiest international hub were expected to be canceled.
- Matt Dunham /AP Photo
Hundreds of people queue outside St Pancras Station in London for the Eurostar train to France and Belgium Tuesday Dec. 21, 2010. Major delays and cancellations persisted Tuesday at European airports including London's Heathrow, and on the Eurostar train link, leaving thousands stranded across Europe as Christmas approached. (AP Photo/ Lewis Whyld/PA Wire) UNITED KINGDOM OUT NO SALES NO ARCHIVE
- Lewis Whyld /AP
A young girl cries as passengers queue up whilst waiting to check-in for their flights outside Terminal 3 of Heathrow Airport in London, Tuesday, Dec. 21, 2010. Major delays and cancellations persisted Tuesday at European airports including London's Heathrow, and on the Eurostar train link, leaving thousands stranded across Europe as Christmas approached. Predicted snowfall at Heathrow did not materialize overnight, allowing cleanup crews to intensify their work, but more than half the flights at Europe's busiest international hub were expected to be canceled.
- Matt Dunham /AP Photo

description.hltext_display: Afghan official rebukes NATO for civilian deaths
description.content:
KABUL, Afghanistan -- An Afghan provincial governor says NATO needs to exert greater caution in its operations following the death of five civilians during a battle with insurgents.
The office of the governor of Helmand province said in a statement Wednesday that the five civilians killed during the clash a day earlier included three women and two children. NATO says it is investigating the deaths, which Afghan officials say occurred during a Taliban raid on an Afghan national police checkpoint.
Afghan officials have repeatedly spoken out about civilian deaths, arguing that the international forces are not being careful enough to avoid such casualties as the war nears its tenth year. Insurgents also try to use the civilian death toll as a way of rallying support for their cause.
A Marine carry team carries the transfer case containing the remains of Marine Cpl. Eric M. Torbert of Lancaster, Pa., upon arrival at Dover Air Force Base, Del. on Tuesday, Dec. 21, 2010. The Department of Defense announced the death of Marine Cpl. Eric M. Torbert who was supporting Operation Enduring Freedom in Afghanistan.
- Jose Luis Magana /AP Photo

description.hltext_display: Stark challenges ahead for Iraq's new government
description.content:
BAGHDAD -- Iraq seated a freely elected government Tuesday after nine months of haggling, bringing together the main ethnic and religious groups in a fragile balance that could make it difficult to rebuild a nation devastated by war as American troops prepare for their final withdrawal.
One of the government's first priorities will be to decide whether to ask the Obama administration to keep thousands of U.S. soldiers in Iraq after their scheduled departure in December 2011.
Prime Minister Nouri al-Maliki's new government solidifies the grip that Shiites have held on political power since Saddam Hussein's ouster. It leaves open the question of whether the country's disgruntled Sunni minority will play a meaningful role.
Iraq's Prime Minister Nouri al-Maliki sits, before submitting his new government for approval to the Iraq parliament in Baghdad, Iraq, Tuesday, Dec. 21, 2010. Iraqi lawmakers unanimously approved on Tuesday a new government to be headed by incumbent Shiite Prime Minister Nouri al-Maliki, ending nine months of political deadlock that threatened to stall economic development and suck the country back into sectarian violence.
- Karim Kadim /AP Photo
FILE - In this March 26, 2010 file photo, Iraqi Prime Minister Nouri al- Maliki speaks to the press in Baghdad, Iraq. Al-Maliki, 60, was first installed as prime minister as a compromise candidate in 2006 but barely hung onto the job this year when his political coalition fell short of winning the most seats in national elections. Iraqi Prime Minister Nouri al-Maliki overcame last-minute bickering within his fragile coalition Monday Dec. 20, 2010 and submitted a list of his new Cabinet, possibly clearing the final hurdle to seating a government more than nine months after national elections.
- Hadi Mizban, File /AP Photo

description.hltext_display: Death toll from Mexico crude-oil blast rises to 29
description.content:
MEXICO CITY -- The death toll from a massive crude-oil explosion that laid waste to parts of a central Mexican city has risen to 29.
Authorities in Puebla state say they located the remains of a baby in the arms of one of the other 28 victims.
Sunday's blast in San Martin Texmelucan, believed to be caused by oil thieves, also injured 52 and damaged or destroyed 115 homes.
People bury a victim of the oil pipeline explosion in a cemetery in San Geronimo, Mexico, Monday Dec. 20, 2010. The Sunday explosion in the nearby town of San Martin Texmelucan laid waste to parts of the central Mexican city, incinerating people, cars, houses and trees as gushing crude turned streets into flaming rivers. At least 28 people were killed, 13 of them children, in a disaster authorities blame on oil thieves.
- Alexandre Meneghini /AP Photo
People stand by coffins containing the remains of people killed by the oil pipeline explosion during a mass at a church in San Martin Texmelucan, Mexico, Monday Dec. 20, 2010. The Sunday explosion in San Martin Texmelucan laid waste to parts of the central Mexican city, incinerating people, cars, houses and trees as gushing crude turned streets into flaming rivers. At least 28 people were killed, 13 of them children, in a disaster authorities blame on oil thieves.
- Alexandre Meneghini /AP Photo

description.hltext_display: Muere Enzo Bearzot, el seleccionador que hizo a Italia campeona del mundo en España 1982
description.author: dpa, roma
description.content:
fútbol
Muere Enzo Bearzot, el seleccionador que hizo a Italia campeona del mundo en España 1982
También histórico como jugador en el Inter de Milán y el Torino, dirigió a la 'azurra' en 104 partidos y dos mundiales. Tenía 83 años.
Enzo Bearzot, en la época que dirigía a la selección italiana. / AFP Photo
El legendario ex seleccionador italiano Enzo Bearzot ha muerto a la edad de 83 años, según anunció la Federación Italiana de Fútbol (FIGC).
Bearzot llevó a los azzurri al título mundial en España 1982, donde se impuso en la final por 3-1 a Alemania. Anteriormente técnico del Inter de Milán, el entrenador italiano asumió el mando de la selección en 1975 y la dirigió hasta 1986. En total se sentó en 104 partidos internacionales en el banco italiano. Ningún otro técnico estuvo tantas veces al frente del equipo nacional italiano como Il Vecchio (El viejo), como llamaban los hinchas a Bearzot.
"Fue uno de los grandes de Italia", dijo el ex delantero internacional Paolo Rossi, que bajo el mando de Bearzot fue el máximo goleador del Mundial de 1982. "Fue como un padre para mí. Sin él no hubiera conseguido lo que logré".
Guiseppe Bergomi, que con 18 años formó parte del exitoso equipo mundialista, subrayó: "Fue el tipo de entrenador que infundía gran confianza en uno mismo".
También el primer ministro italiano, Silvio Berlusconi, mostró respeto por Bearzot. El mandatario, dueño del Milan, gran rival del Inter, elogió al ex seleccionador como "uno de los entrenadores inolvidables del equipo nacional".
"Con su capacidad, en 1982 unificó un grupo de jugadores que ganaron el tercer título mundial para Italia", añadió Berlusconi en un comunicado.
Nacido el 27 de septiembre de 1927 en Aiello, al noreste de Italia, Bearzot jugó como centrocampista en el Inter de Milán (1949- 1951, 1956-1957), el Catania (1951-1954) y el Torino (1954-1956 y 1957-1964). Fue internacional en una sola ocasión, en 1955.
En el Mundial de Argentina 1978 y en la Eurocopa de 1980 en Italia, los azzurri sólo consiguieron dos cuartos lugares. El gran éxito llegó en 1982 en España.
Tras una discreta ronda previa con tres empates contra Polonia (0- 0), Perú (1-1) y Camerún (1-1), llegaron las sorprendentes victorias sobre Argentina (2-1) y Brasil (3-2). En la final, Italia derrotó a Alemania por 3-1.
Dos años más tarde, el equipo ni siquiera consiguió clasificarse para la fase final de la Eurocopa. Cuando en el Mundial de 1986 sólo logró llegar a octavos de final, Bearzot dimitió.
Sus críticos le echaron en cara aferrarse en exceso a los jugadores de 1982. De 2002 a 2005 volvió otra vez a la Federación Italiana como jefe del departamento técnico.

description.hltext_display: 【独家】摘掉产能过剩帽子 多晶硅项目审批松绑
description.content:
经济观察网 记者 刘伟勋 2009年第四季度以来被政府部门严格控制新增产能的多晶硅行业，即将获得松绑。接近政府部门的人士向本网透露，有关部门对于国内新建和扩建的多晶硅项目将逐步放开，但审批上将设定一定的门槛，对拟上马的项目将区别对待。
2009年8月26日召开的国务院常务会议上，风电、多晶硅等新兴产业被认为出现重复建设倾向。去年9月26日国务院发布的38号文《国务院转发发改委等部门关于抑制部分行业产能过剩和重复建设引导产业健康发展的若干意见》中指出，我国多晶硅在建产能约8万吨，产能已明显过剩。文件要求严格控制在能源短缺、电价较高的地区新建多晶硅项目，对缺乏配套综合利用、环保不达标的多晶硅项目不予核准或备案；
在上述文件指导下，去年第四季度以来，政府部门批准的多晶硅项目极少。与此同时，受国外光伏发电市场回暖的拉动，我国光伏电池行业2010年保持迅猛发展，位于上游的多晶硅行业一直处于供不应求的状态。
国家发改委能源研究所一位专家提供的数据显示，2009年我国光伏发电电池生产消耗了3万吨多晶硅，我国只生产了1.6万吨，仅能满足需要的50%。另据海关统计数据，今年1-9月份我国共进口多晶硅31503吨，全年进口量预计将突破4万吨以上，市场缺口仍然较大。
业内人士分析，我国大量进口多晶硅的主要原因，一方面是国内规划的产能并没有全部建成，实际产量无法满足市场需求；另一方面则是国内生产的一部分多晶硅质量稳定性有待提高，尚无法替代进口产品。
根据本网记者此前的了解，工信部的调研显示，尽管多晶硅规划产能超过了8万吨，但产能建成率只有55%左右，而实际产能利用率则更低，只有25.8%。截至2009年9月，全国已投产的多晶硅生产企业仅有十几家，仅占规划总量的24.6%。
据了解，科技部今年也对国内多晶硅行业进行了调研，发现不少多晶硅企业通过技术进步，其生产能耗和成本都有明显下降。同时，行业内没有出现产能过剩，而是供不应求，预计今年国内生产光伏电池所需的多晶硅约有一半需要依靠进口。
业内预计，2011年尽管德国光伏上网电价进行下调，但全球光伏发电市场仍有望保持20%左右的增长，加上中国"金太阳"工程和大型光伏电站建设对国内市场的拉动，明年我国对多晶硅的需求仍较为旺盛，大量多晶硅仍需进口。
前述接近政府部门的人士表示，鉴于多晶硅市场的实际发展状况，未来有关部门在多晶硅项目的审批上会逐步放开，既不会像过去一段时间"一刀切"全部叫停，也不会简单地全部放开，而是区别对待，促进行业的健康发展。
据了解，在多晶硅方面，政府部门未来将鼓励和扶持企业采用新的生产技术，严格控制成本高的西门子法。
（本网记者张向东对此文亦有贡献）

description.hltext_display: Family's triple tragedy highlights Mexico impunity
description.content:
CIUDAD JUAREZ, Mexico -- A daughter is found dismembered. Her mother is shot dead trying to bring the killer to justice. Two days later, a brother-in-law's body is dumped on the street after his lumber business is torched.
No one is under arrest for any of the crimes, and there is little hope the cases will be solved. The tragedies befalling an extended family in Ciudad Juarez lay bare the lawlessness that plagues not only Mexico's most violent city, but the entire country.
The case of Marisela Escobedo Ortiz, slain last week as she demanded justice for her dead daughter outside the Chihuahua state governor's office, has gripped the country. President Felipe Calderon, kidnap victim Diego Fernandez de Cevallos and even the Sinaloa drug cartel have all weighed in; Fernandez de Cevallos spoke about Escobedo just hours after he was released by his captors Monday from his own seven-month ordeal.
Human rights activists hang a sign on the wall of the state prosecutors office to protest the killing of Marisela Escobedo Ortiz in Ciudad Juarez, Mexico, Friday Dec. 17, 2010. Escobedo, who had been protesting for three days in front of the governor's office in Chihuahua city to demand justice for her slain daughter, was shot in the head Thursday by unknown assailants in front of the governor's office, authorities said Friday. The body of Escobedo's daughter, Rubi Frayre Escobedo, was found burned and dismembered in a trash bin in Ciudad Juarez on June 18, 2009 after she went missing for nearly a year.
- Raymundo Ruiz /AP Photo

description.hltext_display: Avery plant voted among best in North America
description.author: Erick Galindo
description.content:
PASADENA - An Avery Dennison office products manufacturing plant in Tijuana, Mexico is one of the 10 best plants in North America, according to IndustryWeek magazine's year-end rankings.
"Tijuana is a model of a continuously learning organization," Greg Temple, Avery's vice president of global operations, said in a statement. "They have overcome significant business challenges over the years through a relentless focus on waste and process discipline, and IndustryWeek's recognition is very gratifying."
The Tijuana plant was one of three manufacturing plants on the list that were not located in the United States. One other Mexican plant and a Canadian plant were also on the list. IndustryWeek will honor the Tijuana team during a ceremony this April in Atlanta and will feature the facility in its January issue, which is now available online. The competition is in its 21st year. Previous recent winners include Raytheon, Philips and Lockheed Martin.
Each year, a panel of the magazine's editors and outside experts recognize North American facilities that are on the leading edge of efforts to increase competitiveness, enhance customer satisfaction and create stimulating and rewarding work environments.
This year, Avery's plant, which manufactures Avery brand office products, stood out from other entries for its consistently high quality, rigorous maintenance and safety results, and its use of "enterprise lean sigma" to create efficiencies,
improve productivity and increase customer satisfaction.
The plant achieved nearly $6 million in documented improvement projects in 2009, and gained a total of 310,000 square feet over the last five years through ELS initiatives.
IndustryWeek also highlighted the number of employee suggestions and cited the example of production worker Azucena Robles, who proposed using a compressed air gun at a strategic point on the assembly line for Avery Glue Stics to keep the line moving while label applicators are refilled.

description.hltext_display: Rights court rules for 2 Mexican environmentalists
description.content:
MEXICO CITY -- Mexico says it will abide by an Inter-American Court of Human Rights ruling that the government violated the rights of two anti-logging activists arrested in 1999.
The Costa Rica-based court says the government should pay $27,500 apiece to activists Teodoro Cabrera and Rodolfo Montiel.
It also says Mexico should investigate claims the men were tortured, punish those responsible and institute training and rights programs to avoid future violations.

description.hltext_display: Paucity or profiteering in Nashik?
description.content:
The wholesale price of onions at the Lasalgaon market in Nashik dropped by Rs1,000 per quintal on Tuesday.
At the Lasalgaon agriculture produce marketing committee (APMC), onions fetched a high rate of Rs5,200 per quintal as against Rs6,299 on Monday.
Never before have onions been sold at such high prices in the 63-year-old market. At Wambori, the wholesale market drop in the prices of onions was more significant. The commodity, which was sold at an-all time high of Rs15,200 per quintal dropped to Rs8,000 per quintal on Tuesday.
Apparently, unseasonal rains in November damaged about 50% of the winter crop of onions, reducing the quantity of its arrival in wholesale markets in Nashik and Ahmednagar. The daily supply in the wholesale market in Nashik has been reduced by about 30%, claimed traders. However, the vice president of the National Agriculture Federation for Export Development (Nafed), Changdeorao Holkar, blamed a section of traders and agents for the sudden rise in the price of onions. No doubt there is a shortage of good variety of onions in the market. But traders and agents have created the impression of a huge scarcity and are making quick money, he alleged.

event_or_fact.property: But traders and agents have created the impression of a huge scarcity and are making quick money
National Agriculture Federation for Export Development

description.hltext_display: China Stocks: China Nonferrous Metal, Hubei Yihua, Zijin Mining
description.author: Bloomberg News
description.content:
The Shanghai Composite Index, which tracks the bigger of Chinas stock exchanges, fell 26.22, or 0.9 percent, to 2,877.90 at the 3 p.m. close. The CSI 300 Index declined 1.1 percent to 3,215.45. Stock symbols are in parentheses after company names.
China Nonferrous Metal Industrys Foreign Engineering and Construction Co. (000758 CH) added 1.9 percent to 33 yuan after saying it signed a deal worth 4.9 billion yuan ($736.6 million) with an Iranian company to build an aluminum smelter with an annual production capacity of 155,000 metric tons.
Hubei Yihua Chemical Industry Co. (000422 CH), Asias largest fertilizer producer, rose 0.8 percent to 20.12 yuan, a fourth day of gains. The company will invest 33 billion yuan in a coal chemical project in the Xinjiang region during the next five years, the China Daily said, citing Chairman Jiang Yuanhua.
Shenzhen Changhong Mold Technology Co. (300151 CH), a mold manufacturer, climbed 31 percent from its offer price to 44.49 yuan on the first day of trading in Shenzhen.
Zijin Mining Group Co. (601899 CH), Chinas largest gold producer, lost 1.4 percent to 8.36 yuan. The 21st Business Herald reported that the Guangdong provincial government punished 36 officials including Zijin Mining managers for a fatal dam collapse in September. Calls to Zijin company secretary Zheng Yuqiang were not answered.

event_or_fact.property: The company will invest 33 billion yuan in a coal chemical project in the Xinjiang region during the next five years, the China Daily

description.hltext_display: Filipino gunmen free 2 Malaysians after 10 months
description.content:
MANILA, Philippines -- Filipino gunmen with ties to al-Qaida-linked militants, under pressure from pursuing police commandos, have freed two Malaysian laborers from 10 months of jungle captivity, police said Wednesday.
The hostages were seized Feb. 8 from a seaweed farm in Malaysia's Sabah state and whisked away in a speedboat to nearby Philippine waters in a pattern similar to past kidnappings-for-ransom blamed on the notorious terrorist group Abu Sayyaf.
Police commandos, who have been searching for the captives, recovered the two men near Bongao town in the southernmost island province of Tawi-Tawi late Tuesday, national police chief Raul Bacalzo told reporters.
A police officer shows the way to Malaysian national Lai Wong Chun, center, and Chen Yui Chung as they step out of an ambulance at the police hospital Wednesday, Dec. 22, 2010 in suburban Quezon City, north of Manila, Philippines. Filipino gunmen with ties to al-Qaida linked militants have freed the two Malaysian laborers from 10 months of jungle captivity.
- Pat Roque /AP Photo
Malaysian national Lai Wong Chun second right and Chen Yui Chung second left, step out of an ambulance at the police hospital Wednesday, Dec. 22, 2010 in suburban Quezon City north of Manila, Philippines. Filipino gunmen with ties to al-Qaida linked militants have freed the two Malaysian laborers from 10 months of jungle captivity.
- Pat Roque /AP Photo
He said the gunmen abandoned the hostages after they were encircled by government forces. The kidnappers escaped and the Malaysians, Chen Yui Chung, 48, and Lai Wong Chun, 46, were flown to Manila. They will be turned over to the Malaysian Embassy after being debriefed by Philippine authorities and checked up in a hospital at police headquarters in the capital.
Wearing baseball caps, the two appeared to have lost weight as they walked into a hospital emergency room from an ambulance. One wore combat boots. Policemen kept journalists and photographers from coming near.
Interior Secretary Jessie Robredo said the two told him they were not harmed by their captors and were fed well.
"Thank you very much," Robredo quoted the Malaysians as repeatedly telling officials.
"We're all so happy. This is the best Christmas gift to their families," Robredo told The Associated Press.
The kidnappers had demanded ransom but Robredo said he was unaware of any payment, as was the case with past abductions.
Malaysian and Philippine authorities were initially unsure if the hostages were still in Malaysia or the southern Philippines, where the Abu Sayyaf and other Muslim rebel groups have carried out kidnappings for ransom.
Officials in Tawi-Tawi, about 620 miles (1,000 kilometers) southwest of Manila, had ordered a search in the far-flung province in June after police monitored a cell phone call made by one of the captives to his family in Malaysia, according to a Philippine security official.
The official, who helped oversee the search, declined to be named because he was not authorized to talk to the media.
"They were brought from Tawi-Tawi to Jolo and back and we did not know where to look for them," Tawi-Tawi Gov. Sadikul Sahali said.
Chen Yui Chung's brother-in-law, Chong Man Tung, told The Associated Press in June that his relative had called him weeks after the abduction saying the two were being held by gunmen on an unspecified Philippine island.
The kidnappers apparently had moved the captives from Tawi-Tawi to nearby Jolo Island and back to evade the Philippine military and police manhunt, the security official said.
The Abu Sayyaf has gained notoriety for high-profile kidnappings, beheadings and bomb attacks. Battle setbacks, arrests and surrenders have reduced the group's strength to more than 300 from more than 1,000 guerrillas during its heyday in 2000, the military says.
That year the militants abducted 21 Asian workers and Western tourists from Malaysia's Sipadan diving resort and brought them to Jolo. They were freed in batches in exchange for huge ransoms.
Hundreds of U.S. troops have been providing weapons, training and intelligence to Philippine forces in the south for years to help eradicate the Abu Sayyaf, which is on Washington's list of terrorist organizations.

description.hltext_display: SKorea begins routine naval drills amid tension
description.content:
SEOUL, South Korea -- South Korea has begun annual naval exercises off its east coast as tensions with North Korea remain high.
The drills beginning Wednesday and ending Saturday are on the opposite coast from the disputed sea border where North Korea shelled a front-line island a month ago.
But South Korea's military is on high alert following firing exercises from the island Monday.
