description.hltext_display: 胡錦濤：政改通過政制邁前 積極評價曾蔭權工作
description.content:
國家主席胡錦濤在北京中南海，接見行政長官曾蔭權，聽取述職報告。胡錦濤說，中央政府對曾蔭權及特區政府過去一年所做的大量工作積極評價，期望特區政府在新的一年，繼續執行不斷奮發進取的施政理念。
胡錦濤指，香港在過去一年，克服國際金融危機帶來的不利條件，2012年的行政長官及立法會產生辦法條例草案，獲得立法會通過，香港的政制發展，沿著基本法既定的軌道，向前邁出一步。
曾蔭權感謝中央大力支持，表示香港成功應對外圍經濟的衝擊，經濟逐步復甦。此外，通過了2012政改方案，終止了連綿10多年的政治爭拗，為未來邁向普選，踏出重要一步。

description.hltext_display: How Dreamtime Healing Can Change Your Life
description.content:
Holographic Kinetics is an Aboriginal healing system based on traditional Dreamtime Healing. My teacher Steve Richards is an Australian Aboriginal descendant who could remember all the ancient teachings of his culture when he was a child. He then spent over forty years studying quantum physics, mathematics and other healing modalities so that he could put this knowledge into a practical healing system.
During a Holographic Kinetics process the practitioner communicates with the client's spirit to find the cause of the issue they want to resolve. The client is then guided back in time to the very cause of that issue so that they can see what happened and clear out the resulting stored emotions and thoughts from the body. In that same dimension of space and time the client then creates a healthier and happier scene and locks those resulting positive emotions and free flowing energy into the space which was cleared. These negative thoughts and emotions that were trapped in the body would have been causing the client to attract similar situations in their life. So by clearing them out the client is then free to create new life experiences.
Based on Fibonacci mathematics, Holographic Kinetics recognises that the past plus the present equals the future. So by changing what happened in the past, we are changing the present, and creating a more positive future.
If the issue came down the genetic line we clear the cause by accessing the spirit of the person that it came from, through the client's body. We then have the ancestor go back in time to the cause of this issue, see it, clear it out and change it to a more positive experience.
The issue could also be caused by inter-dimensional interference such as entities, human spirits or other forces, which may have entered the person's field through drugs, alcohol, trauma or other reasons in this life or a past life, or which could have been passed down genetically.
We clear these forces by calling the interference to surface through the client's body, and then read it its rights, which are based on Lore (universal law). We understand that under universal law this invading force has no right to be in the field of another. So once the rights have been read, and the dimension where it entered has been cleared, it can no longer remain in the body and so is forced to leave.
Once the client releases these forces and the trapped emotions and thoughts have been cleared, the effects they were causing will simply disappear and the client will experience balance and harmony.
HK has shown excellent results with issues such as depression, fear, trauma, physical pain, obsessive compulsive disorders, voices in the head and other mental disturbances, drug or alcohol dependency or addiction, emotional, sexual or physical abuse, post-traumatic stress disorder, relationship and communication breakdowns, and many other issues and ailments. Many major difficulties people encounter within their lives can be brought back into balance with as little as one HK session. This healing treatment serves to free the spirit to be happy again; to be empowered, at peace, and present in the moment.
For more information visit www.healingthroughtime.com or www.holographickinetics.net

description.hltext_display: Richmond to Bid on 2015 UCI Road World Championships
description.author: those who already live here
description.content:
release by the City of Richmond
December 21, 2010 (Richmond, VA) - Mayor Dwight C. Jones today announced the city of Richmonds desire to host the 2015 UCI World Road Cycling Championships. Richmond will represent the United States bid for the nine-day event. The World Championships attract more than 300,000 onsite spectators and is viewed by a global television audience of more than 300 million people. The 2010 Championships, held in Melbourne, Australia, generated tens of millions of dollars in economic impact to the host city.
The UCI Road World Championships attracts athletes from more than 70 nations across five continents. The series of road races and time trials for men and women represents the most important road cycling event in the world for participating countries. More than 1,000 cyclists compete to wear the coveted world champion's "arc en ciel, or rainbow jersey.
This is a tremendous opportunity for the United States, and the city of Richmond in particular, said Mayor Jones. Our city is centrally located and easy to access, offers great lodging and tourist attractions, and is a strong supporter of athletic and cultural events. There is no better place for the 2015 World Road Cycling Championships than right here in Richmond, Virginia.
Richmonds bid is supported by USA Cycling, the governing body for all disciplines of competitive cycling in the U.S.
"Richmonds efforts to bring cyclings marquee event back to American soil will not only be an opportunity to showcase one of the countrys most historic arenas to the world, but will also give hundreds of thousands of cycling fans in the Mid-Atlantic region the opportunity to witness the worlds best compete in one of the worlds most popular sports, said Steve Johnson, CEO of USA Cycling, who was present at todays announcement.
The bidding process for the prestigious event is highly competitive. If successful in its bid, Richmond will join cities including Rome, Madrid, Copenhagen and Florence that have hosted or will host the event. The winning city will be announced at the 2011 UCI Road World Championships and Annual World Congress in Copenhagen in September 2011.
To view a recording of the webcast announcement, visit richmond2015.com.
About Richmond, Va.
Richmond is an economically progressive city and Virginia's capital, offering a wealth of amenities not easily found among other East Coast municipalities. Richmond's complete livability can be measured in numerous ways
- beautiful neighborhoods with striking architecture
- a vast cultural and educational heritage befitting its more than 200,000 citizens
- noted historic prestige tracing back to the early English settlers
Nationally recognized for its vitality and New Economy embrace, Richmond's diversified employment base extends from chemical, food and tobacco manufacturing to biotechnology, semiconductors and high-tech fibers. The city consistently ranks among "Best Places to Live and Work in America" in several national publications.
Richmond is among a handful of mid-sized cities to offer a flourishing cultural community enhanced by several first-class museums and prominent universities, its own symphony, professional ballet and opera, and numerous theater companies and art galleries.
Richmond is centrally located on the East Coast of the U.S. and within a day drive of more than half of the U.S. population. While offering easy access to the ocean, mountains and Washington, D.C., Richmond features countless pastimes at home. Trendy boutiques and restaurants, numerous sports and entertainment attractions, outdoor pursuits among one of the nation's largest river park systems, and a treasure trove of historic landmarks provide fun times galore.
For the five million who visit each year, Richmond is increasingly recognized for many distinguished yet unheralded qualities long enjoyed by those who already live here. Next: Previous:

description.hltext_display: 足协年终为新班子打分 不称职中层干部或被调岗
description.content:
临近年底，中国足协新班子要进行考核过关。
昨天，记者从中国足协获悉，本周五足协将对中层以上领导进行年终考核。从足管中心主任韦迪开始，到各部门的中层领导都要宣读自己的总结报告，足协最终以“德、能、勤、技、廉”的标准来打出分数。
对于中国足球来说，2010年是不平静的一年，而对于足协的中层以上领导来说，他们中的大多数都是今年才进入足协工作的，能否打出满意的分数，也是为明年的竞聘工作打好基础。
足协考核·对象
首次考核新班子韦迪带头发言
记者通过采访获悉，本周五的年终考核，首先进行总结的将是韦迪等四名足管中心高层，他们的陈述将由总局领导亲自把关和考核。
接下来将是足协的中层干部依次进行总结，顺序为：杨新利等新任的五名中层干部、刘殿秋等继任的处级干部、其他未担任部门主任的中层干部。
自从年初南勇、杨一民被捕之后，韦迪、于洪臣等人被总局调到足管中心，另有五名中层干部也陆续到足管中心担任要职。本周五的考核也是韦迪为首的领导班子首次接受个人工作考核。
据记者了解，上周，足协掌门人韦迪分别听取了七大部门主管对该部门一年来工作情况的汇报总结。
同时，各部门领导还简要陈述了新的工作计划，重新规划校园足球活动、完善职业联赛俱乐部准入标准等都在新年工作的规划中。
足协考核·内容
每个人总结8分钟 足协员工打分
本次考核的形式是，中层以上干部每人宣读自己的工作总结报告。“每人有8分钟，据目前了解的情况，就是我们这些干部的个人总结，而不是整个部门的总结。”职业发展与监管部主任刘殿秋对记者说。在每个人的“8分钟”总结过后，足协员工会根据“德、能、勤、技、廉”的标准给每个人打分，从而得到最终分数。
足协考核·目的
人员或有调整明年准备竞聘
本周五的考核还有一个重要意义，那便是为即将到来的新一轮竞聘打下基础。
按照总局固有的轮岗计划，每四年就要进行一次中层干部竞聘，由于年终工作较多，原定于今年年底进行的竞聘，可能会延后到明年年初。
值得注意的是，今年4月空降足协的五名新中层干部若最终不能得到领导认可，极有可能将返回原单位，或被委派到总局其他单位任职。 文/特约记者王帆

description.hltext_display: 'PMC turning blind eye to sex determination'
description.content:
Former mayor Rajlaxmi Bhosale and corporators of the Pune Municipal Corporation (PMC) on Tuesday alleged that some city doctors and hospitals were carrying out sex determination tests (SDTs) despite a national ban.
Raising the issue during the general body meeting, Bhosale said that she recently attended a meeting on SDTs in which some participants claimed that the tests were being openly done in Pune despite the fact that the Preconception and Prenatal Diagnostic Techniques (PCPNDT) Act, 1994, was in place. She said the participants also alleged that there was poor vigilance in the city. PMCs acting health officer, RR Pardeshi, denied that the civic body is not keeping a vigil on the issue. There is constant monitoring of411 sonography centres in the city. The PMC has also taken action against 12 centres, he claimed. Congress corporator Siddharth Dhende claimed that many unauthorised centres are operating in mobile vans and on the outskirts of Pune. These centres are openly conducting SDTs in the PMCs jurisdiction. What is the civic administration doing about it? he asked. Maharashtra Navnirman Sena (MNS) corporator Babu Vagaskar said the PMC is short-staffed to keep a regular check on these centres. He appealed to the municipal commissioner to appoint more staff for the purpose.
Independent corporator Ujwal Keskar asked the PMC administration to publish names of the 12 hospitals and doctors against whom action has been taken. The civic authorities promised to do so. Punes current sex ratio stands at 830 for 1,000 men.

description.hltext_display: La prueba de la alcoholemia, por un euro en el parking de Puerta Real
description.author: Elena Llompart
description.content:
El parking de Puerta Real tiene un nuevo inquilino que se ha instalado con vocación de permanencia: un alcoholímetro de la empresa Consumer Design Products (CPD) que por el precio de un euro sirve como instrumento de autodiagnóstico personal para controlar el nivel de alcohol ingerido.
El aparato, que ya se usa en lugares públicos, restaurantes y parkings de Málaga, Madrid, Castilla León, Castilla La Mancha, Navarra y País Vasco, va dirigido a todas aquellas personas que deseen hacer un consumo prudente de alcohol, así como a conductores que deseen prevenir accidentes o sanciones derivadas por una ingesta de alcohol superior a lo establecido por las leyes vigentes.
Así, según explica José Luis Cano, apoderado de la empresa especializada en artículos de gran consumo, el detector, que en el futuro será implementado en otros lugares de la ciudad, ofrece "un servicio público para prevenir accidentes" y cuenta ya con "una proyección importante", ya que en países como Francia o Italia su uso en locales de ocio nocturno en los que se venden bebidas alcohólicas es obligatorio.
Además, el responsable apunta al "cambio de mentalidad" que muchos de los demandantes de este tipo de instrumentos están experimentando, ya que entienden que más vale prevenir que curar. Es el caso, al parecer, de varios restaurantes españoles que "han entendido que no supone un perjuicio para sus negocios el hecho de que sus clientes controlen su tasa de alcoholemia" para decidir, por ejemplo, quién está en condiciones de conducir tras una cena de empresa o una comida con los amigos.
Funciona con un sensor electroquímico que se recalienta a 300 grados. Así, al soplar la pajita que dispensa la máquina, el aparato analiza las partículas de calor e indica acústicamente su diagnóstico con mensajes como "espere 30 minutos" o "no debe conducir", en función del grado de alcoholemia que indique la pantalla a través de mensajes luminosos.
Para el buen funcionamiento es esencial, tal y como indica el responsable, que hayan transcurrido al menos 20 minutos desde la última ingesta de alcohol o que el usuario se enjuague la boca con agua o alguna bebida no alcohólica, ya que en la lengua y paladar quedan restos de alcohol aún habiendo dando un simple sorbo a una copa.

description.hltext_display: Alternative Treatment for Kidney Stones Removal
description.content:
Alternative treatment for kidney stones removal.
Solid concretions formed in the kidneys are called kidney stones. Do you have excruciating pain in the rib, lower abdomen and groin and is your urine pink, red or brown in color, you are suffering from the onset of kidney stones. Your doctor may ask you to have it removed through surgery. Don't bother 80% kidney stones are cured without surgery.
Alternative treatment for kidney stones is nothing but natural treatment. Before familiarizing you with this treatment, you should learn about the symptoms, causes, diagnosis and types of kidney stones. Pain on urination, nausea and vomiting, persistent urge to urinate and fever and chills, if an infection is present are also symptoms of ureterolithiasis.
Heredity, being an adult, a man, and obese, dehydration, certain diets, digestive diseases and surgery and other conditions can cause kidney stones. X-ray, CT.scan, ultra sound, microscopic study of urine, urine culture test, blood tests, 24 hour urine collection are the techniques used in diagnosis.
Calcium, struvite, uric acid, cystine and other stones can be effectively cured with alternative treatment. This treatment converts kidney stones into sludge or break then into small particles and flushed out through urine.
Conventional treatment also breaks kidney stones into tiny pieces so that they can be passed through urine. This treatment is painful, does not work on all types of stones, requires hospitalization, costly, does not cure quickly and does not prevent future formation.
Alternative treatment for kidney stones is free from these disadvantages. So go in for this treatment which uses cranberry juice, fruits and vegetables with potassium citrate, asparagus, olive oil or some natural substance found on your kitchen rack.

description.hltext_display: 教員採用試験に受かった人はいますか？ - 横レスあり
description.content:
私は過去数年、関東のある県を志望して教員試験を受け続けてきましたが、どれも一次敗退でした。（ちなみに一次試験から記述式の問題で、試験形式に癖がある、と言われている県です。）
特に今年は勉強一色の生活にして今までで一番頑張ったつもりでしたが、結果はだめで、とてもショックでした…。でも、いつまでもくよくよしていても仕方ないので、非常勤講師の仕事がひと段落した今からでも、また頑張ってみようと思っています。やる気になるのが遅くて恥ずかしいですが…。
そこで、この場をお借りして教員採用試験に受かった方（特に臨時講師などの仕事をしながら受かった方）、もしくは身近にそういう方がいらっしゃる方に何点か質問させて頂きたく、トピを立てた次第です。
1受験何年目で受かりましたか？
2志望校種や教科は何ですか？
3勉強する上で大変だったことは何ですか？
4特にどのような点に気をつけて勉強していましたか？（勉強方法など）
5ご家族やご友人、職場の同僚の方から理解や協力は得られましたか？
質問内容が多くてすみません。答えられる内容だけでも結構ですので、よろしくお願いいたします。
色々参考にさせて下さい。
ユーザーID：7296832424
お気に入り登録数：12
古いレス順
レス数：9本
タイトル
投稿者
雨音
2010年12月21日 14:47
息子が教員です。
1.1年目です
2.中学 数学です
3.一日10時間近い勉強時間の確保だそうです（覚える事が多すぎて）
4.過去問を徹底的に
5.学生だったのでバイト先に都合をつけてもらって、バイト自粛してたみたいです。
一次試験は現役生の方が有利かもしれないですね。
時間が多い分
しかし、二次、三次なると、実際教壇に上がってる人のほうが有利だと言ってました。
でもマニュアルどうりではない受け答えをしたので、完全に落ちたと思ってたのが、逆に良かったように思われました。
経験してない事を知ったかぶりしないで、そのままの自分の言葉で答えたそうです。
頑張ってくださいね。
ユーザーID：9211793666
にゃんこ
2010年12月21日 15:34
東京都の教員採用試験を受けました。
１．大学卒業後３年目、初めての受験で補欠合格。夏に常勤採用の連絡をいただきましたが、事情があって辞退しました。
２．志望校種・教科は中高の美術・工芸。
３．特に大変なことはありませんでした。
４．それまでの仕事をやめて失業保険を受給しながら勉強・受験。全部合わせて５ヵ月間の出来事でした。
・毎日新聞を隅々まで読み、社会に疎くならないよう注意。教育関連の出来事は特に熟読。
・学習指導要領を毎日少しずつ、確実に頭に叩き込むように熟読。
・問題集は解説の多い物を一冊だけ。
・それ一色の毎日にならないよう、興味のあった万葉集の勉強も独学で。
・ネットで経験者の情報を集め、雰囲気を掴む
・美術系の実技・知識はそれなりに自信があったので特に何もせず。
５．すでに独立してひとり暮らしだったので、家族の協力はなしです。また、友人にも経験者はいなかったので誰にも協力は仰いでいません。
ひとり暮らしの家事も普通にやり、淡々と過ごしていました。
筆記テストは小論文に思いのたけをぶつけ、２次の実技と面接は素の自分でいきました。
ユーザーID：1899023280
味噌カツ県民
2010年12月21日 16:12
うちの県では、小中学校の常勤講師を3年やって校長のお墨付きがあれば、一次試験が免除になります。他の県はどうか知りませんが…。指導力に自信があれば、お薦めです。仕事をしながらの試験勉強は大変ですが、頑張ってください。
ユーザーID：9834187234
TB
2010年12月21日 17:16
同様の方がいらっしゃいました。
非常勤講師として勉強と仕事に一生懸命だったのですがなかなか受かりませんでした。
あまりにもいい先生でしたので教育委員会に陳情しましたよ。
多少成績悪くても児童と父母は彼女を教員として望んでいる、とね。
次の年には合格しました。
本人はプレッシャーで相当頑張ったようです。
教育委員会では何も配慮する必要がなかったそうです。
結局は頑張れる動機の強さが勉強、成績、合格につながるんでしょうね。
試験形式の癖なんか関係ないですよ。皆さん同じ条件ですから。
ユーザーID：8916453033
はな
2010年12月21日 21:11
素人考えですが倍率の低い県で受けて
受かってから志望県へという手は使えないものなんでしょうか？
結婚とかで引っ越したときとかもう一度受けなおしてるとは思えないのですが
ユーザーID：5587529911
くりこ
2010年12月21日 21:17
現在東京都教員６年目です。
私はなかなか地元が受からず、併願して受験した東京都に受かり上京しました。
ちなみに、中学国語を志望していましたが、採用人数が少なく競争率も高かったため、通信で小学校免許を取得、方向転換し現在に至ります。
１、地元を５年受けました（５年目に併願）
２、小学校全科（地元では中学国語を受験）
３、私は中学校で常勤講師をしていました。部活動の顧問もやっておりましたので、土日は試合などでなかなか勉強時間が取れませんでした。なので睡眠時間を削りました。
４、その県都の出題傾向を把握（分析）する。過去問をひたすらやっていくうちにわかってきます。（地元は不合格でしたが）
５、家族は応援してくれました。また職場の管理職や先輩方も集団討論や面接指導をしてくださいました。
私もなかなか受からずつらかったです。『一寸先は闇』の生活に気が滅入りそうでした。教員採用試験予備校に行ったこともありましたよ。

description.hltext_display: How Chiropractic Care During Pregnancy Can Enhance Health
description.content:
What is vertebral subluxation or spinal dyskinesia?
Your spine is made up of small joints (vertebra, disc, vertebra) . The slightest misalignment of these joints due to repetitive stress, trauma or the strain of pregnancy irritates the nerves, even though it may not cause pain. When the nerves aren't functioning correctly, you might experience symptoms related to organs, muscles and seemingly unrelated parts of the body. How does vertebral subluxation occur? Any major or minor spinal trauma and/or prolonged stress or strain can cause the vertebrae in the neck, back or the pelvic bones to become misaligned, resulting in a subluxation.
This is common during pregnancy with the addition of 25 -
35 pounds or more, change in sleeping position and change in center of gravity as weight is pulled forward lowering the body's center of mass. What is a chiropractic adjustment?
Dr. Kosmides will gently move the vertebrae back into place, removing nerve interference, allowing the body to function properly and resulting in improved health and decreased pain.
Can women who are pregnant receive chiropractic care?
Yes, many pregnant women report that regular adjustments bring them tremendous benefits, including less back pain, less discomfort during pregnancy, better pre-birth positioning of the baby and improved quality of labor and delivery.
What is the Webster technique?
The Webster technique is a specific chiropractic system of analysis and adjustment which decreases nervous system obstruction and improves the function of the pelvic muscles, ligaments and joints. The result is less constraint on the uterus and a better opportunity for the fetus to position correctly for birth.
Can a chiropractic adjustment turn a breech baby?
Chiropractors do not perform any obstetrical services; however, the Webster technique, as defined above, can create favorable conditions for healthy fetal positioning.
Do medical doctors refer to chiropractors?
Yes, obstetricians, pediatricians and family doctors refer patients for chiropractic care with increasing frequency. They see the benefits of spinal adjustments and recognize chiropractic care as a distinct practice. Approximately 50% of our referrals come from medical doctors.
Are chiropractors against working with medical doctors?
No, your family wellness chiropractor recognizes the important role that a medical doctor plays in your family's health and believes in a collaborative approach. When he suspects that you need medical attention, Dr. Kosmides will encourage you to see your medical doctor.
What if my medical doctor tells me not to see a chiropractor while I am pregnant?
Many obstetricians, pediatricians and family practitioners see the benefits of chiropractic care during pregnancy, but there are still a great number of medical doctors who have not accepted the facts. For every doctor telling you that chiropractic care is not recommended during pregnancy, you'll find a handful who will tell you that it's perfectly safe and beneficial. The decision is up to you.
Can chiropractic care be affordable for my entire family?
Families that receive wellness chiropractic care usually report overall improved quality of life for the entire family. In addition they report that better health saves money, making it affordable for the entire family to receive care. Of course, knowing that you've provided your child with the opportunity for a healthy adulthood is the greatest benefit.
George Kosmides DC, CMUA
4849 Van Nuys Blvd., #206
Sherman Oaks, CA 91403
(818) 386-0629 fax
(818) 386-0891

description.hltext_display: Opel fabricará 40.000 coches más en 2011
Milwaukee na krilima Boykinsa razbio Lakerse u Los Angelesu
description.author: Agencija Totalsport
description.content:
Los Angeles Lakersi, aktualni prvaci NBA lige, doživjeli su u utorak navečer osmi poraz u sezoni, te treći na domaćem parketu. Posve iznenađujuće ih je prizemljio Milwaukee pobjedom 98-79.
Ta je momčad trenutačno na rubu ulaska u doigravanje (8. mjesto u Istočnoj konferenciji), no protiv Lakersa je izgledala izuzetno dobro, pogotovo u obrani, za koju Lakersi nisu imali odgovora. Pogotovo se to odnosi na posljednju četvrtinu u kojoj su Lakersi zabili samo 13 poena, ali su i ispoljavali ogromnu nervozu. Najviše se to osjetilo kod Kobea Bryanta koji je dvije minute prije kraja, kada je sve već bilo gotovo, zaradio isključenje (dvije nesportske pogreške). Sve je inicirao opravdano suđeni njegov prekršaj u napadu kojeg je napravio na Andrewu Bogutu.
Pobjeda je za Milwaukee time veća jer nisu mogli računati na nekoliko igrača prve petorke ili važnih igrača s klupe zbog ozljeda ( Jennings, Delfino, Gooden, Maggette i od ranije ozlijeđeni Redd). Najbolji je strijelac Milwaukeeja bio Earl Boykins s klupe s 22 poena, a odličnu je utakmicu odigrao Turčin Ersan Ilyasova sa 17 poena i 11 skokova, te spomenuti Bogut sa 15 poena, osam skokova i četiri asistencije.
Dallas je u dva dana na koljena bacio dva giganta s Floride. Nakon Miamija su slavili i kod Orlanda 105-99. Dirk Nowitzki sa 17 poena nije bio prvi strijelac kluba ( Butler je zabio 20), ali je povukao kada je trebalo. Odlično je igrao Jason Kidd (13 poena, šest skokova i 12 asistencija), a domaćinu nije pomogao niti u reketu raspoloženi Dwight Howard (26 poena i 23 skoka). Novo pojačanje Orlanda Gilbert Arenas je za 18 minuta postigao dva poena.
Vladimir Radmanović je dalekometnom tricom sa zvukom sirene donio Golden Stateu ulazak u produžetak kod Sacramenta, a sve su nakon toga "ratnici" začinili pobjedom 117-109. New Jersey je iznenadio Memphis i slavio u gostima 101-94, dok je Chicago razmontirao Philadelphiju sa plusom od 45 poena (121-76). Oklahoma City je pobijedio Charlotte 99-81, tako što su u prvih deset minuta posljednje četvrtine primili samo pet poena!

description.hltext_display: Helpless Mahesh Zagade can't fight encroachments in Pune
description.content:
The Pune Municipal Corporation (PMC) seems to have succumbed to pressure from different quarters in taking action against illegal constructions in the city.
Municipal commissioner Mahesh Zagade on Tuesday expressed helplessness on the issue while responding to questions from some corporators in the general body meeting.
Nationalist Congress Party (NCP) leader Anil Bhosale and Shiv Sena leader Sham Deshpande raised the issue and enquired about the progress of the civic bodys anti-encroachment drive.
Zagade claimed that whenever the civic administration takes action against encroachments, a lot of pressure comes from different quarters to stop the demolition drive. I cant explain how difficult it is to carry out the anti-encroachment drive, Zagade told the general body, admitting that there are a large number of illegal
constructions in the city.
The civic administration had started a demolition drive after heavy rains inundated several parts of the city. About seven people were killed in house collapse incidents. People faced a lot of inconvenience as streets were water logged and drains got choked due to illegal
constructions.
According to Zagade, there are three types of illegal constructions in the city: where developers have done additional constructions assuming that they would get extra floor space index (FSI) or transfer of development rights (TDR); completely illegal constructions which need to be demolished immediately; and where the PMC has given permission for illegal constructions.
The civic chief wondered how he can take action against so many officials when they themselves were responsible for approving such a large number of illegal constructions. He pointed out that the PMC is already facing staff crunch while the city is growing rapidly.
Zagade said the civic body has sent a proposal to the state government seeking approval for an additional police station which will deal with only encroachments and illegal constructions. He said the state home department is likely to clear the proposal soon.

description.hltext_display: Unos 1.000 vuelos cancelados en Europa por el frío
ВВП провинции Гуандун впервые превысил отметку в 4 трлн юаней
description.content:
В этом году в провинции Гуандун /Южный Китай/ отмечается стабильное и быстрое развитие местной экономики. Об этом свидетельствует тот факт, что за первые 11 месяцев года провинциальный ВВП впервые превысил отметку в 4 трлн юаней и достиг 4 трлн 70,4 млрд юаней /1 долл США - 6,7 юаня/ при увеличении на 12,3 процента по сравнению с тем же периодом прошлого года. При этом темпы роста были на 3,1 процентного пункта выше прошлогоднего показателя за тот же период минувшего года.
Как сообщили корр. агентства Синьхуа в Статистическом управлении провинции Гуандун, в январе-ноябре текущего года объем капиталовложений в основные фонды составил в провинции 1 трлн 362,63 млрд юаней с приростом на 22,5 процента. Добавленная стоимость, созданная ведущими промышленными предприятиями этой провинции, достигла 1 трлн 781,65 млрд юаней /рост на 17,4 процента/.
Благодаря быстрому росту местной экономики в провинции зарегистрировано увеличение финансовых доходов, которые составили за первые 11 месяцев этого года 1 трлн 75,13 млрд юаней /рост на 34,2 процента/. -0-

description.hltext_display: Un día para la ilusión
職場のバイトの女子高生の気持ちが分からない - このトピ主さんにとってメールで謝罪はアリなんですね！
description.content:
接客業をしている20代後半の女です。
以前、職場にバイトの女子高生（17歳）がいたのですが、結構仲良くしていて仕事終わりにはお喋りしたり休みの日には一緒にご飯を食べたりしていました。
うちの職場はシフト制で、私は閉店までいて最後にレジ閉め・お店の鍵を閉めて帰るというシフトが多いです。一人でお店を閉めてレジチェックして電気も消して〜という作業はかなり寂しいです。そこで、そのシフトの日はそのバイトの子にも一緒に最後まで残ってもらうことにしていました。一緒に店を閉める手伝いをしてもらって、その子が早く上がる日は終わるまで更衣室で待ってもらうか、忙しかったら延長で店内で働いてもらう感じです。
もちろん強制したわけではなく、もし良かったらって感じでお願いして、その子も快く了承してくれていました。
ある日、いつものように残ってもらった日にちょっとしたことで口論になってしまって、「私だって本当は一回くらい早く帰りたいんですよ！！」と言われました。唖然としてしまって、その日はもう帰ってもらいました。
ところが、その数日後にその子から「最近寒いし、今度一緒にお鍋行きませんか？」と普通にメールが来たのです。
メールは結局返信せず、その子のシフト自体他の社員にお願いして私とかぶらないようにしてもらいました。後にその子が進学で辞めることになって、それっきりです。
皆さん、こういう子ってどう思いますか？最近の子って、こんなもんなのでしょうか。
お願いについては悪いと思ってました。用事があるなら全然断ってくれていいよと何度も言いました。自分でOKしたのに勝手に怒って、そうかと思ったら何事もなかったかのようにメールを送ってきて…。
友人に話したことがあるのですが、働いていない子が多かったせいか理解してもらえませんでした。是非、同じように働いている方に意見を聞きたいです。

Cable Reprimand May Weaken Liberal Democrats in U.K. Coalition
description.author: Thomas Penny
description.content:
U.K. Business Secretary Vince Cables political survival after he was quoted as saying he declared war on Rupert Murdoch may handicap his Liberal Democrat partys efforts to wield influence in the coalition.
Cable, the No. 2 Liberal Democrat in David Camerons Conservative-led Cabinet, was stripped of responsibility for media, broadcasting and telecommunications, according to a statement issued by the prime ministers office in London late yesterday. Cameron called Cables remarks, which were published in the Daily Telegraph newspaper, totally unacceptable and inappropriate. The move strengthens Camerons hand because hes effectively slapped Cable down and stripped him of privileges, Justin Fisher, who teaches politics at Brunel University in northwest London, said in a telephone interview. Chastened by the experience, Cable will be more loyal and presumably will be less likely to raise objections to policies behind the scenes.
The uproar over the planned takeover of pay-television broadcaster British Sky Broadcasting Group Plc by Murdochs News Corp. came an hour after Cameron and his deputy, Nick Clegg, defended previous Cable remarks in the Telegraph detailing Cabinet infighting and declaring the prospect of his resignation a nuclear option that could topple the government. I fully accept the decision of the prime minister and deputy prime minister, Cable said in a statement yesterday. I deeply regret the comments I made and apologize for the embarrassment that I have caused the government. By keeping Cable, Cameron resisted calls by both Conservative lawmakers and the opposition Labour Party that he quit. Erratic Behavior His increasingly erratic behavior is not conducive to being in the Cabinet, Conservative lawmaker Philip Davies said on BSkyBs Sky News. You can either shoot from the hip and be on the back benches or you can be in the government. Mr. Cable seems to want to have the best of both worlds. Cable had the power to decide if the acquisition of BSkyB by News Corp. would give Murdoch too much media power. I have declared war on Mr. Murdoch and I think were going to win, Cable was recorded by the Telegraph as telling reporters who posed as constituents. Murdoch is trying to take over BSkyB, you probably know that, Cable told the undercover Telegraph reporters. I cant politicize it, but for the people who know what is happening, this is a big thing. His whole empire is now under attack. New York-based News Corp. said it was shocked and dismayed by the comments. Cables remarks raise serious questions about fairness and due process, News Corp. spokeswoman Miranda Higham said in a telephone interview.
Hunt Takes Over
Culture Secretary Jeremy Hunt, a Conservatives, will now take over responsibility for media and telecoms issues, including the media regulator Ofcom, enhancing the powers of ministers from Camerons party. News Corp., the owner of four of the biggest-selling U.K. newspapers, is waiting for the government to rule on the deal. Ofcom has a Dec. 31 deadline to recommend to Cable whether to start a Competition Commission probe on how the deal might affect the British media landscape. The company won European Union approval for the proposed purchase today.
News Corp., attempting to gain from the steady subscription business of BSkyB, asked the EU on Nov. 3 to approve its proposed 7.8 billion-pound ($12.1 billion) bid for the 61 percent of BSkyB that it doesnt already own. BSkyB rejected the initial offer of 700 pence a share in June as too low. The companies are seeking regulatory approval before a new offer is made. Untenable Position Cable placed himself in an untenable position, Robert Bell, a London-based antitrust lawyer with Speechly Bircham LLC, said in a telephone interview. Hes exercising some sort of quasi-judicial role in the whole process and he has to maintain an element of fairness in his decision-making. Quite frankly, his reported comments go contrary to that. Cables comments on Murdoch were released just after Cameron and Clegg signaled their approval of the minister at an end-of-year press conference. Cameron said he had a good and business-like relationship with Cable, while Clegg called the minister an incredibly important member of the government and an outstanding secretary of state. They were commenting on remarks published last night by the Telegraph in which Cable said there is a constant battle going on behind the scenes between the Conservatives and Liberal Democrats in the Cabinet. I Can Walk Out I have a nuclear option, its like fighting a war, Cable was cited as saying by the Telegraph. They know I have nuclear weapons, but I dont have any conventional weapons. If they push me too far then I can walk out of the government and bring the government down and they know that. It was necessary for Cameron to keep Cable in the Cabinet to prevent rank-and-file Liberal Democrat lawmakers, who have already rebelled over higher student tuition fees, from growing more unhappy with the government, according to Fisher. If Cable had gone it could have started to make things a bit sticky, Fisher said Youd have had more left-wing Liberal Democrats starting to get more disgruntled because their chaps been ousted. His bigger problem now could be right wing Conservatives saying why special privileges? Anyone else would have been sacked.

he had a good and business-like relationship with Cable, while Clegg called the minister an incredibly important member of the government and an outstanding secretary of state
there is a constant battle going on behind the scenes between the Conservatives and Liberal Democrats in the Cabinet

description.hltext_display: Más de 2.320 millones
CajaGranada ya es Mare Nostrum
description.author: G. S. M
description.content:
CajaGranada dio ayer el último paso para culminar un proceso, el de la fusión fría con tres entidades del arco mediterráneo, que comenzó de forma oficial hace menos de seis meses -después de medio año de tanteos-. La asamblea general de la entidad financiera granadina aprobó ayer las modificaciones del contrato de integración del Grupo Banco Mare Nostrum (BMN), que hoy mismo podrá constituirse con la autorización de la Dirección General de Tesoro y que comenzará a operar abiertamente a partir del próximo 1 de enero.
El órgano de gobierno de la caja aprobó la propuesta del Banco de España de adelantar la mutualización de resultados al cien por cien durante el ejercicio de 2011, ya que el contrato inicial suscrito por CajaGranada, Caja Murcia, Sa Nostra y Caixa Penedés preveía un sistema progresivo de mutualización hasta alcanzar la totalidad en 2016. Esta medida, según informó ayer CajaGranada, contribuye "a fortalecer el sistema financiero y dar confianza a los mercados", al "mostrar claramente la voluntad integradora del grupo Banco Mare Nostrum desde el primer momento". Se trata de "mostrar claramente la voluntad integradora del grupo BMN desde el primer momento; de evidenciar que BMN es un grupo sólido, cohesionado, unitario con la fisonomía que los mercados demandan actualmente", de forma que el grupo se dota, de esta forma, de "una rigurosa gobernanza y de una extraordinaria fortaleza financiera". La aprobación por amplia mayoría de la mutualización del cien por cien de los beneficios -las modificaciones recibieron 142 votos a favor, dos abstenciones y un voto en contra- también ha determinado la adaptación de las cuotas de interés. En este sentido, CajaGranada se quedará con un 18% de la sociedad central, mientras que Caja Murcia concentrará un 41%, Caixa Penedés un 28% y Sa Nostra un 13%.
Además, la asamblea aprobó el nuevo organigrama del grupo, en el que CajaGranada asumirá la vicepresidencia segunda ejecutiva, además de tres puestos en el consejo de administración y dos en la comisión ejecutiva.
La entidad financiera granadina explicó que "la adaptación del sistema de garantías y apoyo mutuo tendrá un carácter irrevocable, su aplicación se extiende a cualquier acreedor y las garantías solidarias de las cajas también abarcan las obligaciones contraídas por cada una de las entidades". Finalmente el consejo de administración del Grupo Banco Mare Nostrum estará integrado por 17 miembros, de los cuales 14 serán designados a propuesta de las cuatro cajas integrantes y 3 tendrán el carácter de independientes. Estos últimos serán Luis de Guindos, Josep Manuel Basáñez y Miguel Ángel Cabello, los tres con una amplia experiencia profesional y empresarial y un elevado conocimiento del sector financiero.
CajaGranada recordó los cuatro principios que regirán el modelo de gobierno de la sociedad central del Banco Mare Nostrum. En primer lugar, el principio de integración, con el objetivo de favorecer "la cohesión y el posicionamiento" del grupo. En segundo, el de "potenciar la gobernabilidad común entre todas las cajas" integrantes del Sistema Institucional de Protección. En tercer lugar destaca el principio de representatividad, a fin de que todas las cajas estén representadas en los órganos de gobierno (junta general de accionistas y consejo de administración) y en la comisión ejecutiva, con independencia de su participación en la sociedad central. Por último, la gestión del grupo se caracterizará por la "profesionalidad en la gestión", que requiere que la mayoría de los miembros del consejo de administración sean profesionales con amplia experiencia en el sector financiero.

description.hltext_display: Deutsche Aktien starten kaum verändert
description.content:
Frankfurt/Main (dpa) - Der deutsche Aktienmarkt ist am Mittwoch kaum verändert gestartet. Der Dax stieg in den ersten Minuten um 0,05 Prozent auf 7082 Punkte. Der deutsche Leitindex hatte am Vortag bei mehr als 7087 Punkten den höchsten Stand seit Anfang Juni 2008 erreicht.
Damit hatte er seine Bestmarke vom Wochenbeginn um rund 20 Punkte nach oben geschraubt. Der MDax rückte um 0,27 Prozent auf 10 101 Punkte vor, nachdem der Index mittelgroßer Werte am Vortag erstmals seit gut zweieinhalb Jahren über die Marke von 10 000 Punkten geklettert war. Der Technologiewerteindex TecDax gab dagegen um 0,05 Prozent auf 843 Punkte nach.

description.hltext_display: ‘황해’ 보고 놀란 검찰 수사관들 “이거 어디서 참고한 건가?”
description.content: [뉴스엔 김범석 기자]21일 열린 웰메이드 스릴러 영화 '황해'(감독 나홍진/� �작 팝콘필름)의 VIP 시사회에 90여 명의 검찰 관계자들이 참석해 그 배경에 관심이 모아진다.'황해'의 한 � �작진은 22일 뉴스엔과의 통화에서 "어� �밤 서울 삼성동 코엑스 메가박스에서 열린 '황해' 시사회에 서울중앙지검과 의� �부지청 소속 검찰 관계자 90명이 영화를 보� 갔다. 영화사가 � �식으로 초대한 건 아니었� 개인� �인 인연 때문에 극장을 찾았다"� 말했다.� �작진 중 한 명이 친분이 있는 판검사 10여 명을 시사회에 초대했는데, 막상 당일 참석 희망 인원이 90명까지 늘었다는 설명이었다.'황해'의 한 관계자는 "판검사 뿐 아니라 강� �부, 마약부에서 일하는 현직 수사관들이 많이 보러왔다"며 "영화를 본 뒤 '이거 어디서 참� 한 거냐' '감독이 누구냐'며 높은 관심을 보였다"� 말했다. 영화에 나오는 조� 족 실상과 범죄 수법, 그리� 이들과 한국 조폭과의 연계 등이 치밀하� 무척 리얼했다는 반응이었다.'황해'의 최성식 � �작 이사는 "영화를 본 한 외사과 수사관이 '현실에서 일어나는 조� 족 외국인 범죄와 상당히 흡사해 놀랐다. 하� �우 김윤석처럼 청부살인에 연루된 조� 족이 많은데 발품 팔아 취재를 꼼꼼히 한 것 같다'� 말했다"� � �했다.최성식 이사는 "이 영화 시나리오는 나홍진 감독이 연변과 대� � 등을 한 달간 배낭여행하며 구상한 것"이라며 "극중 구남으로 나온 하� �우가 면가(김윤석)에게 50만원을 받� 청부살인에 나서는 설� �도 실� � 조� 족에게 들은 얘기를 극화한 것"이라� 말했다.21일 뒤풀이에 참석한 한 검찰 수사관은 "배우들의 명연기에 놀랐다"며 "그런데 우리 직업이 직업이다 보니 주인공들이 현행법을 위반하는 장면이 너무 많더라. 여권법 위반부터 살인교사, 방화, 폭행, 특수 � �도, 범죄단체 조직, 공무집행방해까지 일일이 열거하기 힘들 � �도였다"며 혀를 내둘� �다.예비 흥행작 '황해'는 한국에 돈 벌러 간 아내 때문에 빚진 연변 택시운� �수 구남이 청부살인과 아내를 찾기 위해 한국에 밀항했다가 뜻하지 않은 사건에 연루되며 벌어지는 스릴러다. '추격자'에 이어 나홍진 특� 의 극사실주의 연출 기법이 잘 발휘된 '황해'는 22일 개봉했다.김범석 kbs@newsen.com기사� �보 및 보도자료 newsen@newsen.comcopyrightⓒ 뉴스엔. 무단� �재 & 재배포 금지

description.hltext_display: これはセクハラなのか - ありがとうございます
description.content:
キャンプ用品やスポーツ用品だったり本やＤＶＤだったりします。
いろいろメンテしたり管理したりしますが、
一方で受付しながら社員とコミュニケーションをとるのも仕事のうちです。
ただ、今年度に入ってから、ある男性が週に2回以上もやってきて、しかも私が受付しているときだけ、来るので憂鬱です。
恋愛映画を「これ観た？」と聞いて来て、観たというと、いつも「○○（女優さん）が大胆だったよね」「脚がきれいだよね」とか、そんなことばかり言います。
本なんかでも、「主人公の考えかたって、童貞だよね」とか変な表現で語ります。
そのたびに私は「そういうところは見てない」「わからない」などと言ったりしているのですが、本人はあまりわかっていない様子。あと、他の女性社員のことを「最近男ができた」「声がエロイ」とか「新入社員で処女の子って見てわかる」とか言います。
私の態度が悪いのかもしれません。でも、その人が来ると機械的に返事をして、雑談になだれ込まないように気をつけているんですが、とにかくしつこく話しかけてきます。
暇なんだと思っていたのですが、他の人に聞くとちゃんと仕事をする人みたいです。というより、社内ではちょっともてる人（遊んでる人？）のようで、容姿にも自信あるみたいなんですけど、はっきり言ってうっとうしいです。私が唯一の既婚者なので、最初は独身の人に話しかけて変に誤解されたくないのかも、と思っていたのですが、最近はおばさんにエロ話をすると喜ぶ、と誤解してるのではないかと考えています。
こういうのってセクハラなんでしょうか。

description.hltext_display: Letters to the Editor: War against cartels
description.content:
How do we stop the Mexican cartels? It is very easy, since the United States is their No. 1 customer. Our pharmaceutical companies are guilty of supplying the cartels with the chemicals to produce the meth, etc. Also, coming from the U.S. is all their high-powered weapons. So, in essence, this country is to blame for most of the problems Mexico is having today.
What we can do to try to help is to provide medical treatment for the drug addicts. Also, provide job training if they are rehabilitated. If they do not straighten out, then no more SSI checks or any other assistance. So they know this is the end of the line.
All the greedy suppliers of evil should be given hard jail time.
The Mexican government must get serious about eliminating these
outrageous, brutal cartels by waging a full-scale war against them. They are the enemy of the country and are responsible for the suffering of law-abiding citizens.
They should bomb their facilities where they produce the drugs and show no mercy to these sons of the devil. These inhuman monsters do not deserve a trail or pity; they have destroyed beautiful Mexico.
Gil M. Alvarez Santa Fe Springs Helped at Target
On Wednesday, Dec. 1, we shopped at the Target Store in Whittier. While walking out into the parking lot, my husband, Arthur, took a fall.
I called out for help to two ladies walking with a shopping cart in the parking lot.yld_mgr.place_ad_here("adPosBox"); They both came over immediately to help me pick up my husband from the ground. They also alerted staff from the Target Store and retrieved two young ladies and one young man who also were very helpful and wanted to make sure if Arthur was OK.
In all the commotion, I did not get any of their names so that I could
properly thank them. Arthur was bruised and sore but otherwise OK.
Thank you all who were so very
helpful. God bless you!
Arthur Valenzuela
Rose Valenzuela A busy Congress
Believe it or not, Congress has accomplished big things the last two years.
They took the agenda they had run on and made much of it law. This was no "do-nothing" Congress. Most voters, including Democrats, do not think the 111th Congress got more accomplished than most other Congresses. But they are wrong. The 111th came to Washington promising to get things done on behalf of the American people. More than any other Congress in decades, it did. Bernard Leyva

description.hltext_display: На Тайване возбуждено 68 дел против 167 человек, подозреваемых в причастии к даче или получению взяток на выборах мэров пяти крупных городов
description.content:
По итогам расследований тайваньской прокуратуры на днях было возбуждено в общей сложности 68 дел против 167 человек, подозреваемых в причастности к даче или получению взяток на выборах мэров пяти крупных городов острова -- Тайбэя, Синьбэя, Тайчжуна, Тайнаня и Гаосюна, завершившихся 27 ноября.
Как сообщили тайваньские СМИ, к настоящему времени органы прокуратуры острова рассмотрели в общей сложности 3890 дел, связанных с созданием препятствий проведению упомянутых выборов. Общее количество фигурирующих по этим делам составило 10892 человека. В частности, количество рассмотренных дел о даче или получении взяток на выборах составило 3295.
По решению местных судов, по обвинению в создании препятствий проведению выборов мэров пяти крупных городов острова 195 человек были взяты под стражу правоохранительными органами, а 139 из них по-прежнему находятся под стражей. -0-

description.hltext_display: 한채영, 18일 중국行 영화 `빅딜` 본격 촬영 돌입
description.content: [OSEN=조경이 기자] 배우 한채영이 중국 영화 ‘빅딜’의 촬영차 18일 중국행 비행기에 올랐다. 한채영의 소속사 BH엔터테인먼트 한 관계자는 “한채영이 영화 ‘빅딜’의 촬영차 18일 중국으로 출국했다”며 “크리스마스와 연말 행사를 모두 반납한채 영화 촬영에 올인� 예� �이다”� 밝혔다. 한채영은 중국영화 ‘빅딜’의 여주인공으로 � �격 발탁됐다. ‘빅딜’은 � �은이들의 창업 과� �에서 거짓과 진실이란 감� �이 어떻게 섞이는지 보여주는 그린 작품이다. ‘빅딜’의 남자 주인공은 대만판 ‘꽃보다 남자’에 출연한 대만 꽃미남 배우 남� �용이 나서 한 채영과 호흡을 맞춘다. ‘무간도’로 잘 알� �진 홍콩 배우 두문택과 가수 겸 배우 장걸 등이 출연한다. 연출은 2008년 화� �상 중국 연말 최� 여감독으로 뽑힌 마� �문 감독이 맡는다.‘빅딜’은 중국과 홍콩, 마카오를 비롯해 한국과 미국에서도 상영� 예� �인 � �세계 개봉을 목표로 하는 대작프로� �트의 영화다. 한채영은 10월 미국 최대 에이� �시인 CAA와 계약을 체결, � 리우드 진출에 앞서 중화권 시장을 먼� � 공락부터 하� 다는 의지다. crystal@osen.co.kr [Copyright ⓒ 한국 최� 의 스포� 엔터테인먼트 � �문 미디어 OSEN(www.osen.co.kr) � �보및 보도자료 osenstar@osen.co.kr 무단� �재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: Letters from readers: Generous payments
description.author: Times-Union
description.content:
ATTORNEY FEES
Generous payments
So Jacksonville judges often authorize payments for court-appointed defense lawyers that are higher than fees authorized by the Legislature.
We taxpayers shouldn't be surprised by this revelation. After all, judges are lawyers too, and they have to look after other members of the club.
EDWARD D. HAGAN Jacksonville ATTORNEY FEES
More than fair
The recent article on judges exceeding the fee caps for attorneys is a total misconception. It fails to address the law correctly and the benefits that these defense attorneys bring to the justice system at their own expense.
As defense lawyers, we have taken an oath to uphold the Constitution of the United States and Florida to protect the personal rights of life and liberty guaranteed there.
As lawyers, we are mandated by the Supreme Courts to provide effective assistance of counsel to each person we are appointed to defend.
When a defendant is charged with a capital crime and facing the death penalty or life in prison, the law requires that only a death-qualified and experienced attorney may be appointed to the case.
Many cases have multiple charges, each of which requires a specific defense.
Some defendants have been wrongly charged, others have had their constitutional rights abused by excessive government intrusion.
The law provides that the fees set by the Legislature for specific types of cases is advisory and may be modified at the discretion of the judge who presided over the case if the set fees are confiscatory in relation to the actual time and services performed by the defense attorney.
The state receives a bargain because the rate of compensation paid to court-appointed attorneys has been lowered to $75 an hour. The attorney must pay his own cost of operating a law practice.
Without competent defense attorneys, these cases will result in citizens being wrongly convicted, long and costly appeals and government intrusion over our rights guaranteed by our Constitution.
The current fee schedule set by the Legislature for court-appointed defense attorneys is far below the actual costs required to provide competent and effective legal representation.
Our judges are in the best position to determine the amount of non-confiscatory fees to be paid to defense attorneys according to the time and services performed.
FRANCIS JEROME SHEA,
defense attorney, Jacksonville REPLY: ORPHANAGES
Safe and satisfied
Charlie Patton's article on orphanages was excellent. I was interviewed but not quoted, but I agree with most of the opinions of those who lived in them.
"Hugs and kisses" were missing, but so was physical and mental abuse. I got a good education. I also learned to cook, clean, garden, sew, set up a household and handle the little money I made wisely.
Many foster homes may be loving and safe. Unfortunately, others aren't. Some families take children for the money they are paid. Some are worse where children are abused physically, sexually and mentally.
Maybe if all the children were supervised like the law demands, they might be safe. I just don't agree with the anti-orphanage reformers that "a poor home is better than a good institution."
I felt happy most of the time and safe all the time. That's how a childhood should be remembered.
CAROLINE� VANKOUWENBERG Jacksonville UNITED NATIONS
Reform or resign
We are the most charitable country in the history of the world, yet our charity to Third World countries buys us bad-mouthing, irrespective of President Barack Obama apologizing to the world.
We should resign from the United Nations!
We should ask the United Nations to move its headquarters to another country.
We should stop paying dues to the United Nations upon 90 days of our notice to them of our resignation.
Some points of reference:
- In 2009, the United States was assessed 22 percent of the U.N's budget.
- In addition, we pick up much of the additional expenses of the U.N.
- In 2009, our bill to the U.N. amounted to $598,292,101.
Within 90 days of our resignation from the U.N., that $598,292,101 should be redirected to Medicare.
It should be used to stop the imminent rationing of health care for the elderly here in America.
It is our money. It is not the world's money, or Obama's money, or Harry Reid's and Nancy Pelosi's money. It should be spent on Americans.
What would happen to the U.N.'s effectiveness? Nothing!
They have no effectiveness today with our money. We are the world's police force, taking the lead in world hotspots, in most cases.
The rest of the world is either jealous of us or too selfish to help out in matters in which the U.N. is supposed to take the lead.
Nothing would change, except we could use our money for Americans, as we should be doing anyway.
JIM WALKER
Ponte Vedra Beach

description.hltext_display: Onion is king in Pune
description.content:
There may be no respite from the soaring prices of vegetables especially onions till the middle of January next year, vegetable sellers in the city warned on Tuesday.
Onion wholesalers and retailers claimed the price might touch Rs100 per kg in the near future. Onions are now sold for between Rs60 and Rs80 per kg.
A vendor, Rajendra Chaturbhuj, said the prices of almost all vegetables, including onions, have gone up over the last 10 days. Except for potatoes and peas, nothing costs less than Rs50 per kg, he said. According to a trader at Market Yard, Vilas Bhujbal, availability of onions in the market alone could stabilise the price of onions. The Union government is importing onions from Pakistan and has stopped exporting the commodity. We will know in a weeks time how much stock is available in the market and the price will depend on that, he said. Potatoes can be bought for up to Rs15 per kg and peas up to Rs40 per kg. Other vegetables cost around Rs60 per kg, and even tomatoes cost Rs50 per kg.
Another vendor, Tukaram Pawar said, Ginger and garlic prices have also gone up by Rs100 per 10 kg. We used to sell ginger and garlic at Rs25 per 250 gm, but the prices are now Rs40. The only vegetables whose prices have remained stable in the past two months are coriander (dhania), spinach (palak) and fenugreek (methi) at Rs10 per bunch.
No one has the time to look out for fruits when the prices of vegetables are rising all the time. The fruit markets seem to lie
empty because of this.
Pomegranates have touched Rs150 per kg, while apples are in the range of Rs70 to Rs80 per kg. The prices of bananas and sapodillas (chikoos) have remained stable for a month.

description.hltext_display: Два человека погибли и еще двое получили травмы в результате обрушения породы на угольной шахте в Восточном Китае
description.content:
По состоянию на настоящий момент два человека погибли и двое получили травмы при обрушении породы на одной из угольных шахт на территории города Тайань провинции Шаньдун /Восточный Китай/. Об этом сообщили 22 декабря корр. Агентства Синьхуа в провинциальном управлении контроля за безопасностью производства на угольных шахтах.
Инцидент произошел в понедельник примерно в 22:45, когда четыре работника, ответственные за безопасность производства, осматривали производственные объекты в шахте. Все они получили травмы на месте инцидента и были незамедлительно доставлены в больницу. Два из них, несмотря на усилия медиков, скончались в больнице 22 декабря. Состояние двух других раненных оценивается как стабильное. -0-

description.hltext_display: 私の年収を主婦のお小遣いという友人 - レス、ありがとうございました
description.content:
４５歳、小さい会社に正社員で勤める独身女性です。
大都市に一人暮らし（兄が両親と同居しており、お嫁さんに悪いので、実家にはほとんどあまり帰りません。）
年収は手取りで２５０万円です。生活はギリギリですが、節約し、たまには大変ささやかですが、贅沢をすることもあり、なんとかやっています。
先日、大学時代の友人（お子さん三人を持つ専業主婦）と久しぶり会いましたが、次のように言われました。
「相手がどうとか言ってないで、結婚しなよ。見てて辛いよ。年収２５０万円なんて、主婦のお小遣い程度の手取りじゃん。」
私は別に独身主義ではありませんでしたが、ボンヤリしていたら、今まで来てしまったと言う感じです。
結婚するのも、もちろん素晴らしいですが、今の生き方も気ままで気にいっていますので、傷つきました。
節約も楽しんでいたつもりですが、そんなに見苦しかったのでしょうか。おごってもらったり、おねだりなどもちろんなく、友人としては対等にしてきたのですが。
一般的に主婦のおこづかいは年間２５０万円が普通なのでしょうか？
ユーザーID：4922693655
お気に入り登録数：20
古いレス順
レス数：30本
1 2 すべて トピ主のみ(2)
タイトル
投稿者
トピ主です(トピ主)
2010年12月21日 10:45
読み返してみて誤解されてはいけないと思いましたので。
専業主婦の方々に対しての非難のトピではありません。
自分と異なる生き方に口を挟み、見下す友人に傷ついたという意味でした。
ユーザーID：4922693655
ミミミ
2010年12月21日 12:31
そんなに貰えるとは知りませんでした。それが当たり前なら完全に私は今まで貰い損ねてます。
実際色んな方がいますから、それくらい当たり前よ、という人もいれば
働いて自分の収入があっても、ある程度の付き合いや
服や化粧品等身だしなみに必要なもの買うくらいだよ、という人もいるでしょう。
でしょうというか私はそのくらいでした、小遣いと言えるのは。
多少の余裕があっても何かの備えに貯えようと思っていたし。
＞「見てて辛いよ。」
う〜ん、ずっと仲が良くて、傍でずっとトピ主さんを見てきた、という人の言葉なら
何かトピ主さんを思う気持ちから、ということも考えられないでもありませんが
久しぶりに会った大学時代の友人でしょ？
自分の価値観でしか人を計れないんでしょうね。
どう思おうと、本気で気に掛けているわけでもないのなら
当人に言うのはその友人の方が
只の無神経か自己満足と取られても仕方がないのでは？と思いますよ。
ご自分で自活してらっしゃるんだし、ご自分が懸命に働いて得ているお金です。
そんな相手の言に左右されないでいいんじゃないでしょうか？
ユーザーID：2946833519
兼業主婦
2010年12月21日 15:51
私はパート主婦です。
春から働き始めて、年間収入は65万でした。
それも、自分の小遣いにしたわけではなくて
何か時の為に、そのまま貯金をしています。
250万稼ぐ。と言うのは
大変な事なのです。
自信を持っていいですよ。
お友達も貴女の幸せを思って
その様な言い方で
貴女のやる気に火をつけたかったのかもしれませんが
結婚するのは
お金の為ではないし
貴女が幸せだと思える事が何より大切なのです。
ユーザーID：8761717105
オバチャン駐在員
2010年12月21日 15:52
アラフィフ独女なので細かいことは良く分かりませんが、巷に飛び交う情報からすると、旦那の年収600万とかで家族4人生活してる家庭がわんさかいるみたいで、その中から子供の教育費とかまで工面するのに四苦八苦されてる家庭も少なくないみたいじゃないですか。それで奥さんの小遣いが年間250万＝月20万以上が"普通"である訳ないですよ。そりゃあ旦那さんが相当な高額所得者で、月20万の小遣い使ってる奥さんも中にはいるでしょうが、それが"普通"レベルだとは到底思えません。
小遣いって、奥さんが自分の洋服や化粧品、アクセサリー買ったり、友人と食事・遊びに行ったり、家族全体の生活費以外に自由に使えるお金ってことでしょ。毎月々々洋服・化粧品等々に20万円使ってる（使える）奥さんのほうが少数派だと思いますけどね。
お子さんが3人もいて（＝教育費3人分）専業主婦のご友人が、毎月20万も小遣いあるんなら、旦那さんが相当な高給取りじゃないと到底無理だと思いますので、そんな"普通"の所得レベルじゃない人の言った事で傷つく必要ないですよ。

description.hltext_display: `명품몸매` 강예원, 여신급 화보 공개
description.content: [OSEN=봉준영 기자] 영화 ‘해운대’ ‘하모니’에 이어 ‘헬로우 � 스트’로 흥행 3연타를 노리는 배우 강예원이 ‘차도녀’로 변� 했다.웃음 속 폭풍 감동으로 평단을 사로잡은 영화 ‘헬로우 � 스트’의 여주인공 강예원이 22일 영화개봉을 앞두� 영화 주간지 무비위크와 패션여성지 슈어를 통해 2色 매� �의 화보를 공개했다.강예원은 화보를 통해 글래머러스한 몸매를 뽐내는가 하면 � � �� �이면서 드� �시한 의상과 스모키한 메이크업으로 � 혹� �인 여� 의 모습을 담아냈다.강예원이 차태현과 함께 주연을 맡은 영화 ‘헬로우 � 스트’는 외로워 죽� 싶은 남자 상만(차태현)이 한 맺힌 귀� 들의 황당 소원을 들어주다 생� 최� 의 순간을 맞이하게 되는 해피 코미디. 강예원은 극중 가족에 대한 상처가 있는 호스피스 연수로 분했다.bongjy@osen.co.kr 무비위크 � �공 [Copyright ⓒ 한국 최� 의 스포� 엔터테인먼트 � �문 미디어 OSEN(www.osen.co.kr) � �보및 보도자료 osenstar@osen.co.kr 무단� �재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: CII takes control of DP World's Australian assets
description.content:
DP World has sold 75 percent of its Australian stevedoring operations to Citi Infrastructure Investors (CII) for $1.5bn, the terminal operator revealed this afternoon.
Nearly fiive years after buying into the country through the purchase of P&O Ports, the Dubai-headquartered multinational says it will now provide management services to the Australian operation and management and staff of DP World Australia will be retained.
DP World Australia operates container terminals in Brisbane, Sydney, Melbourne, Adelaide and Fremantle.
For calendar 2009, DP World Australia generated gross earnings of $96m and the deal values the whole operation at $1.8bn.
The total proceeds will go towards reducing DP World’s net debt, which had ballooned due, in part, to the global financial crisis and had caused industry observers two years ago to speculate on a sell-off of its Australian assets.
DP World believes an ownership position in Australian stevedoring is not worth the investment, given its present needs.
“This strategic partnership provides a great opportunity for DP World to remain actively involved in Australia whilst delivering on our strategy to monetise assets as part of DP World’s ongoing goal to reduce leverage and focus on higher margin markets,” DP World Chief Financial Officer Yuvraj Narayan says.
“This transaction, including the benefits of the long-term management contract, will be earnings accretive for DP World from the time of completion.”
However, this did not seem to concern CII.
“We look forward to working with DP World's team in Australia and we are committed to ongoing investment in the business to ensure that DP World Australia continues to offer customers the highest level of service and is well positioned to meet future growth opportunities in this attractive market,” Holly Koeppel, Co-Head of CII and chairwoman elect of DP World Australia, says
Completion, subject to regulatory approvals, is expected towards the end of the first quarter of 2011.
The deal does not involve changes for P&O Maritime Services.

description.hltext_display: В Западной Европе холодные и снежные зимы могут продлиться пять-десять лет
Artsy activities enrich winter break
description.content:
For some kids, a two-week vacation from school is an invitation to binge on video games, Christmas candy and marathon sessions of TV watching. But the lengthy holiday break also can be a time of learning with mom and dad. Its easy to get distracted with the flurry of tasks to accomplish around the holidays, said Anna Sayre, operations and education manager at The Hands On Childrens Museum in Olympia. But with children out of school, this is a prime opportunity to spend quality time together doing activities that stimulate curiosity, creativity and learning that support your childs social and developmental growth.While the experiences can take place in outings to museums, ski slopes and the like, the home can be a prime place for fun and enrichment. Im a big proponent of doing art projects at home, and not sticking kids in front of the TV, said Angela Hudson, museum educator for youth and family programs at the Tacoma Art Museum. Its such a perfect time to do a project together. Mom could do part of it, and kids could do some of it. Then it becomes a community type project within the family. Hudson recommends parents talk with young children as they work together on activities. Statements such as Were cutting circles or Youre picking up scissors bolster preschoolers language development as they learn to match actions and objects with words. Parents of older children can mention concepts such as composition, foreground and background. The main thing is to have parents repeat what theyre doing, even if its obvious, Hudson said.Cheryle Bigelow of Spanaway found the perfect activity to keep kids occupied while teaching them about wildlife. Put the kids to work baking cookies for their winged friends, Bigelow wrote in an e-mail. The Internet will share many recipes for cookies, biscuits and even gingerbread tailored especially for birds.Bigelows recipe includes pancake flour, peanut butter and birdseed, and calls for the cookies to be baked.
She recently supervised her great-grandson Dylan Leeper, 5, and great-niece Jessie May Perry, 7, in baking the bird treats.
Black-capped Chickadees, Chestnut-back Chickadees, Red-breasted Nuthatches, Sparrows and Dark-Eyed Juncos stuff themselves on the cookies in her backyard.I think its a good project because its not real expensive and it helps the birds. At this time of year, they can use a little extra food. If theres leftover bird seed you can spread it in the backyard and the kids can watch the birds eat it, Bigelow said. I think they learn something from watching birds.Here are project ideas for kids to do at home: Find and use things from nature to create art. Pine cones, leaves and twigs can be turned into magical creatures with a little glue, ribbon, felt, buttons and some imagination. Look through your gadget and sewing drawers to find unusual objects to turn into crafts. Let kids help with holiday cooking projects. Measuring and following directions are skills they can build while having fun. Search the Internet for childrens activities and directions, including printables. Those are projects, such as coloring pages and craft templates, that can be downloaded and printed for kids. Make homemade Play-Doh from this basic recipe:
1 cup white flour
1 cup water
12 cup salt
1 teaspoon cream of tartar
1 tablespoon vegetable oil
Food coloring
Optional: glitter and scents such as cinnamon and ginger
Mix all in a 2-quart nonstick saucepan, stirring constantly over medium heat till mixture thickens and pulls away from sides of pan. Within 5 minutes, it will form a smooth, elastic ball. Remove from heat, let cool slightly, and knead for 3 minutes. Store at room temperature in airtight container. Make your own bubbles from this recipe:
14 cup Dawn or Joy liquid dish soap
212 cups water
1/16 cup Karo syrup
Place water in quart container. Add liquid dish soap and Karo syrup and stir slowly to mix. Let mixture stand overnight if possible. The longer it stands the better it is. Fashion a homemade bubble wand from pipe cleaners or wire. Make bubbles. Make gift wrapping paper by using cut vegetables as stamps. Dip in tempera paint on a cut-open brown paper bag or a roll of packaged wrapping paper. Potatoes work well. Kids can also place cedar or leaves on a paper plate, roll with paint and press on paper to make a beautiful print. Kids can help decorate the holiday table by making napkin rings. Use paper towel tubes cut into rings. Decorate with ribbon, leaves, glitter or other materials. Cut snowflakes out of white or decorative paper and create garlands to add a winter decorative touch to the house. Make anklets, bracelets and necklaces out of inexpensive beads, plastic lacing, cord and other jewelry materials available at craft stores. Pre-made kits with alphabet beads are available from Tacoma-based Personalized Bead Kits at www.personalizedbeadkits.com or beads4u@personalized beadkits.com. Make a Paper Plate Wreath with the following materials and directions:
Paper plate
Glue
Scissors
Hole-puncher
1- to 2-inch cut squares of tissue paper in holiday colors
12-inch length of ribbon
Carefully cut the center out of a paper plate to leave a round shape. This will form the base of the wreath.
Scrunch the pieces of tissue squares into paper balls.
Using a small amount of glue attach the tissue balls to the paper plate. The plate may be covered completely or sparingly.
Using the hole-puncher put two holes at the top of your wreath.
Thread the 12-inch ribbon through the two holes from back to front and tie a bow.
Hang the wreath for all to enjoy. Kids 4 years old and older can make a waterless snow globe from these materials and directions:
Small glass jar or clear plastic cup
Flat piece of Styrofoam, about 1/2-inch thick
Small figurines such as trees and animals (or see below for items needed to make a mini-snowman)
Iridescent flakes or glitter
2 miniature Styrofoam balls, smaller than a golf ball
Toothpick
Small piece of black construction paper or felt
Scissors
Glue
Piece of ribbon or yarn
Plastic bag tie threaded with wire
Black felt-tip pen
Globe directions: Using the cup or jar as you would a cookie cutter, press the mouth of the cup into the Styrofoam, twisting it slightly to push it through to the bottom of the foam.
Stick the base of your figurines into the Styrofoam to secure them. Use a small amount of glue on the bottom if they dont stay secure on their own.If you dont have figurines, you can make a miniature snowman.
Snowman directions: Connect two small Styrofoam balls with a toothpick inserted down the center, leaving the edges of the toothpick exposed on both sides.
Add eyes and mouth with a black felt-tip marker.
Add a nose by trimming the edges of an orange plastic tie so that the edges come to a point. Cut it 1/2- to 3/4-of-an-inch long, and insert into the top snowmans head. Add a scarf by tying a piece of ribbon or yarn around the snowmans neck.Make top hat by using a rectangular piece of black construction paper or felt. Curl it around so that it forms a cylinder and glue or staple the overlapping edge together. Cut a circle larger than the circumference of the cylinder to create the brim of the hat and pierce it through the top of the toothpick. Glue the top portion of the hat to the base, covering the exposed tip of the toothpick.
Secure the snowman to the base of the snow globe by inserting the bottom of the toothpick into it.
Next, pour about a tablespoon of glitter into the bottom of the plastic cup. Carefully invert the Styrofoam base and slip it into the lip of the cup so that it fits snugly in place.
Turn the cup or jar right side up to watch snow fall on the snowman.
Source: The Hands On Childrens Museum, Tacoma Art Museum, Kim Knox of Personalized Bead Kits, LLC.
Debby Abe: 253-597-8694 debby.abe@thenewstribune.com

description.hltext_display: Lluvias de otoño que afectan al verano
description.author: P. Feixas
description.content:
Buena parte de la actividad económica de los municipios costeros depende del verano y de los turistas que durante esos meses se desplazan hasta la provincia para disfrutar de sus playas. Así, las duras embestidas meteorológicas que ha sufrido la zona desde hace unos tres años tienen sus consecuencias en los meses de más calor. Sus infraestructuras y su imagen se ven perjudicadas por la lluvia, y eso se paga. Sin ir más lejos, el pasado verano se le quitó la bandera azul a playa de Calahonda, una de las dos que ostentaba la provincia. Según la Asociación de Educación Ambiental y del Consumidor (Adeac), organismo encargado de reconocer la calidad de las playas, la pérdida de la enseña se debió a las lluvias y tormentas de principios de año.
Más que atentos a los perjuicios que la meteorología puede suponer para la zona, en Motril se han realizado obras de mejora en la playa del Pelaíllo, que han hecho que las lluvias de estos días no sean tan perjudiciales como las del pasado invierno. Incluso se han hecho salidas de agua en la playa de Poniente para que el agua se encamine a la rambla o a la playa, lo que ha evitado que algunas edificaciones sufran ahora como el año pasado. Estas soluciones ya fueron catalogadas como provisionales hasta que se acomentan las obras comprometidas por la Junta, que implicarían un saneamiento completo de la zona.
Pese a los planes, la intensidad de la lluvia (85 litros desde el pasado sábado en Motril) ha motivado que se repitieran algunas escenas que ya se vivieron el pasado invierno, como son comercios anegados y agua en algunas cocheras.
Como no podía ser de otra manera, esta cuestión también centra el debate político en la ciudad. Mientras Flor Almón, candidata socialista al PSOE, acusa al Ayuntamiento de imprevisión, la concejal de Relaciones Institucionales, Elena Vallejo, responsabilizó a la Junta y afirmó que "a Mancomunidad y el Ayuntamiento de Motril han exigido a la Consejería de Medio Ambiente la firma definitiva del Convenio, que lleva ya un retraso considerable, sin que hasta el momento se haya recibido contestación alguna".Almón, por su parte, afirmó que "si hubieran mantenido limpios los cauces para la salida de agua de la vega y el Consistorio o la Mancomunidad hubieran invertido en la modernización de las redes de saneamiento, abastecimiento y pluviales de los barrios de Varadero y Santa Adela" podrían haberse evitado los últimos incidentes.

description.hltext_display: “김성민, 속옷에 마약 숨겨 국내 반입”
description.content: 김성민이 필리핀에서 구입한 필로폰을 속옷 또는 여행가방에 넣어 국내에 반입한 것으로 밝혀졌다.22일 서울중앙지검 강� �부(김희준 부장검사)에 따르면 김성민은 2008년 4월 필리핀 세부의 한 호텔에서 약 30만원을 주� 필로폰을 산 뒤 막탄공항에서 비행기를 타� 인천공항을 통해 귀국했다. 이 과� �에서 마약류를 속옷과 여행가방에 숨겨 출입국심사대를 통과한 것으로 알� �졌다.지난 8월까지 총 3차례에 걸쳐 상당량의 필로폰을 국내 반입한 혐의를 받� 있다. 또한, 5월과 9월 수차례에 걸쳐 주거지인 서울 역삼동의 한 오피스텔에서 필로폰을 주입하� 대마초를 흡연한 혐의도 받았다.한편, 검찰은 22일 김성민을 구속기소하면서 "마약사건과 관� �된 연예인이 3명 � �도 더 있다"며 수사확대 방침을 밝혔다.� �지원 기자 [cinezzang@joongang.co.kr]

description.hltext_display: Los atletas españoles quieren hacer frente al poderío africano en Venta Baños
description.content:
Valladolid.- La inmensa mayoría de los atletas españoles que han participado en el último campeonato de Europa de Cross celebrado en Portugal se citarán mañana en la XXXI edición del Cross Internacional de Venta de Baños (Palencia), donde intentarán hacer frente al poderío de los corredores africanos.
En este sentido, tomarán la salida a las 14,00 horas atletas de la talla de Jesús España, Antonio Abadía, Ricardo Serrano o Chema Martínez, quien debuta en la localidad palentina en la temporada de campo a través con el firme objetivo de estar en el Mundial de Punta Umbría (Huelva).
Unos atletas que intentarán que los kenianos Vincent Kiprop Chepkok, segunda mejor marca mundial del año de 5.000 metros, Lucas Kimeli, octava mejor marca mundial de 5.000 metros, y Jhon Kipkoech, mejor marca mundial de 3.000 metros, no impongan su ritmo y acaben adjudicándose la prueba.
Mientras, en sénior femenino (12,30 horas), destaca la presencia de la keniana Margaret Muriuki, sexta clasificada en el anterior Mundial, la etíope Emebet Anteneh y las portuguesas Ana Días y Filomena Costa.
La representación española está comandada por Nuria Fernández, Alessandra Aguilar, Diana Martín, Sonia Nejarano, Teresa Urbina o Cristina Jordán.
Todos ellos buscarán la victoria en un circuito duro en lo que a sus obstáculos se refiere y que se prevé que esté muy embarrado, lo que lo complicará aún más.
Al margen de la categoría absoluta, durante la mañana del domingo se celebrarán pruebas correspondientes a todas las categorías de base, por lo que la organización contempla la participación de entre 1.200 y 1.400 atletas.

description.hltext_display: Британские ученые доказали существование параллельных миров
description.author: daily
description.content:
11:13 РБК daily
Специалисты обнаружили гравитационное воздействие чужих миров на нашу Вселенную. Открытие было сделано в ходе изучения карт реликтового излучения, сохранившегося в простанстве с начальных этапов существования.
Ученые из Университетского колледжа Лондона обнаружили признаки существования параллельных миров. Открытие было сделано в ходе изучения карт реликтового излучения Вселенной. Проведенный анализ выявил несколько аномальных круглых зон, которые отличаются повышенной температурой. По мнению специалистов, такая аномалия может объясняеться гравитационными воздействиями чужих миров на наш.
Физик и астроном Стефан Фини, участвующий в исследованиях отмечает, что в ходе изучения круглых зон он и его коллеги пришли к выводу, что это своего рода «космические выбоины», оставшиеся после столкновения параллельных вселенных. Интересно, что свете этой теории наша собственная Вселенная представляется лишь одним из «пузырьков», блуждающих в пространстве, которые могут сталкиваться между собой. По предположениям ученых, наш "пузырь-вселенная" пережила не менее четырех подобных столкновений.
По общепринятому убеждению наша Вселенная зародилась в результате Большого Взрыва около 13 млрд. лет назад. Спустя 300 млн. начали формироваться звезды и галактики, а солнце - центр нашей системы - возникло всего пять млрд. лет назад.

description.hltext_display: Another View: If education fails, nothing else succeeds
description.content:
TO believe California education isn't in trouble is to deny reality. It is. It has been for years. And the future doesn't look bright.
Despite the billions we spend - critics say lavishly - on education, this state spends less per student than all but three other states.
Roughly 40 percent of the state's general fund budget goes to K-12 education, but in the past two years, school funding has fallen by $21 billion.
Among the results: teacher layoffs, crowded classrooms, cancellation of summer school and a shorter school year.
What's going on?
Student enrollment is expected to turn upward in the coming years, but the teaching force is declining, from about 310,000 teachers two years ago to fewer than 300,000 today. The drop in the number of novice teachers is even greater. About one-third of the state's teachers are 50 or older.
In the past seven years, the number of college students enrolled in teacher preparation programs has dropped by 40 percent, from about 75,000 to fewer than 45,000. There has been a 33percent drop in the number of teaching credentials issued in that same seven-year period, from about 27,000 to about 18,000.
How are we going to keep them teaching?
"Invest we must," a new report that studies the teaching profession, concluded, "or soon risk facing the same circumstances that placed our most vulnerable students a decade ago in schools with the least
prepared andyld_mgr.place_ad_here("adPosBox"); experienced teachers."
The report goes on:
"Additionally, this state spends less on K-12 education than on many other public services, relative to the national average in each area.
The state faces a massive and seemingly ever-growing budget deficit estimated at $28 billion over the next 18 months. Every government operation, every program is being squeezed, from keeping potholes filled and bridges repaired to keeping dangerous criminals incarcerated and police on the job. Certainly, cuts have come to our classrooms.
No more do we hear school trustees and other officials declare that they will keep budget cuts as far from the classroom as possible. The evidence is visible to anyone who walks onto a school campus.
But the thing about cutting school resources is that it endangers the great economic engine of our future. There are few government functions more important than education. National defense and police protection, perhaps, but even those functions depend on an educated work force.
California must find a way to reinvigorate its
education system, from kindergarten through
graduate school. It's too important to do otherwise.
The Record, Stockton

description.hltext_display: МВФ завершил продажу более 400 тонн золотого запаса
description.content:
Согласно сообщению МВФ от 21 декабря, организация уже завершила программу по реализации 400 тонн золотого запаса, о начале которой было объявлено в сентябре 2009 года.
Исполком Международного валютного фонда 19 сентября одобрил продажу части золотых запасов в объеме 403,3 метрической тонны для того, чтобы из вырученных средств предоставить финансовую помощь беднейшим странам. Согласно предлагаемой МВФ схеме, фонд продавал золото непосредственно центральным банкам или другим официальным держателям. При этом все сделки заключались по рыночным ценам и не проводились одновременно, чтобы не оказывать негативного влияния на рынки.
Программа состояла из двух этапов. В ходе первой фазы, о завершении которой МВФ сообщил 18 февраля 2010 года, продажи производились вне рынка официальным держателям, всего по такой схеме было продано 212 метрических тонн золота. Покупателями выступили � езервный банк Индии (200 тонн), Центробанк Маврикия (2 тонны) и Центробанк Шри-Ланки (10 тонн). -о-

description.hltext_display: Мошенник обманул Сбербанк на 3 млрд. рублей
description.author: daily
description.content:
10:59 РБК daily
Подозреваемый заключил в банке более десяти кредитных договоров, однако возвращать денежные средства не собирался. По данным МВД, общая сумма ущерба составила почти 3 млрд. руб.
В Москве задержан подозреваемый в хищении денежных средств у Сбербанка России на сумму 2,7 млрд руб., сообщает департамент экономической безопасности МВД России.
По данным следствия, задержанный, в период с 2005 по 2008 года, являясь руководителем различных коммерческих организаций, заключил 13 кредитных договоров с банком на сумму 2,7 млрд руб. и семь договоров займа с одной из лизинговых компаний в размере 75 млн руб. "Однако, возвращать денежные средства не намеревался", - отмечают в ДЭБ.
Задержанным оказался 52-летний уроженец города Ярославля. Как сообщает МВД, против него возбуждено уголовное дело по статье - "мошенничество". В отношении подозреваемого избрана мера пресечения - заключение под стражу.

description.hltext_display: 新卒１年で解雇されました。助けて下さい。 - たびたびすみません
description.content:
私は今年の４月に正社員（試用期間有）として働いてきました。
離職率が高い社員10人の小さな会社です。（営業）
今日、会社に行ったら突然解雇を言い渡され、明日から来なくていいと言われました。
理由は「勤務態度が悪い、売上も上げてない」とのことでした。
自分で言うのもなんですが売上は新人リーグでは４位で売上もそこそこだったので、
反論しようとしたところ部長に足やイスを蹴られたり罵声を浴びせられました。
誓約書に勤務態度が悪いと処罰すると書いてあるから、訴えても意味ないということも言われました。
「会社都合ということでよろしいですか？」と確認したんですが
「そんなわけないだろ。自己都合だ。荷物をまとめて退職届書いてきなさい」
と言われて帰ってきたんですが、
これは会社都合にはできないのでしょうか？
私の勤務態度がいけなかったのでしょうか？
もう頭がぐちゃぐちゃです。
すぐに泣きながら、ハローワークに行ったのですが
ハローワークの方が仰るには、実習型雇用で人を採用すると助成金（100万）が出るらしく
それは６か月使用期間を終えて、正社員になった段階で支給されるようです。
恐らく、その申請が今月おりたので解雇にしたのだろうということでした。
１回会社都合にすると、これからハローワークで求人をかけた時に
助成金？をもらうことができなくなるので会社都合を拒否しているんだと思います。
悔しくて情けなくて涙がとまりません。
自己都合の場合、再就職はこのご時世厳しいですよね？
ちなみに、様子はボイスレコーダーに録音しました。
裁判も視野に入れてますが、長期化すると失業保険の手続きも遅れるので
私が我慢するしかないのかでしょうか。
最後まで読んで下さりありがとうございました。
長文・乱文失礼しました。
ユーザーID：9183115013
お気に入り登録数：537
古いレス順
レス数：99本
1 2 3 4 5 すべて トピ主のみ(5)
タイトル
投稿者
ュゥ
2010年12月10日 11:08
ハローワークはあてにならん。
労働局か労働基準局(どっちだったっけな・・・)に行きなさい。
レコーダーに入ってるなら大丈夫よ。
給与のこと、雇用保険のことも一緒に相談。
知り合いに社労士がいればそっちでもいいけど。
ユーザーID：8020282539
みかん
2010年12月10日 11:31
貴方が毅然とした態度で闘って、次の就職先を探すか、
ここで腐ってフリーターやワーキングプアになるかどちらかです。
労働基準局には相談にいきましたか？
ここで意見を募るよりよっぽど建設的なアドバイスがもらえると思いますよ。
録音までしているならなおさらです。
しかも「自己都合」退職となると今後の就職活動にも響きます。
・助成金目当ての不当な解雇
・部長の常識の範囲を超えた暴言・暴力
・不条理な新卒切り
これらを早く立証し、次のステップに踏み出してください。
地方自治体の無料法律相談などもあります。
ユーザーID：0796675593
大腸亭
2010年12月10日 16:44
既にレスされている方の書いておられる通りですが、厳密には、
「労働基準監督署」と言うと思います。
wikiから引用しますと、
「厚生労働省の各都道府県労働局の管内に複数設置される出先機関で、（略）労働条件及び労働者の保護に関する監督を行う。」
とあります。厚生労働省のサイトをご覧になると、所在地や利用時間などが分かります。
ユーザーID：7424348447
orz
2010年12月10日 16:51
>>社員10人の小さな会社です。
>>売上は新人リーグでは４位
社員10人って社長と部長を除いた
残りの社員8人のうち営業は何人なの？
就業規則に（使用期間じゃなくて）
試用期間終了時の解雇規則等は書かれていなかったの？
勤務態度の評価は直属の上司の評価だから
監督署も口だし出来ないけどね。
泣いていないでその辺をしっかり確認して下さい。
基準監督署に就業規則が届け出してある会社なのかな？
ユーザーID：4864523177
ガラムマサラ
2010年12月10日 19:16
>ハローワークの方が仰るには、実習型雇用で人を採用すると助成金（100万）が出るらしく
>それは６か月使用期間を終えて、正社員になった段階で支給されるようです。
>恐らく、その申請が今月おりたので解雇にしたのだろうということでした。
トライアル雇用とかって言うやつでしょうか？
期間が終わるとポイ捨てする企業があるとの噂は聞いていましたが酷いですね…。
そんな会社、さっさと辞めて良いと思いますが、会社都合にはさせたいですね。
そして、その制度を明らかに悪用している事を把握しながら、黙認する職安。
まずは、労基に相談がいいと思います。
それでも、どうにもならないようでしたら、悔しいでしょうが、今回は、社会の黒い部分を体験した。勉強したと思って、次に心を切り替えましょう。
1年で10人中4位の営業成績を残せるあなたなら、きっと大丈夫ですよ。
ユーザーID：4012800321
応援団
2010年12月10日 20:02
ほかの方のおっしゃってる通りです。
その会社許せない。
戦ってください。
ユーザーID：9076596194
あんまん
2010年12月10日 21:58
１０人位で人の入れ替わりの多い会社でしょ
個人ではいれる「ユニオン」があるはずです
入会金や会費みたいなのが必要だけど２〜３０００円位だし
助言もしてくれて交渉の場にも同席してくれます
解決したら退会もできるし役人とトピ様と会社の社長の三つ巴で話すより
「ユニオン」の交渉の専門家とトピ様と役人と社長の図式のほうが
心強いと思いますよ
録音されてるし絶対にトピ様に有利に展開できます
今後の為にも 引き下がらないでくださいね
「ユニオン」はPCで検索したら近場のがすぐ ヒツトするでしょう
ユーザーID：8509927276
まみ(トピ主)
2010年12月10日 22:20
トピ主です
皆様ありがとうございます。
まとめてのお返事申し訳ありません。
今日、監督署の行ってきました。
一度書面を送り、それでも返答がない場合に
監督署が仲介で入るみたいです。
でも、社長は恐らくあっせんでも無視を貫くと思います。
会社は営業6人です。
新人リーグは版元のトップパートナーの会社10社の新人で競うので
私の会社内だけではないです。
詳細を書かず申し訳ありません。
就業規則を監督署に提出しているのかは分からないです。
勤務態度で解雇になることはあるのですか？
もし、それで解雇だとしてそれは私が悪いということで自己都合に
されてしまうのでしょうか？
ユーザーID：9183115013
へ
2010年12月10日 23:27
トピ主さん、出勤していきなり解雇を言い渡されたんですよね。
突然の事なのにボイスレコーダーに録音できたんですね。
トピ主さんは毎日ボイスレコーダーを持ち歩いているんですか？
なんのために？
ユーザーID：2245398757
くるり
2010年12月11日 1:54
ひどい。
トライアル雇用？という
ポイ捨ての実態があるのはしっていましたが
それをハローワークも把握してるんですね。
私たちの税金が
そんな心ない馬鹿企業の肥やしになっていると思うと
腹煮えくり返りです。
ボイスレコーダーにとってあるなら
強みなのでは？
負けずに、絶対心折れないで、頑張って下さい。
何もできませんが
心から応援してます。
ユーザーID：4890695896
はる
2010年12月11日 2:24
自己都合のハンコウは絶対に押さないで。
断固として拒否しなさい。普通は、明日から来なくていいとは、労働基準法に違反してます。
今回のケンは、両親に出てもらいなさい。
1ヶ月分の保証をしてもらい、断固会社都合に。
あと売り上げが悪くないデータなら、どこか悪いのかを見せて貰って下さい。
労働基準局へ今後のことを相談。
ハンコウは軽く押してはダメ。
ユーザーID：8157812052
リリ〜
2010年12月11日 5:46
ハロワいったって、所詮は職業斡旋所です。
紹介するだけですから「あらあら、まぁまぁ、可哀相ね」で終わりですよ。
いわゆる不正解雇ですよね。
ボイスレコーダーに録音してあるなら話は早いです。
言った言わないの争いにならずに済みますから。
(そういう人たちですから「でっち上げだ！」ともなりそうですが)
大変かもしれないですが、そういう企業を野放しにして、
助成金？も恐らく税金から成っているはずです。
是非とも無料で相談に乗ってくれる弁護士もいることですし、
弁護士に相談の上、労働基準監督署へ通告してみてください。
ユーザーID：5317910854
ピョン吉
2010年12月11日 9:37
制度の悪用ですね。色々、不安だと思います。腹立たし気持ち
も消えませんよね。一度、「法テラス」で相談してみたら、い
かがですか？？？
相談の後半に、もし裁判になった場合の費用。金額、日数など
確認してみたらいかがですか。
自分は交通裁判でしたが、全部、代理人(弁護士さん)が対応して
くれて、月1回、裁判所で打ち合わせ、和解まで、約半年でした。
思う程、時間、金額はかからないと思います。
もちろん、法テラスは、無料です
ユーザーID：2244412770
げこ
2010年12月11日 10:23
この場合、解雇できないという法律はありますか？あれば法律名と条文を教えてください。
なければ民事的な問題となりますが、労働基準監督署では民事の問題は扱ってくれませんし、労働局では、強制力のない話し合いで、しかも相手が拒否したら何もできないし、拒否した会社側に不利益を課してもいけないということになっています。
問題の解決には、事実上は裁判所しかないと思います。
