description.content: В составе нижнекамской команды в столицу Башкортостана отправились 2 вратаря и 21 полевой игрок.

description.hltext_display: Man knocked out in Guilford assault (The West Australian)
description.content:
Police are hunting for a group of people who knocked an 18-year-old man unconscious in an attack near Guilford Grammar school oval yesterday.
Rueben, whose family has asked for his full name not to be published, was walking along Great Eastern Highway at about 12.30am when he noticed a group of people appear near the Guilford weighbridge across the road.
Two men from the group, which consisted of two females and five males estimated to be about 18-19 years old, approached the victim and demanded his belongings.
When he tried to back away, he was punched and thrown to the ground, briefly losing consciousness before being assaulted again.
The offenders stole his backpack before running away when a car drove nearby.
Rueben was taken to hospital for medical treatment.
One of the offenders was described as being 180cm tall and slim with dark skin, very short black hair and a light moustache. He was wearing a black hooded jumper with a white logo, denim shorts and sneakers.
The other man is described as being just under 180cm tall, slim with dark skin and brown, loose curly hair. He was wearing a white hooded jumper and white sneakers.
Anyone with information is asked to call Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000.

description.hltext_display: Mayport Ferry: State should step up
description.author: Times-Union
description.content:
The St. Johns River Ferry has been an albatross around the neck of local government since the late Gov. Lawton Chiles’ veto pen discontinued state funding nearly two decades ago.
That could change next year if the local legislative delegation enlists support from Rick Scott.
The incoming governor hasn’t talked about the issue yet. But if a bill to restore funding reaches Scott’s desk next year, a spokesman says, he will consider its merits with an open mind.
Fair enough.
The St. Johns River Ferry — commonly called the Mayport Ferry — bridges a gap of less than a mile in Florida A1A between Mayport village and Fort George Island.
After Chiles defunded the ferry, citizens of Jacksonville subsidized it for a few years. The Jacksonville Port Authority took over in 2007, when the city no longer could afford the losses.
JaxPort is to be commended for keeping the ferry going, at considerable cost. Last fiscal year alone, it lost more than $900,000.
But, realistically, the ferry is nothing more than a “floating bridge.” It connects two pieces of a state road.
When he vetoed a bill to restore partial funding in 2007, Gov. Charlie Crist said he had been told the ferry was just a tourist attraction.
But that was not true. For every tourist who rides the ferry, a 2004 survey found, 12 locals use it for personal or business reasons.
It isn’t the state’s job to fund local tourist attractions, of course. The state is responsible, however, for making its own road system functional.
But, state officials have argued in the past that there is another alternative.� Motorists can get from Mayport to Fort George Island by driving over the Wonderwood Expressway, across the Dames Point bridge and down Heckscher Drive.
But that’s 48 miles, round trip, a JaxPort spokeswoman says. A round-trip ferry ride is less than two miles.
In what other city does the state tell motorists to go 48 miles out of their way on a routine, daily commute?
The ferry is needed, and it’s unfair to ask JaxPort to continue underwriting the cost of making the state road system workable.
Governors typically rely on aides for advice.� Make sure Scott hears the arguments for restored funding.

event_or_fact.property: he had been told the ferry was just a tourist attraction

description.hltext_display: Bangalore Metro to clock 4,000km before getting safety stamp
description.content:
Namma Metro trains can be spotted on the elevated tracks in the heart of the city by month-end. Those excited by the possibility of a ride, however, will have to wait.
The metro trains will have to travel a distance of 4,000 km before a safety commissioner issues a certificate.
This certificate is necessary before the train is allowed to open its doors to commuters.
The safety commission comprises a committee of engineers and experts appointed by the Government of India to test whether the train is safe for the public. The safety commissioner will have to be convinced beyond doubt. Only then will a certificate be issued that will allow us to open to the public. The process will take time, a source in the Bangalore Metro Rail Corporation Limited (BMRCL) said.
The standard practice in India is to make the metro train run on a specific track for 4,000 km. In case of the Delhi Metro, the safety certificate was not issued for the track extending from the Commonwealth Games Village to the airport, as the safety commissioner was not convinced during the tests.
The BMRCL is all set to complete its task of running the metro train on the main line track by the end of December 2010. Technical experts from Bharat Earth Movers Limited (BEML), Korea and Japan were spotted inspecting the tracks and the MG Road station as well as the Swami Vivekananda station on Old Madras Road, near Byappanahalli.
Meanwhile, the first train brought to the city in October is being tested on the track in the Byappanahalli metro depot. This 800-metre long testing track is electrified. All automatic functions too are being tested in the depot.
The electrification of the third rail has started at the Byappanahalli station. This third rail has two lines, like any other rail track. Either of the lines could supply electricity to both the tracks at the Swami Vivekananda station, as also to the elevated tracks.
Cabling work for this purpose began on Tuesday morning. This makes it unlikely that the tracks will be ready for use before the end of January. However, the BMRCL is also trying to keep its promise to run trial runs of the train between CMH Road station and Vivekananda station by the year-end.

description.hltext_display: Stopgap spending measure clears Congress
description.content: Congress cleared a stopgap funding bill Tuesday to keep the federal government open into March, a temporary truce until Republicans and President Barack Obama rejoin the battle over the budget next year.

description.hltext_display: Activision seeking EA’s addition in ongoing West-Zampella lawsuit
description.content:
In addition to making EA part of the case, Activision is seeking $US400 million in damages from the trio and also wants the compensation awarded to its two "faithless executives” back while they were working with the company.
It seems like the publisher of worldwide blockbuster gaming title "Call of Duty: Black Ops,” Activision Inc. is not in mood to let either its ex-Infinity Ward execs Jason West and Vince Zampella (who defected few months back) or their support Electronic Arts walk easily away from the mess they created.
Activision on Tuesday filed a cross-complaint in the Los Angeles Superior Court, requesting the judge to include its arch-rival EA as a defendant, in the ongoing case that also includes its ex-former execs.
As per Activision’s new amended filing, "EA conspired with two former senior Activision executives, West and Zampella to derail Activision's Call of Duty franchise, disrupt its Infinity Ward development studio, and inflict serious harm on the company.”
The filing further stated EA knew beforehand that West and Zampella were legally bound to Activision for additional two years when it started to provoke them to conspire against the company in 2009.
In addition to making EA part of the case, Activision is seeking $US400 million in damages from the trio and also wants the compensation awarded to its two "faithless executives” back while they were working with the company.
Other allegations
In the 39-page filing, Activision unveiled a set of new allegations against West and Zampella and their supporter EA.
As per the new filing, “The unlawful conduct came from the highest levels at EA, including EA CEO, John Riccitiello, and Chief Operating Officer, John Schappert, with direct support from the high profile talent agency, Creative Artists Agency, and even a former member of Activision's Board of Directors and former Activision lawyer.”
The filing further stated EA knew beforehand that West and Zampella were legally bound to Activision for additional two years when it started to provoke them to conspire against the company in 2009.
As per Activision, EA tried to steal away their top game developers "so that they could make another run at competing with Activision.” The publisher is also accusing West and Zampella of copying certain confidential material and sharing it with EA.
How it all started
It all started in the summer of 2009, as per Activision, when its rival EA started luring its Infinity Ward heads with the motive to cause irreparable damage to the company.
After finding out about duo’s numerous meetings with EA, Activision fired West and Zampella on charges of "breaches of contract and insubordination" in March 2010.
The duo sued Activision alleging that the publisher is falsely accusing them as they do not want to pay them their share of royalties earned from COD sales and that’s also the reason for their termination.
On April 9 Activision countersued and called its former execs “self-severing schemers.”
On April 12, West and Zampella announced the launch of their own gaming studio Respawn Entertainment, funded by EA.
Activision faced another crisis when nearly half of its Infinity Ward employees started resigning and by end of May 46 employees had left. However, it successfully reformed it.

event_or_fact.property: the launch of their own gaming studio Respawn Entertainment, funded by EA

description.hltext_display: 子育てをしながらの看護学校卒業を経験された方 - 二度目の投稿です
description.author: kanako
description.content:
2010年12月19日 18:29
こんにちは、トピを開いていただきありがとうございます。
トピタイトルの方にぜひ実情を教えていただきたくトピを立てました。
辛口大歓迎です、どうか率直な意見をいただければと思います。
私は現在30歳で、7ヶ月の子供がおります。
夫は11歳年上のため、ある程度子供が育ったら働きに出なければならないと考えています。今までは受付・サービス業が主でした。
出産を機に、大変素晴らしい看護師さん達と出会い、できることならこのような職場で働きたいと感じました。
正看護師の資格を考えており、今すぐにではなく、子供が10歳になったころ通学を始めようと思っています。（なるべく幼少期は子供と一緒に居てあげたい、子供が中学生になった頃にはしっかり働きたい為。またもっと遅くだと、50歳を目前にしての通学は気力体力がついていかなそうなイメージがあったため。）
１．日中の通学でもやはり帰宅は遅くなるのでしょうか。
夫の帰りは遅い為やはり子供をひとり、夜間家に残すのは心配です。
２．それまで専業の予定ですが、家でしておくべきことはありますか（就職の間口が広がりそうなので今話せる英語やその他の言語の更にレベルを高めようかと私は考えています。もちろん受験勉強もします。）
３．子育てと両立された方は何が一番大変でしたか？
以上のことを教えてください。
ちなみに夫は資格をとることに賛成ですが、実際問題として、毎日早く帰宅することは無理なのでやはり子供のことを心配しています。
また、婚家は遠く、私の実家はやはり毎日通える距離ではないのでそちらの協力は得られないものと考えています。（子供の発熱時など緊急時は実家に連絡しようと思っています）
教えてくださいと要求ばかりで恐縮ですが、ぜひ先輩方の実体験を書き込んでいただけたらうれしいです。よろしくお願いします。
ユーザーID：7491563028
お気に入り登録数：65
古いレス順
レス数：12本
タイトル
投稿者
もり
2010年12月19日 19:41
看護師休職・育児中ですが、今の状況で看護学校に行こうと思ったら不可能だとは思いません。
１．授業は朝・昼〜で終業３〜５時くらいでした。
終業後アルバイトをしていた時間があったくらいですから、その時間を家事・育児に当てようと思ったら可能だと思います。
２．高校卒業程度の知識と、常識的な面接が出来ればいいと思います。
もちろん偏差値に合った希望校にすれば、の話しです。
３.ただ実習はちょっと無理かも・・・。
連日、慣れない環境と人間関係にレポートの提出、そして最後に待つ国家試験勉強。
実習の年は、家族の自立・協力がなければ無理だと思います。
１０歳からだと主さんは４０歳ですよね。
少しでも早いほうがいいと思うのですが、お子さんの小学校入学と同時くらいでもいいのでは？と思います。
ユーザーID：0551763581
kanako
2010年12月19日 19:41
子育てをしながら看護学校に通う…というトピは過去に何回も出ていると思いますので、それらを参考になさればいいと思います。それらのアドバイス内容は、大げさでもなんでもなく真実です。
今できることといえば…
私が通っていた看護学校では、一般教養の科目は他大学での単位を認定してもらえていました。（他の看護学校でもこの制度はあるようですよ。）
私の看護学校では、一般教養として
・英語
・情報（パソコン）
・心理
・生活科学
・哲学
・体育
・論理学
があって、これらの科目と同内容の単位を取得していれば、これらの科目は看護学校での授業は受けなくても認定されます。（単位取得した大学・短期大学の単位認定書とシラバスの提出がありました。）
私は、この単位認定で本当に助かりました。特に最終学年時に２科目の認定があったため、最終学年では合計で30コマの授業を受けなくて済みました。
最終学年は、とにかく時間がほしい学年です。１分１秒も無駄にはできません。
今のうちに科目履修などで、類似科目の単位取得をおススメします。
ユーザーID：8622231052
よめ
2010年12月20日 0:42
主人の母が 姉弟の２人の子供を産んだあと 弟の主人が小学校に入って看護婦の学校に通い 看護婦になりました。
いつも食卓で勉強してたって主人が言ってました。
学校卒業して 外来勤務になってからもずっとです。仕事から帰ってきてご飯食べながら、写真付きの学術本見ながらご飯食べてて、気持悪いから写真付きは止めてほしかったらしいです。
私は 看護学校が併設されている病院勤務でした。
でも あんまり覚えてません
夕方までだったかな？
准看護婦さんだったのかな？当直の時の夕方いたのは
当時の記憶がとってもあやふやで ごめんなさい
とりあえず 家事を手際よくできるようにしておく事でしょうか？
掃除しやすい部屋やレイアウト。
冷凍できるもの・冷凍できるメニューなどレパートリーを増やして
家事が負担にならない工夫しておくといいかも
後は ご主人と子供が何でも自分で出来る様にしつけることかな？
ユーザーID：2431312773
マロロン姫
2010年12月20日 9:38
こんにちは。年齢は30才後半です。私は、子育てしながら、看護学校に通いました。今は、派遣看護師では働いています。看護師の前職は、ＯＬです。学歴は一応大卒です。
看護学校は、授業自体は4〜５時くらいには終わります。その後に、調べ物などで遅くても７時くらいには、下校できると思います。
ただ、実習があり、実習の病院によっては、朝の７時前には家を出たりと
・・・私は実家に手伝ってもらいました。それと、レポート、実習記録等山ほど課題が出るので、覚悟が必要です。実習は今は楽しい思い出ですが、当時はつらかったですよ。実習は１日でも休むと減点で単位がもらえないこともありますので、休めないです。実習中は、家事をするどころでなく・・・
家族の理解と手助けがないとできなかったと思います。
看護師も看護以外の知識があると、患者さんとのコミュニケーションに大変役立ちます。
ごめんなさい、うまくお伝えできなくて・・・。
ユーザーID：1911753290
pororo
2010年12月20日 21:31
未就学児2人、３２歳で看護学校に入りました。
実習中は朝7時に出かけ帰りは１８時頃。
帰宅後の２時間で、子供たちの夕食とお風呂を済ませ、寝かしつけ。
その後にやっと実習記録や勉強を開始。
子供の夜泣きやおねしょで何度も中断され、記録が終わらないのに朝の新聞配達の音が聞こえてきて、せつなくて涙が止まらないことも度々。
記録の提出前など、ひどい時は３日間徹夜することもありました。
今は３交代制の病院で正看護師として働いています。
帰宅後、夜勤明け、休日、疲労で家ではほとんど寝て過ごし、子供の学校の勉強や提出物もよく確認できず、連絡帳に先生からお叱りを受けることも。
子供は、ママは忙しいから…と甘えたいのを我慢したり、都合の悪いことは隠すようになりました。
主人の協力といっても、私の夜勤時に早く帰ってくるだけで精一杯の様子。
正直、消えてなくなりたいほど辛いです。
看護の仕事は好きだけどね。いろいろな家庭の事情に関わらなければならない分、体力面だけでなく精神的にもキツイことが多いです。
今の生活、自分の許容範囲を超えすぎていると感じています。
ユーザーID：2710566410
まだまだ勉強したい(トピ主)
2010年12月21日 11:54
pororo様まで拝見いたしました。
＞もり様
1から３まで具体的にありがとうございます。
そして、私自身もできるだけ早く入学できたらな、と思っているのですが、自分の子供時代を振り返ってみると、小学1年生で自分の身の回りのことができるかな、と思ったので10年後くらいと書きました。
子供の成長具合、性格をじっくり見極めながらなるべく早めに入学できるように今は子供に集中したいとおもいます。ありがとうございます。
＞kanako様
私自身、最終学歴が専修学校なので認めてもらえる単位があるのか不安なのですが、そういえば卒業してから大学の3年次に編入した人が居たのを思い出しました。目星をつけている看護学校に単位認定があるのかどうか、もしなかったらそのほか近所で単位認定のあるところがあるのかどうか調べて比較検討してみることにします。ありがとうございました。
（つづきます）
ユーザーID：7491563028
まだまだ勉強したい(トピ主)
2010年12月21日 12:00
＞よめ様
パワフルなお義母さまですね。うらやましいです。旦那様はお母様が学校に通っている間寂しくなかったのかなぁというところがとても気になります。
現在、冷凍ストックレパートリーを旦那の弁当で練習しています。
部屋も着々とルンバが掃除しやすいように改装しております。
自分のことは自分でできる家族になるよう今からビシバシやりたいと思います。 ありがとうございました。
＞マロロン姫様
やはり過去のトピックでもよく言われるのが実習とレポートの大変さが顕著ですね。私自身もある分野の専門学校の実習3ヶ月×3回が泣きっぱなしだったのと激痩せしたのがつらかったのと同時にいい思い出です。
＞看護師も看護以外の知識があると、患者さんとのコミュニケーションに大変役立ちます。
この言葉に励まされました。回り道になりそうな人生ですが、無駄なことは何一つないと思いながらライフプランを立てたいと思います。ありがとうございました。
（つづきます）
ユーザーID：7491563028
まだまだ勉強したい(トピ主)
2010年12月21日 12:06
＞pororo様
事細かにありがとうございます。お子様が小さいとき、しかも２人も面倒を見ながらの看護学校はとてもすごいと思います。
私自身、すぐいっぱいいっぱいになってしまうことが多いので、自分のキャパシティを良く考えながら・・・と思い10年後を目安に書いたのですが、家族に甘えすぎずに、でも自立を求めながらがんばりたいと思います。
お体をご自愛ください。ありがとうございました。
引き続き、ご意見がありましたら書き込んでいただけるとうれしいです。
よろしくお願いします。
ユーザーID：7491563028
アラフォーママナース
2010年12月21日 18:17
私は、20代後半・既婚（子供なし）で看護学校に入学した看護師です。
『今、しておいて損のないだろうこと』
＊学費貯蓄：大学が多くなっているので。
＊英語：将来、日本にいても医療職・患者様の外国人率は増え、語学できると重宝されると思うので。
＊資格取得：ＯＬ時代に関連する者があれば是非。
看護学校時代、士業・資格職経験者の学生は多く、看護に向かないと退学して戻っていった人もいる。
『お子様1人予定なら…年少から一度、挑戦はどうですか？』
一緒にいる時間は制限されますが、小学校（学童）より、保育園や延長保育あり幼稚園の方が看護学校で過ごせる時間が長い傾向。
多少、体も強くなっている。
もし看護学校が生活上きつくて万が一退学しても、再度時期を見て挑戦できる。
もし看護が向かなくて退学しても時間的なダメージが少ない。
准看護師学校（最短2年）卒業後、看護学校進学コース（最低2年）に進み、看護師試験を受けるのはどうですか？
というのも、看護学校（3年）時代、2年強も通学し退学となった子育てママ学生を見て、もったいないなー、とつくづく思ったので。
ユーザーID：2415380460
まろん
2010年12月21日 19:35
わたしは看護学生です
現役ではいり現在3年生、２月には国家試験を控えております
一年や二年の頃にはだいたい4時10分に学校が終わります
しかし三年生…
一年間の実習となると話は別です
現役生でもかなり大変です
寝る時間はほとんどありません
こどもさんがいたらもっと大変なのだと思うとゾッとします
でもママさん学生はいらっしゃいましたよ!
こどもたちは幼稚園年長や年中の子ばかりでしたが…
こどもを思うのなら４、５歳になってからでもぃぃのでは？
それこそ家の鍵を開けて入ることが出来る位の年齢まで…
ユーザーID：5703520302
学生
2010年12月21日 21:24
クラスの半分が社会人でママさん学生も数名います。
2．病院の看護助手として仕事をすることをお勧めします。
3．ママさん学生の話では、子供に関する理由で周囲に迷惑をかけてしまうことが申し訳ないとのことです。
不景気で看護学校入学は高倍率です。40歳前の卒業では、体力的に何年も病棟勤務はできないだろうと判断され35歳以上の入学は狭き門です。
ちなみに今年度のわが校の社会人入試の倍率は21倍でした。入学するのに、専業主婦ではこの高倍率を突破するのは難しいかと思います。
行きたいと思っている学校の就職先になっている病院で、看護助手として勤務することをお勧めします。そこの病院から推薦という形を取れる場合もありますし、学校と病院は密接な関係にありますので、勤務実績が「コネ」として使えると思います。
なにより未経験の分野から飛び込むより、学校に入ってからの実習や技術試験で経験があるのはとても有利だですよ。
1歳半のお子さんを持つママも同級生にいます。がんばってください。

description.hltext_display: Premier appoints MPs to lead flood response (ABC)
description.content:
The Premier has appointed local members of parliament Ken Baston and Vince Catania to lead the government's response to the flood.
Mr Baston will liaise with local government while Mr Catania will engage with the community, local businesses and growers.
The Director General of the Department of Premier and Cabinet Peter Conran will travel to Carnarvon tomorrow to assess the government's recovery response.
Water levels low
The Water Corporation says water levels in Carnarvon's storage tanks are now very low and may become intermittent from six o'clock this evening.The authority is still working to try and restore full supply to the town after the local borefield was badly damaged by flooding.
The Corporation has urged residents to restrict their water use to essential needs only.
Flood mitigation
Water Minister Bill Marmion has committed to completing stage two of a flood mitigation plan for Carnarvon.
The first stage was finished in 2008 and there has been criticism that failure to finish the project made recent flooding in the region more severe.
Mr Marmion has told ABC's Country Hour he will make the second stage of the plan a top priority."There's a fair bit of work that's being done on stage two and this event will probably be able to help us in terms of designing stage two to make sure that we do the best possible design to control the water flow," he said.
"I certainly will be making this my highest priority, one of my highest priorities."

event_or_fact.property: the local borefield was badly damaged

There's a fair bit of work that's being done on stage two and this event will probably be able to help us in terms of designing stage two to make sure that we do the best possible design to control the water flow
he will make the second stage of the plan a top priority.

description.hltext_display: Audi A1 má problém, nepredáva sa
description.content:
Audi musí čoskoro vymyslieť nejaký šikovný trik na zvýšenie predajov svojho najmenšieho modelu A1. Jeho predaje sú menšie, ako sa pôvodne očakávalo.
Model A1 má menší problém so zháňaním zákazníkov.
Autor: Audi
Nemecké Audi chcelo modelom A1 zaútočiť na prestížnu časť segmentu malých áut, v jeho hľadáčiku boli predovšetkým zákazníci pokukujúci po konkurenčnom Mini. Tomu samozrejme prispôsobilo výbavy, spracovanie a ambiciózne ceny jednotlivých verzií A1. V skutočnosti sa však cenová úroveň Audi A1 nebezpečne priblížila väčším koncernovým modelom, takže mnoho zákazníkov údajne nakoniec skončilo pri inej značke koncernu.
Pôvodné plány Audi počítali s ročným predajom na úrovni 80 000 áut, doteraz (od apríla 2010) sa však predalo len 20 000 kusov. Automobilka preto rozširuje ponuku o nové verzie, ktoré by mali ponuku zatraktívniť. Na trhu sa predčasne objaví aj päťdverová verzia. O prípadnom znížení cien však Audi zatiaľ mlčí.

The report describes data services targeted at specific market segments, provides the key to faster returns on network investments. The research provides the information on the operators that are now planning their network rollout and service strategies and discusses 3G launch strategies in India … . The report provides a detailed analysis of the global service providers...

The report provides a detailed analysis of how current MTRs were determined across the EU15 and look at how NRAs are taking the Recommendation into consideration as they undertake new market analyses. The research discusses EC recommendations aimed at harmonizing the charges across Europe … . This report describes the main HSPA+ enhancements brought by 3GPP R8, R9, and R10. description.hltext_display: Заслуженная победа
description.content:
В очередном домашнем матче чемпионата России по хоккею с мячом кировская “Родина” принимала архангельский “Водник”.
До этой встречи команды располагались близко друг к другу в турнирной таблице, в активе “Родины” было 6 очков, у “Водника” - 4, поэтому матч был важен для каждого из соперников. К тому же “Родина” потерпела уже три поражения подряд, и победа в этом матче была просто необходима.
Матч хоккеисты начали достаточно осторожно, и только на 6-й минуте кировчане создали первый опасный момент, но защитник “Водника” сумел перехватить острую передачу, адресованную Вячеславу Бронникову. А вот на 13-й минуте ни защитники, ни вратарь “Водника” спасти свою команду уже не сумели - все тот же Бронников оказался первым на добивании после подачи углового. После забитого гола игра успокоилась, а на 22-й минуте “Воднику” удалось сравнять счет - 1:1. Команды продолжали играть в спокойном темпе, пока на 32-й минуте Константин Зубарев не вывел свою команду вперед: обыграв защитника, а затем уверенно переиграл и вратаря архангелогородцев. Первый тайм шел к своему завершению, когда на 44-й минуте Бронников не­ожиданным для вратаря дальним ударом увеличил преимущество “Родины” - 3:1. В самом начале второго тайма после передачи Дмитрия Евтюшина Денис Слаутин вышел один на один с вратарем и без труда его переиграл. На 59-й минуте Слаутин забивает свой второй мяч в этом матче, оказавшись расторопнее всех в штрафной “Водника” после подачи углового. Вскоре Бронников мог забить свой третий мяч в этой игре, но с пенальти пробил прямо во вратаря. Под занавес матча команды обменялись голами. Сначала архангелогородцы реализовали пенальти за фол последней надежды, а затем Алмаз Миргазов на скорости убежал от защитников и переиграл вратаря “Водника”. Незадолго до окончания матча Андрей Мороков установил окончательный счет - 7:2.
Результаты других матчей:
“Енисей» - «СКА-Нефтяник” - 6:4,
“Сибсельмаш» -«Байкал-Энергия” - 2:9,
“Кузбасс” - “Зоркий” - 8:4,
“Локомотив” - “Волга” - 5:1,
“Уральский трубник” - “Старт” - 6:1.
И, конечно, центральной в этом туре стала встреча в столичном спорткомплексе “Крылатское” двух “Динамо” - московского и казанского. Сильнее были гости - 9:5.
Заметную роль в обеих командах сыграли воспитанники кировской “Родины”. Так, на счету Александра Тюкавина («Динамо-Москва») в данном матче 2 гола и одна результативная передача, у хоккеистов казанского клуба Алексея Бушуева - один гол и две передачи, Сергея Шабурова и Сергея Обухова - по одному голу и передаче.
Иван КОЩЕЕВ, "Вятский край"
Есть мнение по этому поводу? - оставьте свой комментарий.

description.hltext_display: История едва не повторилась…
description.content:
В минувшую пятницу “Родина” принимала “Динамо” из Москвы. В день матча в Кирове установилась хоккейная погода: минус 15 и без осадков. Кстати, два года назад наши хоккеисты сумели сыграть вничью со столичной командой, и, забегая вперед, замечу: в этот раз история едва не повторилась.
С первых минут игры “Динамо” захватило инициативу и уже на 6-й минуте открыло счет в матче. После пропущенного мяча кировчане активизировались, что сразу же принесло свои плоды. Сначала Вячеслав Бронников, исполняя пенальти, не сумел переиграть вратаря “Динамо”, однако затем прострел все того же Бронникова замкнул Иван Бойко и сравнял счет - 1:1. Теперь уже динамовцы заиграли более активно и на 23-й минуте вновь вышли вперед - Иван Максимов забил с углового. После этого темп игры спал.
В самом начале второго тайма кировчане вновь сравнивают счет в матче, Андрей Мороков из центра отдал пас Константину Зубареву, тот, обыграв защитника, продвинулся к воротам и забил - 2:2. Динамовцы в свою очередь ответили опасной атакой, хозяева поля на Иване Максимове нарушили правила в радиусе, и судья назначил пенальти. Тюкавин уверенно переиграл вратаря. (Затем столичные хоккеисты снова получают право на пенальти, но используют его неудачно - мяч попадает в штангу). Через несколько минут все на том же Максимове кировчане снова нарушают правила. Снова пенальти. И сам пострадавший удваивает преимущество “Динамо” - 4:2.
После этого наши хоккеисты заиграли более активно. Стоит заметить, что в этот вечер хоккеисты “Родины” часто превосходили в скорости своих визави из Москвы. И в одной из таких скоростных атак на 72-й минуте Константин Зубарев оказался первым на добивании после прохода Дениса Слаутина. На 82-й минуте Александр Ронжин с углового сравнивает счет в матче - 4:4. Игра могла закончиться так же, как и 2 года назад, но, безусловно, один из лучших игроков матча Максимов после подачи углового добил мяч в сетку ворот “Родины”, принеся своей команде победу в этой встрече. У “Родины” был шанс сравнять счет, но на последних минутах Бойко не смог забить, оказавшись прямо перед воротами москвичей.
Такой вот напряженный матч провели команды. Стоит отметить игроков «Родины»: несмотря на то что соперник был выше классом, они сражались до последних минут и едва не сумели взять очки в этой игре. Вчера “Родина” в Иркутске встретилась с “Байкал-Энергией”.
Результаты других матчей:
“Енисей” - “Байкал-Энергия” - 3:4,
“Сибсельмаш” - “СКА-Нефтяник” - 4:3,
“Кузбасс” - “Старт” - 9:5,
“Уральский трубник” - “Зоркий” - 0:2,
“Динамо-Казань” - “Водник” - 6:2.
Турнирное положение команд:
1. “Динамо-Казань” - 27 очков после 9 игр.
2. “Динамо-Москва” - 24 (9).
3. “Байкал- Энергия” - 22 (10)...
10. “Родина” - 9 (8)... 13. «Водник” - 4 (8).
14. “Волга” - 3 (7).
Иван КОЩЕЕВ, "Вятский край"
Есть мнение по этому поводу? - оставьте свой комментарий.

description.hltext_display: Impone EU nuevas sanciones a Guardia Revolucionaria iraní
description.content:
Organización Editorial Mexicana
AFP
Washington, EU.- Estados Unidos impuso nuevas sanciones a los Guardianes de la Revolución iraní y a empresas de explotación de gas y de transporte marítimo, en un incremento de la presión sobre la República Islámica y sus actividades nucleares.
Las sanciones atañen a entidades vinculadas al cuerpo de seguridad y policía religiosa --considerado clave en la ejecución del programa nuclear acusado de ocultar fines bélicos detrás de una pantalla civil--, incluido el ex ministro de Energía Parviz Fatah, miembro de los Guardianes de la Revolución (Pasdaran).
El Departamento del Tesoro también sancionó a Liner Transport Kish, por "dar apoyo material, incluido armamento a Hezbolá", el movimiento radical chiita libanés, en nombre de los Guardianes de la Revolución.
Por otra parte, la lista de sancionados incluye a dos bancos iraníes y a la Pars Oil and Gas Company, filial de la estatal petrolera National Iranian Oil Company (NIOC), firma explotadora del yacimiento gasífero de Pars, en el sur de Irán.

description.hltext_display: Optimism about private businesses in Vietnam
description.content:
Investors continue to show their optimism about private businesses in Vietnam as 59 percent of interviewed people in a recent survey by Grant Thornton Vietnam plan to increase investment next year.
Conducted in the fourth quarter of this year, Grant Thornton’s survey, entitled “Investment in Private Businesses in Vietnam – Opinions and Prospects”, collected ideas from more than 200 investors and people who pay much attention to investment in Vietnam.
According to the survey, retail sales attracted most investment, followed by education. Meanwhile, petroleum, gas and natural resources remained the least attractive area together with agriculture and production.
Grant Thornton Vietnam Managing Director Ken Atkinson said it was unsurprised that retail sales continued to be the most attractive area as its annual growth reaches 25 percent.
The Vietnamese economy has shifted from traditional markets to a modern trading method, bringing to investors opportunities to develop their trademarks and occupy more market shares in the S-shaped country.
Interviewees also said that limitation in borrowing loans and lack of transparency in businesses are major barriers for investment besides cumbersome administrative procedures, poor infrastructure and a weak legal system. VOVNews/VNA

event_or_fact.property: retail sales continued to be the most attractive area as its annual growth reaches 25 percent.

description.hltext_display: Иркутяне были сильнее
description.content:
После довольно напряженной игры с московским “Динамо” кировской “Родине” предстоял выезд в Иркутск на матч еще с одним лидером чемпионата - “Байкал-Энергией”.
Игра началась с атак “Байкал-Энергии”, и на 13-й минуте, воспользовавшись ошибкой защитников “Родины”, хоккеисты Иркутска открыли счет в матче. Спустя 5 минут “Родину” спас Дмитрий Вершинин, отразивший пенальти. Однако на 25-й минуте мяч снова побывал в воротах гостей.
Вскоре после перерыва хозяева увеличили свое преимущество - 3:0. В середине второго тайма на поле произошла неприятная ситуация: после столкновения получил травму игрок “Байкал-Энергии” Максим Гавриленко, лучший ассистент чемпионата России, на “скорой” он был отправлен со стадиона. На 65-й минуте счет стал - 4:0. Хоккеисты “Родины” пытались создавать опасные моменты, но большинство атак заканчивалось на подступах к штрафной “Байкал-Энергии”. И все же на 84-й минуте Андрей Мороков сумел забить гол престижа: вратарь иркутян отбил мяч после прострела с левого фланга, но наш полузащитник оказался первым на добивании, тем самым установив окончательный счет в матче - 4:1.
Результаты других матчей:
“СКА-Нефтяник” - “Динамо-Казань” - 2:5,
“Локомотив” - “Сибсельмаш” - 0:0,
“Старт” - “Зоркий” - 2:8,
“Водник” - “Уральский трубник” - 5:2,
“Волга” - “Енисей” - 4:5,
“Динамо-Москва” - “Кузбасс” - 10:6.
Турнирное положение команд:
1. “Динамо-Казань” - 30 очков после 10 игр.
2. “Динамо-Москва” - 27 (10).
3. “Байкал-Энергия” - 25 (11)...
10. “Родина” - 9 (9)...
13. «Старт” - 7 (9).
14. “Волга” - 3 (8).
Иван КОЩЕЕВ, "Вятский край"
Есть мнение по этому поводу? - оставьте свой комментарий.

description.hltext_display: Here's what to do at Christmas in Bangalore
description.content:
Christmas is all about the tree, the goodies around it and the grand meals. However, its not only about the festivities but the whole idea of coming together with family and friends and sharing the love and cheer that we often forget to express. DNA gives you a heads up as far as some of the most amazing meals you can find in the city...
Big and beautiful
Game for a grand European six-course dinner with traditional delicacies or some festive food? Then head to The Oberoi for an exciting festive experience. Choose from Roast turkey, Pan Seared Duck Breast and Plum Pudding, Honey Glazed Ham, Lobster and Porcini Chowder and Mince Pie and a variety of spreads at the different eateries at the Oberois from Szechwan Court to Polo Club. Be sure to be be spoilt for choice!
Where The Oberoi Hotel, MG Road
Call 25585858
Going traditional
Where Caperberry, Dickenson Road
Call 9663439228
Treat with a twist
Where The Zuri, Whitefield
Call 66657272 Thats a neat spread Where The Taj West End, Race Course Road
Call 66605660
Go fancy Were looking at a rather fancy meal here with 20 Char laying out an elaborate feast on Christmas Eve for dinner and on Christmas for lunch! Dig into the Vichyssoise Soup With Lobster Medallions, cuts like Chicken Galantine With Nuts And Herbs, Smoked Salmon and Turkey Mortadella. Plus, theres the divine spread of veggie dishes like White Wine Baked Fennel Bulbs With Oyster Mushroom and more. And no holiday menu is complete without the desserts. Dig into the special Plum Puddings, Chocolate Tarts and Indian delicacies like baked gulab jamuns, malai parval and pista rolls.
Where Matthan Hotel, HAL Airport Road, next to Manipal Hospital
Call 42494949
AMediterranean Christmas
Where Olive Beach, Wood Street
Call 41128400
An Asian Christmas
For Christmas with an Asian touch, head to Shiro, which promises a lengthy menu for both vegetarians and non-vegetarians. With an interesting assortment like Mushroom And Grilled Vegetables, Rice Paper Rolls, Tofu Steak and earthy Mushroom Tarts to Vietnamese Asparagus And Crabmeat Soup, Turkey Tarts,Oven-Roasted Asian Turkey With Hibachi Rice Stuffing, the choices are in plenty!
Where Shiro, UB City Mall
Call 41738864

description.hltext_display: Négynapos haditengerészeti gyakorlatot tart Dél-Korea
description.content:
A helyzet nagyon feszült a két Korea között, valószínűleg felbőszíti a gyakorlat Phenjant.
A dél-koreai hadsereg négynapos haditengerészeti gyakorlatba kezdett szerdán keleti partjai előtt, mintegy száz kilométerre a két Koreát elválasztó tűzszüneti vonaltól. A helyzet nagyon feszült a két szomszéd között, és valószínű, hogy a gyakorlat felbőszíti Phenjant. A helyszín éppen a félsziget ellenkező oldalán van, mint ahol az észak-koreai tüzérség egy hónappal ezelőtt ágyúkkal lőtt egy dél-koreai szigetet a tűzszüneti vonal közelében.
Azon a szigeten, Jonpjongon a dél-koreai hadsereg hétfőn lőgyakorlatot tartott. A dél-koreai vezérkar neve elhallgatását kérő egyik tisztje elmondta, hogy hadihajókról fognak ágyúzni, valamint tengeralattjárókkal gyakorlatoznak. A békeidőben legnagyobb létszámú gyakorlaton hat hajó vesz részt, valamint harci gépek és helikopterek is.

description.hltext_display: Bekeményített az állam, súlyos következményekhez vezethet
description.content:
A költségvetés benyújtásakor készített elemzésünkben már felhívtuk arra a figyelmet, hogy a 2011-re tervezett kiadások között jelentősen csökken a szociálisan hátrányos helyzetű emberek foglalkoztatására szánt keretösszeg. A kormánynak ezért egy (alapjaiban és finanszírozásában is) teljesen új rendszert kellett létrehoznia, az Országgyűlés ennek megfelelően fogadja el azokat a törvénymódosításokat, amelyek a Nemzeti Közfoglalkoztatási Programhoz felállításához szükségesek. Elemzésünkből kiderül, hogy a legszegényebbek számára tovább nehezül a megélhetés, és az állam kivonulásával a probléma kezelése teljes mértékben átkerül az önkormányzatokhoz.
Előzmények - út a munkához
Élénk szakmai vita előzte meg azt a változtatást, hogy a korábban szociális segélyben részesülők 2008-tól csak akkor kaphatták meg a juttatást, ha az önkormányzat által szervezett és a költségvetésből finanszírozott kilencven munkanap/éves foglalkoztatási kötelezettségüknek eleget tesznek. A foglalkoztatási időn kívüli időszakért pedig az öregségi nyugdíjminimumnak megfelelő összeget kaptak az úgynevezett „rendelkezésre állási támogatás” címén. A rendszer tehát azzal a társadalmi üzenettel bírt, hogy csak az kaphat a közös „kalapból”, aki maga is erőfeszítéseket tesz. Az önkormányzatoknak kötelező volt munkát biztosítani, míg az érintettnek kötelessége volt azt elvállalni.
A szociális szakma komolyan ellenezte a 2010. január 1-től életbe lépett változtatást, amely szerint egy családból már csak egy fő vehetett részt a programban. Ennek a változtatásnak természetesen fiskális oka volt, mert a program 100 milliárd forint feletti összeget emésztett fel a költségvetésből. Ez a döntés tovább rontotta a legszegényebbek helyzetét, hiszen a havi bevételek további csökkenését jelentette.
Nemzeti Közfoglalkoztatási Program - megszűnik a megélhetés
A kormány által november végén beterjesztett, 2011. január 1-én hatályba lépő új rendszer komoly változásokat hoz. A legjelentősebb változások egyike ugyan elvileg könnyebbé teszi a segélyhez jutást, hiszen a korábbi, éves kilencven munkanapos foglalkoztatási kötelezettséget harminc napra csökkenti, és ez kiváltható lesz hat hónapos képzésen való részvétellel is. Másrészről viszont megszünteti az önkormányzat azon kötelezettségét, hogy munkát szervezzen a településen élő szociálisan hátrányos helyzetű, de dolgozni akaró emberek számára. Ez azt jelenti, hogy tulajdonképpen megszűnik az a munkalehetőség, amely a megélhetés alapfeltételeit eddig biztosította.
A feszültséget növeli, hogy egy családban továbbra is csak egy fő kaphat bérpótló juttatást, illetve továbbra is van az önkormányzatoknak helyi lehetőségük arra, hogy bizonyos személyeket az éves kötelező harmincnapos munkavégzés alól mentesítsenek. Ezt a feszültséget tetézték azzal a monoki szociális kártya-ügy kapcsán felvetődött elemmel, hogy a programban résztvevőknek kötelességük lakóhelyüket „rendezett módon” tartani, e fogalom pontos tartalmát pedig az önkormányzat helyi rendeletében állapítja meg. Álláspontunk szerint a „rendezett mód” kifejezés annyira szubjektív, hogy precíz jogi szabályozása szinte lehetetlen, inkább arra alkalmas, hogy a településen élők közötti feszültséget növelje, és az önkormányzatot hozza kényes helyzetbe.
Vesztesek a szegények, de van-e nyertese az új rendszernek?
Az új szisztéma rövidtávon kedvezhet az önkormányzatoknak, mert az amúgy is hiánnyal küszködő költségvetésüket nem kell terhelniük a közfoglalkoztatás költségeivel (ha nem tud harminc nap/év foglalkoztatási időt felmutatni a segélyezett, akkor nem kell bérpótló juttatást sem fizetnie az önkormányzatnak). De középtávon már települési szinten is problémát okoz az új helyzet, mert tömegek válhatnak ellátásnélkülivé, nem lesz legális jövedelmük (maximum a gyermekek után járó családi pótlék), ez pedig a szociális feszültségek további növekedéséhez vezethet.
A változtatás másik látszólagos nyertese az állam, akinek rövidtávon megtakarításai lesznek, és kevesebbet kell költenie a szociálisan hátrányos helyzetben lévőkre. Ugyanakkor a fiskális lépés társadalmi hatása jóval súlyosabb, hiszen a hátrányos helyzetű területeken kezelhetetlen folyamatokat indít el. A megélhetési bűnözés növekedésével szinte biztosan lehet számolni, hiszen a legszegényebbeknek más kiút alig marad. Az ebből adódó feszültség tömegeket taszíthat el a kormánypártoktól, és növelheti a radikálisok éppen jelentős csökkenésben lévő támogatottságát. A legszegényebbek viszont kettős nyomás alá kerülnek, hiszen munkalehetőségük megszűnése mellett a bolti lopások büntetése is jelentősen szigorodott, vagyis családjuk létfenntartásának biztosítása egyre kilátástalanabbá válik.
Több ezer forinttal csökkenhet a havi bevétel
Kiszámoltuk, hogy mit jelent a korábbi és az új program azok számára, akik szociális helyzetük miatt részt vettek vagy vehettek az „Út a munkához” programban. Az, aki 2010-ben törvényi minimumot dolgozhatott csak, azaz kilencven munkanapot, és a többi időre rendelkezésre állási támogatást kapott, az havi átlagban nettó 32.814 forintot kapott kézhez.
Az új szabályok alapján könnyen előfordulhat, hogy a település nem ad munkalehetőséget, és az is kérdéses, hogy a munkaügyi központok képesek-e ennyi embernek képzési lehetőséget hat hónapra biztosítani. Amennyiben az önkormányzat racionálisabban áll a kérdéshez, akkor a központi forrásokból biztosít harminc napon keresztül egy négyórás foglalkoztatást és a többi időre a bérpótló juttatást adja oda. Ebben az esetben éves átlagban 28.806 forintot kap az, aki a Nemzeti Közfoglalkoztatási Programban vesz részt, ez viszont 13 százalékkal kevesebb, mint ebben az évben. Természetesen az önkormányzat megteheti, hogy nem csak egy hónapon keresztül biztosít négyórás munkát, hanem hosszabb időtartamra, de ehhez az is feltétel, hogy a központi költségvetésből legyen rá fedezet, ami egyelőre nem látható.
Összességében kijelenthetjük, hogy a legszegényebbek helyzete igencsak elbizonytalanodik, hiszen elengedik a kezüket, és az államtól lényegében független önkormányzatok hozzáállásától függően kaphatnak segítséget, vagy veszíthetik el minden jövedelmüket.
Feltételezhető, hogy egy ilyen súlyos döntés meghozatalakor fontos szempont lehet a központi költségvetési kiadások csökkentése, de álláspontunk szerint egyértelmű, hogy a Fidesz számára nem éri meg, hogy ekkora megtakarításért ekkora politikai kockázatot vállaljon. Ez a lépés beláthatatlan következményekkel járhat az Európai Unió soros elnökségére készülődő ország és annak kormányára számára, hiszen kilátástalanabb helyzetbe hozza a legszegényebbeket, és tovább növeli a radikális megoldást sürgetők táborát.

description.hltext_display: Sismo en Irán dejó siete muertos y cientos de heridos
description.content:
Teheran, Irán.- Siete personas murieron en el sureste de Irán, tras un terremoto que destruyó en la noche del lunes unos veinte pueblos, dejando cientos de heridos, indicó este martes un gobernador provincial, según la agencia Mehr.
El gobernador de Kerman, Esmail Nayyar, afirmó que siete personas murieron, pero, según la página web de la televisión de Estado, un alto responsable de las emergencias médicas iraníes dijo que los muertos eran cuatro y el vicegobernador de Kerman dijo que eran cinco.
"Les daños se concentran en pueblos de la zona de Sahraj. Se retiraron siete muertos y cientos de heridos de los escombros", afirmó Nayyar.
Un sismo de magnitud 6,5 sacudió este lunes el sudeste de Irán, cerca de la localidad de Hosseinabad, en la provincia de Kerman.
Hosseinabad está cercana a la ciudad de Bam, sacudida por un sismo de magnitud 6,3 que provocó en 2003 unos 31 milmuertos, una cuarta parte de la población de la localidad y destruyó una antigua ciudadela de adobe.
Irán está situado sobre diversas fallas terrestres, por lo que ha tenido numerosos terremotos, algunos de los cuales provocaron grandes daños.

description.hltext_display: Sacude terremoto al sur de Japón; alerta de tsunami
description.content:
Tokio, Japón.- Un terremoto de magnitud preliminar de 7,4 remeció este martes el Pacífico frente al sur de Japón y el servicio meteorológico de Japón emitió un alerta por tsunami.
La agencia emitió una advertencia de un tsunami leve para las islas cercanas. No hubo informes inmediatos de daños o lesiones.
El temblor se registró a las 03:19 horas locales, a una profundidad de 10 kilómetros, con epicentro a 153 km al este de Chichi-shima en la lejana región de las islas Bonin japonesas, situadas unos 1.000 km al sudeste de Tokio, y a una profundidad de 14 km.
Por el momento no hubo informes de víctimas o de daños materiales.
El Centro de Alerta de Tsunami del Pacífico en las islas Hawai dijo que no había amenaza de un tsunami de amplios efectos destructivos pero advirtió en un boletín que los sismos de esta magnitud "pueden generar en ocasiones tsunamis que pueden resultar destructivos en las costas ubicadas en un radio de 100 km respecto del epicentro".

description.hltext_display: Shoppers spending more, but only just (AAP)
description.content:
Shoppers are expected to spend more money in Queensland leading up to Christmas than they did last year, but only just, the Australian Retailers Association (ARA) says.
The peak industry body has projected that for Queensland from the last two weeks of November through to Christmas Eve consumers will spend $8.2 billion of the $39.9 billion it expects to be spent across the country.
But that is not a big increase, up from $8.1 billion over the same period last year.
ARA executive director Russell Zimmerman said retailers were hoping that having five full weekdays of shopping before Christmas would give retailers a slight advantage.
"It is going to be a very ordinary Christmas with a techno twist," Mr Zimmerman told AAP.
He said goods like iPads and iPhones were selling well, but some of the normally popular items at Christmas like small electrical goods and packaged perfumes had already gone on sale because they were not selling well.
"Clothes are also doing poorly, mainly because of the weather, with people reluctant to buy when it has been wet and cooler than normal," Mr Zimmerman said.
He said the tourist areas of Queensland like the Gold Coast would also be hit hard because of the drop in the number of visitors spending their money.
Mr Zimmerman said there were a number of reasons for the sluggish pre-Christmas sales.
He said the wet and cooler than normal weather and the Melbourne Cup Day interest rate rise when banks almost doubled the Reserve Bank increase were two of the main ones.
"It was just like someone turned the tap off," Mr Zimmerman said.
He said figures released on Tuesday by Fitch Ratings showed in Queensland there had been a significant increase in the number of people in arrears on their mortgage payments and that also had to be a factor.
The aftermath of the global financial crisis and the big increases in electricity and water bills were also having an impact, Mr Zimmerman said.
However, despite hopingconsumers would keep on spending over the final two days before Christmas, Mr Zimmerman also adopted a cautious approach and urged people to "spend wisely".

description.hltext_display: Ever IM’ed a friend who was sitting in the same room? Survey reveals what Australians consider acceptable behaviour online.
description.content:
A clear majority of Australians today value their laptops more than their TVs, according to a survey commissioned by Intel.
With all the talk of the internet becoming a fourth utility in households, that finding may not surprise. But just how internet dependent are we? According to the same survey, a lot of us are OK chatting online or Facebooking with someone within earshot.
Sixty-one per cent of respondents said they would rather give up a TV set for a week than a laptop. Among 16-29 year olds with laptops, the figure was higher, with 79 per cent saying they would rather abstain from watching TV for a week.
The Intel survey also recorded the most practical uses Australians have for their PCs: the top three cited were ‘searching for information’, ‘keeping in touch with family and friends’ and ‘on-line banking and bill payments’.
And when asked what services they wished they could access online, sixty seven per cent of respondents were in favour of online voting. Other popular answers included taking an eye test (25%), consulting a doctor (28%) and getting a passport (41%).
According to Kate Burleigh, national marketing manager for Intel Australia, the results demonstrate a shift in our computing habits and the relationship we have with our technology.
“Not so long ago a laptop was considered a luxury purchase. Now notebooks account for four out of five home computers sold. With this shift to mobile, we’re moving from one computer per household to one per person and the Personal Computer is becoming even more personal,” Ms Burleigh said.
Acceptable online behaviour
The survey, by Galaxy Research, was completed in October and included 417 respondents across Australia aged between 16 and 59 years.
Forty-nine per cent of those surveyed use a notebook computer rather than a desktop at home. Younger computer users were almost twice as likely to use a notebook than older respondents (60 per cent of respondents aged 16-29 versus 33 per cent among those 45-59 years).
With voting compulsory in Australia and election memories not quite distant, the enthusiasm for the idea of online voting makes sense.
But then there was the other side of the survey: asking participants what constitutes acceptable use of online technology in various social contexts.
Younger respondents were more accepting of using email, IM or social media to communicate with someone in the same room (44% among 16-29 year olds vs 22% of 45-59 year olds), but still less than half believe it is socially acceptable.
Just in time for Christmas, 66 per cent of respondents said it is okay to send online e-cards for the holidays… in certain cases. The majority said e-cards were acceptable for colleagues or business contacts but fewer thought them suitable for a spouse or family member.
Meanwhile, 40 per cent of respondents felt it was acceptable to announce a wedding online. Yet as far as surprises go, nine per cent of those surveyed actually approved of online marriage proposals.
For the majority of us, some things still are best done face-to-face.
Image by Bekathwia [Becky Stern]

description.hltext_display: Vouchers: Parity, accountability needed
description.author: Times-Union
description.content: Gov.-elect Rick Scott announced that he wants to offer every student in Florida a private school voucher.� Currently, the state offers vouchers to low-income students through a tax diversion called the Tax Credit Scholarship. Florida also offers vouchers straight from the state treasury to students with disabilities, the McKay voucher.� Scott’s new policy push calls for a review of what’s right and wrong with the two voucher programs.� Never mind that the Florida Supreme Court threw out a less ambitious voucher program than Scott’s when Jeb Bush was governor. (The court said then that public education dollars could only be spent on “uniform” public schools.)� Something much more important than the law is at stake: educational quality for students.� Empirical studies belie the notion that private schools educate our children better than public schools do. When socio-economic status and race are accounted for, studies from the U.S. Department of Education say that private schools don’t get better results.� Further, Florida’s own studies showed that private voucher school students performed no better than their closest-matched public school peers on standardized test gains during the two years the state took data on the issue. � Arguably, we need more studies. But we can’t compare voucher schools to public schools because the Legislature slashed the norm-referenced Stanford 10 for Florida’s public schools.� Perhaps lawmakers don’t want researchers, voters, taxpayers and parents to make those comparisons. After all, if private schools were actually better, wouldn’t they want to demonstrate it on a common playing field?� Parity in accountability should also extend to McKay vouchers. Providing progress for individual students with disabilities, based on commonly accepted scientific standards as embodied in individual education plans, is the law of the land. � For the sake of students, their families, and taxpayers, private schools receiving state money must not be deemed exempt from laws which protect disabled students.� Until we devise systems by which private schools are held accountable in exact parity to public schools — using apples-to-apples testing instruments — we ought not be directing any more taxpayer money their way.� JULIE DELEGAL Jacksonville

description.hltext_display: Breathing Trouble? 7 Signs Of Danger
description.content:
By Melanie Haiken, Caring.com We hear a lot about the risks of lung cancer -- but less about a lung condition that's just as common and debilitating, called COPD. This term, which stands for chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, refers to a combination of two conditions, emphysema and chronic obstructive bronchitis, both of which are caused by lung damage from smoking or exposure to other lung irritants, such as asbestos.
Whether you're a smoker, a former smoker, or just unlucky, you can develop COPD as a result of damage to your lungs that gradually limits their ability to take in oxygen. When your lungs aren't functioning at full capacity, symptoms begin to appear that are sometimes so subtle that you may not recognize them as such. And because COPD is a progressive disease that can't be slowed without treatment -- and because it's the fourth leading cause of death in the U.S. -- it's critical to catch it as soon as possible. Here, seven signs that your lungs are trying to tell you they're in trouble.
Respiratory Symptoms 1. Shortness Of Breath
"Many people start to experience shortness of breath, and they just think 'I'm old, I'm out of shape,' and they don't do anything about it other than cutting back their activity level," says Byron Thomashow, a physician and professor at Columbia University Medical Center and chairman of the board of the COPD Foundation. "Then when you have shortness of breath just getting to the bathroom, all of a sudden you take notice."
The problem with this, Thomashow says, is that the lung damage that constitutes COPD can't be reversed; all you can do is halt or slow the progression of the disease. And if you don't start treating it until you're already out of breath just walking around the house, you've got a lot less to work with. Not only that, but cutting back is the last thing you want to do to prevent COPD progression maintaining and even increasing your activity level is key to keeping the lung function that you have.
One thing to look for: When you're climbing steps or exercising, do you have trouble inhaling a deep breath? An even more telltale sign: Do you take the elevator instead of the stairs to avoid this feeling? Experiment with different activities to see if you have shortness of breath when you increase your level of exertion, and note if there have been any changes over time. "I ask people, how's your breathing compared to last year -- can you do what you used to do a year ago?" says Thomashow. If you feel your ability to draw a deep breath is declining, ask your doctor to perform lung function tests to give you a clear picture of your lung health. Cough Symptoms 2. Frequent Or Worsening Coughs
Everyone gets a cough once in awhile, but if you seem to be getting them more frequently, or they linger for a long time or become chronic, it's time to talk to your doctor. COPD inflames the bronchial tubes and the tiny sacs called alveoli that line the lungs, making them less flexible and elastic. When that happens, the walls of the airways thicken and produce more mucus than usual, which clogs them up.
What you'll notice is a phlegmy cough that feels like the type that usually accompanies the flu -- except you don't have other flu symptoms. If you cough up mucus that's any other color than clear, that can be a sign your condition is worsening, says Byron Thomashow of Columbia and the COPD Foundation. The mucus may be yellow, green, or even have blood in it.
One interesting fact to be aware of: If you're still smoking, your sputum production may not increase despite advancing COPD, whereas sputum production tends to increase after you quit.
Headaches, Edema
3. Morning Headaches
One of the more mysterious symptoms of COPD is waking up after a night's sleep with a dull, throbbing headache. "What's happening is that you're not breathing deeply enough at night, and the carbon dioxide builds up while you're sleeping," says physician Norman Edelman, chief medical officer for the American Lung Association. The buildup of carbon dioxide causes blood vessels in the brain to dilate, resulting in headaches.
Many people don't connect the headaches to COPD, though; instead they treat them as a separate symptom. But unless you treat the underlying cause -- making sure you get enough oxygen into your lungs while you sleep -- the headaches won't go away. Talk to your doctor about setting up a designed to reduce inflammation and increase the absorbent capacity of the lungs.
4. Swollen Ankles
As COPD advances, it becomes intertwined with heart failure, because your circulatory system isn't getting the oxygen it needs to be healthy. This can lead to fluid buildup, which is most easily recognizable as swollen feet and ankles. "As lungs get progressively worse, the ability of the body to compensate goes down and the heart can't pump strongly enough," says Norman Edelman of the American Lung A ssociation. When the heart can't pump enough blood to supply the liver and kidneys, they can't perform their necessary functions of flushing out toxins and removing fluid. The result: the same type of edema many people experience while flying or women experience when pregnant.
Sleep Problems
5. Trouble Sleeping Or Staying Asleep
Ask yourself this: Do you pile up pillows to raise your chest and head and make it easier to breathe while you sleep? Do you sleep in a chair, such as a recliner, because breathing's easier in that position? It's also possible that you sleep flat but wake up feeling unwell or even dizzy. Because lying flat forces your lungs to work harder, many people with COPD find they have trouble sleeping deeply -- but they may not realize it's the lung condition causing it. "Sleep is also hard for people with COPD because they may cough throughout the night, waking themselves up or interrupting deep sleep," says Byron Thomashow of the COPD Foundation.
The relationship between COPD and poor sleep gets complicated, because many people with COPD also develop sleep apnea and GERD (gastroesophageal reflux disease), neither of which is conducive to deep, refreshing sleep.
The bottom line: If you wake regularly throughout the night with breathing difficulties or coughing, or you wake up in the morning feeling weak, unrested, and possibly with a headache, talk to your doctor.
Barrel Chest, Blue Blood
6. A Barrel Chest
One informal test that some doctors use to check for COPD progression is to have you breathe while raising your arms over your head. Why? They're looking for a change known as "barrel chest," which describes a particular posture and body shape that tends to develop as a secondary symptom of COPD.
As a result of chronic inflammation, the lungs become enlarged and push the diaphragm downward, which makes it harder for the diaphragm to contract as efficiently. The chest wall becomes enlarged as well, weakening muscles in the chest, neck, and between the ribs; these are known as the "accessory respiratory muscles." When this happens, people with COPD unconsciously try to compensate by leaning forward when sitting, with their arms on their knees or in front of them. This posture stabilizes the upper chest and shoulders, making it easier to use the accessory breathing muscles.
7. A Bluish Tinge To Lips Or Fingernails
Over time, if your blood doesn't circulate enough oxygen throughout your body, your lips and fingernails can take on a blue or gray tone. Sometimes the color, known as cyanosis, is most apparent in the nail beds; some people develop an overall grayish-blue tinge to the skin. The cause: Oxygen-rich blood is bright red, while blood with less oxygen turns dark and bluish-colored.
In dark-skinned people, the discoloration is most visible in the lips, gums, and around the eyes, and it can be easier to spot. Cyanosis usually occurs when oxygen levels in the blood drop below 90 percent. A doctor can check this for you; you can also monitor it yourself using a finger pulse oximeter, available in medical supply stores. Symptoms Besides Cough Can Reveal Dangerous Conditions

description.hltext_display: Encendido de luces de Navidad agudizaría tensión entre Coreas
description.content:
El encendido de las luces de Navidad está previsto para este martes en la noche, un día después de las maniobras militares de Seúl en Yeonpyeong. Foto: AFP
Notas relacionadas
Notas relacionadas
•Realiza Surcorea maniobras militares, pero el Norte baja tensión
Organización Editorial Mexicana
AFP
Seúl, Corea del Sur.- Un árbol de Navidad, situado en Corea del Sur, muy cerca de la frontera con Corea del Norte, puede aumentar la tensión entre los dos vecinos si un grupo religioso surcoreano enciende sus luces este martes en la noche como ha anunciado.
Dicho grupo religioso ha previsto encender, por primera vez desde hace siete años, instalaciones eléctricas que dibujan la forma de un gran árbol de Navidad en la cima de una colina controlada por el ejército de Corea del Sur, a tres kilómetros de la frontera.
"Los soldados mantienen el grado de alerta más elevado en torno a la colina", declaró a la AFP un portavoz militar.
Las dos Coreas concluyeron un acuerdo en 2004 para cesar los ejercicios de propaganda oficiales cerca de la línea fronteriza. El Sur aceptó no volver a encender este inmenso árbol de Navidad.
El Norte acusaba al Sur de encender esas luces de Navidad cerca de la frontera para hacer proselitismo entre sus soldados y su población en general.
Seúl ha reiniciado algunas actividades de propaganda en la frontera después del torpedeo de uno de sus buques de guerra en marzo de 2010.
Las tensiones entre los dos países aumentaron en forma considerable desde que el Sur, en base a conclusiones de una investigación multinacional, acusó a su vecino de haber torpedeado el buque que se hundió, causando la muerte a sus 46 tripulantes.
El bombardeo norcoreano a la isla de Yeonpyeong en noviembre, con saldo de cuatro muertos, ha reavivado la tensión en las últimas semanas.
El encendido de las luces de Navidad está previsto para este martes en la noche, un día después de las maniobras militares de Seúl en Yeonpyeong.
Corea del Sur ha reinstalado altoparlantes cerca de la frontera, pero no los ha hecho funcionar aún. Los norcoreanos han advertido que dispararán contra estos aparatos si comienzan a difundir propaganda.

description.hltext_display: Ägaren satsar stort på Selma Spa
description.content:
Nyligen utsågs Selma Spa i Sunne till Skandinaviens bästa Spa.
Nu vill Choice Hotels ägare, norske mångmiljardären Petter Stordalen, satsa 45 miljoner kronor på anläggningen. Petter Stordalen besökte Sunne och Selma Spa i onsdags tillsammans med koncernchefen Torgeir Silseth. ? Sunne är ett fantastiskt ställe och vi gläds över att utveckla Selma Spa framöver, säger Torgeir Silseth till NWT.
Det handlar om en investering om 35 miljoner kronor under nästa år och 10 miljoner kronor under 2012. 2005 gjordes en rejäl satsning på de gemensamma ytorna och hälften av hotellrummen. Under våren 2011 ska resten av rummen renoveras, enligt koncernchefen. Dessutom får spa- och fitnessavdelningarna ett ansiktslyft. ? Det största är att vi vill utveckla spa-delen med 25 miljoner kronor, säger Torgeir Silseth.
Någon utbyggnad är inte aktuell. ? Det handlar om att göra om konceptet. Vi vill stärka behandlingsdelen och även integrera utbudet med mer fitness och träning. Naturen intill kan utnyttjas mer till skidåkning och löpning till exempel, säger Torgeir Silseth. Selma Spa firar 20 årsjubileum i sommar och står i nuläget stabilt i konkurrensen. Den nuvarande vd:n Anders Pertun efterträdde i februari 2009 Jan Eliasson som fick sparken. Pertun kommer närmast från Quality Spa och Resort i Strömstad som han drev i fyra år.
Selma Spas siffror har putsats uppåt efter att den nye vd:n tog över rodret. ? Selma Spa har ökat omsättningen med ungefär två miljoner kronor under de senaste två åren, säger Anders Pertun. Han tror starkt på att locka gäster som vill kombinera spa-vistelsen med träning och utflykter i naturen.
I höstas började Selma Spa erbjuda träningsresor med inriktning mot de stora motionsloppen med ambitionen att ha cirka 20 träningsläger om året. ? Vi ska ta Selma Spa in i framtiden, säger Anders Pertun. Visa upp er baby på nwt.se! . Så här gör du, enkelt och gratis! Har du en egen nyhet?
Vill du dela med dig av något som äger rum där du bor, eller en fin bild? så kan det hamna under Läsarnas här på nwt.se. Läs mer om .

description.hltext_display: Richtingloze handel op Europese markten
description.content:
AMSTERDAM - De Europese aandelenbeurzen openden woensdag vlak bij gebrek aan richtinggevend nieuws. Volgens handelaren is het onderliggende sentiment echter positief, mede dankzij goede macro-economische cijfers en overnamenieuws dat dinsdag naar buiten kwam.
Kort na de opening noteerde de AEX-index van meest verhandelde fondsen in Amsterdam 0,1 procent hoger op 356,40 punten. De MidKap-index van middelgrote fondsen was onveranderd en stond op 634,10 punten. Ook in Frankfurt, Londen en Parijs stonden de graadmeters onveranderd.
Chemieconcern DSM (min 0,3 procent) was een van de sterkste dalers in de AEX. Amerikaanse advocatenkantoren onderzoeken of DSM de aandeelhouders van Martek Biosciences genoeg betaalt voor hun stukken. Na de aankondiging dinsdag van de overname voor circa 1,1 miljard dollar steeg het aandeel DSM 3,9 procent.

description.hltext_display: West Africa: Galaxy Backbone Partners Main One Cable On Quality Services
description.content:
Abuja Service provider, Galaxy Backbone, has entered into partnership with broadband network infrastructure provider, Main One Cable Company, that will enable it subscribe to its fibre optic infrastructure to offer quality services to its customers. Main One Cable Company is the first private submarine cable landing in Nigeria and Ghana, offering open access, wholesale broadband capacity in West Africa.
Its main objective is to bridge the digital divide by providing adequate capacity for effective communications including broadband services (data, video and voice) on the continent and with the rest of the world; develop a well managed connectivity platform towards the realisation of effective internet telecommunications access across the continent, stimulate growth of key economies along the West Coast of Africa through reliable and affordable access to global information resources and markets and deliver world class quality of service and availability with measurable services level agreements (SLAs).
However, Galaxy Backbone on the other hand, is a federal government owned telecom company, established primarily to provide ICT infrastructure and services to Ministries, Department and Agencies (MDAs) of government as well as digital inclusion of underserved communities and locations.
Galaxy infrastructure is made up of state of the art network control centre, VSAT teleport facility and national data centre complex in Abuja, with a redundant disaster recovery and business continuity site.
The company was established for the purpose of driving the transformation of the public sector through the deployment and utilisation of ICT resources.
Galaxy Backbone is expected to partner with existing national backbone operators and utilise available third party trans mission and last mile capacity to ensure service reliability and availability nationwide.
Under the agreement, Galaxy Backbone will subscribe to Main One Cable backbone network to provide ICT infrastructure and services to Ministries, Department and Agencies (MDAs) of government as well as digital inclusion of underserved communities and locations.
At the launch of the partnership, in Abuja, the Secretary to the Government of the Federation, Alhaji Yayale Ahmed said Galaxy Backbone's subscription to Main One Cable was evidence that government was transforming and embracing ICT as a necessary tool for development.
Represented by a Permanent Secretary in the office, Mr S.D. Kazim, the SGF said with the partnership, Galaxy Backbone was in a better position to discharge its obligation as envisaged by the government.
"It is relevant at this juncture for me to restate and revalidate that the circular containing guidelines for the procurement and implementation of bandwidth, network connectivity and other ICT infrastructure for Federal Government Ministries, Departments and Agencies by Galaxy Backbone still remains effect and full compliance is required from all government MDAs to avoid sanction," he warned.
According to him, the partnership between the two companies was consistent with the mission and mandate of the company, saying it would enable the IT firm to provide secure and cost-effective ICT infrastructure and services to the public sector and underserved communities where government was expected to intervene.
"In the course of processing approval for this partnership, I understand that savings in excess of 65 per cent over previous charges will be accruing to the government. This shows that Galaxy Backbone has been diligent in utilising cost savings mechanisms inherent in the procurement process.
"This is doubt in consonance with government's efforts at improving efficiency in the management of our limited resources. I also expect that this significant price reduction will contribute to bridging the digital divide to the benefit of dwellers in our rural areas and improve access in our education institutions," the SGF said.
While commending the two organisations for the partnership, Ahmed advised Galaxy Backbone to seek more avenues to partner with other organisations within and outside the public sector so as to ensure that ICT became a critical contributor to national development and government transformation.
Also speaking, the Head of Civil Service of the Federation, Prof. Oladapo Afolabi said that Galaxy Backbone has lived up to its mandate by providing internet connectivity to 300 MDAs.
According to him, Africa lacked behind the rest of the world in internet connectivity and West Africa, he stated also lacked behind the rest of the regions in internet connectivity.
Afolabi who spoke on the topic, "Transforming the Public Service: ICT as an Enabler," listed some of the benefits of ICT to include: easier access to information, better innovation, e-governance and better access to service amongst others.
Speaking on the topic: "Vision 20: 2020 - Translating Vision to Action, the Minister and Chairman, National Planning Commission, Dr Shamsudeen Usman said ICT could enable better access to government policies, improve access to quality healthcare, quality service and increase the efficiency of the government.
Represented by his Special Assistant on National Planning, Dr Yemi Kale, the minister could also enable Nigeria to be integrated into the global economy.
According to the minister, ICT's vision in the Vision 20:2020 was to attain knowledge based economy, adding that Federal Government had implemented the ICT's sector of Vision20:2020.
The Managing Director of Galaxy Backbone, Gerald Ilukwe said that his services were based on 70 per cent fibre and 30 VSAT, adding that the agreement would enable it deliver quality service to its customers. He said his company started with 1.5 megabit per second but current has 155 megabit per second from Main One Cable with plans to double it.
Ilukwe who stated that his firm had built 220 kilometres of fibre, added that plans are underway to build more in order to address network congestion and provide efficient service to his customers.
Also speaking, the Managing Director of Main One Cable on the other hand said her firm was the first private submarine cable that landed in Nigeria and Ghana which offered open access and wholesale broadband capacity in West Africa. She said that the objective of her organisation was to bridge digital divide by providing adequate capacity for effective communications in West Africa.

description.hltext_display: FCC Adopts New Rules To Protect Web Traffic
description.content:
'Net Neutrality' Rules Keep Companies From Throttling Internet Traffic
Christopher Furlong/
JOELLE TESSLER, AP Technology Writer
WASHINGTON -- A divided Federal Communications Commission has approved new rules meant to prohibit broadband companies from interfering with Internet traffic flowing to their customers.
The 3-2 vote Tuesday marks a major victory for FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski, who has spent more than a year trying to craft a compromise.
The FCC's three Democrats voted to pass the rules, while the two Republicans opposed them, arguing that they amount to unnecessary regulation. The new rules are likely to face intense scrutiny on Capitol Hill once Republicans take over the House. Meanwhile, public interest groups decried the regulations as too weak, particularly for wireless systems.
Known as "net neutrality," the rules prohibit phone and cable companies from favoring or discriminating against Internet content and services, such as those from rivals.

description.hltext_display: A billion, but not quite top-notch
description.content:
Its a country of a billion people, and not winning one Nobel Prize in science in a hundred years would be a shame for a country so vast, said Prof S Sadagopan, director of the International Institute of Information Technology, Bangalore, speaking at the 17th national annual Sahodaya conference, where teachers of CBSE schools from across the country had gathered. He urged the teachers to enthuse students to take up scientific research.
Prof Sadagopan reminded his audience that the last Nobel Prize in science that went to an Indian was in 1930, when Bangalorean CV Raman was awarded the prize in physics for observing the change in the wavelength of light as it traversed transparent material. Prof Sadagopan said that youngsters today are not inspired by such achievements. Lots of kids are just not so excited about breaking the next frontier. For them, what is more important is making a billion dollars, the professor said.
Speaking of the role of technology in learning, Sadagopan said that teachers ought not to glorify the potential that technology has in the classroom. It should become invisible technology, else it could come between teacher and taught, said Sadagopan, who underlined the four important Ls in learning: lectures, library, laboratory and life. There could be a set of tools that could orchestrate events across different internet tools, the professor said, adding that teachers should also be careful to limit the use of technological tools that do not actually aid learning.
Professor L Prasad, chairperson of the executive post-graduate programme of the Indian Institute of Management, Bangalore, rose to speak and said, I feel like Elizabeth Taylors tenth husband, on the wedding night. I know what to do, but dont quite know how to make it interesting and different. Even as the audience burst into laughter, the professor plunged into serious reflection. We need people who are able to tolerate ambiguity, and who can both adapt and innovate, he said, commenting on how Indians work well as individuals, but often fail to pull together as a team.

description.hltext_display: Mischlinge mit Zukunft
description.content:
a / A„Hybrid" heißt Mischling oder auf gut Bairisch: Stiangglanda. Bei Hunden sind Mischlinge oft die cleversten Zamperl überhaupt.
© Toyota
Toyota Prius Plug-In: Den kann man künftig auch an der Steckdose aufladen - rein elektrisch kommt er so ab 2012 rund 20 km weit.
© HerstellerPeugeot 308 Hybrid 4: Der Diesel- Hybrid kommt im Laufe von 2011 - mit einem Dieselmotor vorn und einem Elektromotor hinten.Gilt das auch für den Hybrid, das Auto mit zwei Antrieben? Pioniertaten leisteten jahrelang Toyota, Lexus und Honda. Deutsche Hersteller übertrafen sich in Skepsis und Zurückhaltung, inzwischen springen aber auch BMW, Mercedes, VW, Porsche und bald Audi auf den Hybrid-Zug auf. Und der rast immer erfolgreicher Richtung Zukunft, wie unser Überblick zu diesem längst serienreifen Antrieb zeigt. Bei Autos heißt Hybrid: Die Kombination zweier Antriebe.
Boosten oder Rekuperieren
© HerstellerCayenne S Hybrid: Segeln kann der Porsche bis zu 156 km/h dank Trennkupplung.Bislang nur Benzin- und Elektroantrieb, Diesel kommt bald hinzu. Außerdem gibt es dreifach-Hybride wie den von Geigercars in München angebotenen Chevrolet Tahoe. Der fast drei Tonnen schwere Allrad-Riese kommt mit Benzin-/ Autogas- und Elektroantrieb auf unter 10 l/100 km Praxisverbrauch. Der Trick von Hybrid: Die Akkus speichern Bremsenergie, die der Elektromotor bei Bedarf wieder abruft. Dann treibt bei Vollhybriden das Stromaggregat alleine und emissionsfrei das Auto an ( typischerweise bis etwa 50 km/h und zwei Kilometer weit), oder unterstützt den Benzinmotor beim Beschleunigen.
Hybridmodelle in Deutschland
zurück
vorIm Hybrid-Fachchinesisch nennt man das „Boosten". Beim Mildhybrid dagegen unterstützt der Elektromotor nur den Verbrenner. Auch hier senkt Bremsenergie- Rückgewinnung, auch „Rekuperieren" genannt, den Verbrauch – zusammen mit Stopp-Start-Automatik um 15 bis 20 Prozent. Beispiel: Der Honda Insight mit Elektromotor und Benziner. Er begnügt sich mit 4,4 l/100 km Sprit und kostet unter 20 000 Euro. Inzwischen hat Honda das flotte Sportcoupé CR-Z mit Hybridantrieb nachgeschoben, daneben gibt es den Stufenheck-Civic und bald auch den 3,90 m kurzen Mini- Van Jazz mit Elektro- und Benzinantrieb.
Besonders vielversprechend scheint die Kombination aus Diesel- und Elektroantrieb, die Peugeot im Laufe von 2011 mit dem Crossover-Modell 3008 Hybrid4 realisieren wird. Gegen Jahresende bringt danach Mercedes-Benz den Diesel-Hybrid E 300 BlueTec, der mit deutlich über 200 PS Systemleistung nur 4,1 l/100 km Diesel verbrauchen soll. Auch bei Spritsäufern wie SUVs sind Hybride auf dem Vormarsch. Lexus verkauft von seinem RX 450h momentan rund 90 Prozent als Hybrid.
© HerstellerPeugeot 308 Hybrid 4: Der Diesel- Hybrid kommt im Laufe von 2011 - mit einem Dieselmotor vorn und einem Elektromotor hinten.
Ebenfalls interessant: Die technischen Brüder Porsche Cayenne S Hybrid und VW Touareg Hybrid. Systemleistung: 380 PS (333 fallen davon auf den Benzinmotor), Verbrauch: 8,2 l/100 km. Für einen hochbeinigen und schweren Allrad-SUV ein erstaunlicher Wert. Audi kommt 2011 mit einer Hybrid-Version des Q5. BMW ist momentan mit seinem Active Hybrid 7 sowie dem Active Hybrid X6 vorerst nur in gehobenen Klassen mit dem dualen Antrieb unterwegs. Der X6 ist mit 485 PS der stärkste Serien- Hybrid weltweit und verbraucht mit 9,9 l/100 km ein stolzes Fünftel weniger als der vergleichbare Benziner X6 xDrive50i. Mit dem Fünfer Active Hybrid und rund 360 PS wird die Technologie bei BMW schon bald in der oberen Mittelklasse Einzug halten.
Dem Hybridantrieb scheint für eine Übergangsphase die nahe Zukunft zu gehören – ehe reiner Elektroantrieb, Brennstoffzelle oder Wasserstoffmotoren praxistauglich und bezahlbar sind. Benziner und Diesel können noch so sparsam sein – als Hybrid im Zusammenspiel mit einem Elektromotor agieren sie noch effizienter und stärker.
Ralf SchützeArtikel empfehlen

description.hltext_display: Studenti in piazza, Roma blindata
description.author: webinfo@adnkronos.com
description.content:
Roma - (Adnkronos/Ign) - Attesi nella Capitale almeno 15mila manifestanti. Nessun preavviso alla questura. Blitz dell'UdS: sigilli a scuole private. Allargata la zona rossa, ma gli studenti: "Nessun assalto". . Caos ieri durante l'esame del ddl sull'università. La presidente di turno Mauro dichiara approvati quattro emendamenti dell'opposizione (VIDEO). L'Idv chiede che la legge torni alla Camera. Poi arriva la decisione di Schifani. Pd: "Precedente gravissimo". Pedica filma con il telefonino (VIDEO) Bondi mentre allunga il braccio per votare al posto di Sacconi adnShowzone(5); Roma, 22 dic. (Adnkronos/Ign) - Studenti di nuovo in piazza oggi in tutta Italia che, nonostante , potrebbe essere approvata proprio oggi in via definitiva. adnShowzone(1); A Roma sono attesi almeno 15mila studenti mentre polizia e carabinieri hanno schierato 2mila uomini. Una delegazione dei giovani tenterà di portare una lettera-appello a Napolitano per chiedergli di non firmare il ddl.
Il centro di Roma è blindato ma gli studenti hanno assicurato che non intendono violare la 'zona rossa'. Nessun avviso invece alla questura: i manifestanti infatti hanno optato per cortei 'spontanei' senza comunicare alcun percorso alla questura. Il corteo principale comunque dovrebbe partire dall'università della Sapienza.
In mattinata l'Unione degli Studenti ha fatto un blitz in oltre 100 scuole private da Nord a Sud (Milano, Firenze, Bologna, Cagliari, Napoli, Bari, Cosenza), sigillate con nastro da cantiere, per protestare contro il "processo di privatizzazione messo in campo da governi di ogni schieramento negli ultimi 15 anni, per demarcare la qualità dell'istruzione pubblica rispetto ad un'idea di formazione di elite, finanziata con moneta sonante dal ministero all'ultima Finanziaria" - afferma in una nota l'UdS.
"Oggi è l'ennesima mobilitazione di questi ultimi 3 mesi che hanno scaldato il cuore ad un'Italia ripiegata nel berlusconismo in decomposizione. L'Italia dei conflitti ha ripreso parola anche grazie al fiato che il movimento studentesco le ha dato" - afferma Tito Russo, coordinatore nazionale Unione degli Studenti. "Oggi in molte città la politica istituzionale segnerà un'ennesima distanza dalla società reale, trincerandosi dietro camionette blindate. Oggi noi ci riprendiamo le nostre città, continuando a manifestare fin quando in questo Paese non ci saranno politiche attive per il welfare, la formazione ed il lavoro".
E contro il rischio di nuove violenze e scontri, gli studenti annunciano sorprese. "Oggi stupiremo la politica di Manganello e di Governo. Non abbiamo paura di strumentalità, insulti e vecchi mostri agitati populisticamente, spiazzeremo oggi e durante le vacanze, chi per una generazione che chiede futuro assicura macerie e rastrellamenti cileni".
Da nord a Sud, la mobilitazione oggi interessa tutta la Penisola. A Palermo si terrà un nuovo "Blocchiamo tutto day" in coincidenza con la seduta del Senato per la discussione della legge Gelmini. I giovani non hanno annunciato quali saranno i loro obiettivi, ma hanno solo fatto sapere che "saranno assediati i palazzi del potere'.
